Described Instances List

Fri May 26 19:12:42 2017

This is a list of Mastodon instances with descriptions and contact information. It also contains preview links, so that you can better decide which instance to join.

You can see a heavier, but more fun version here.

Please note that some instances may contain offensive content!

engineered.space

about

preview

join

Engineered Space

Users: 2 . Toots: 75 . Connections: 157 . Language: English

A Mastodon Instance for engineering professionals wishing to collaborate and keep in touch that isn't run by a corporation.

More Info... Basic rules

This instance is intended for engineering professionals wishing to collaborate and keep in touch

Users must use their real names

Discussions about politics and the state of the world are not permitted. If you want that, go to Twitter

Don't be a jerk

Respect others and if you have a disagreement, keep it in direct messages, not in public

Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any politically incorrect commentary out of the public timeline

No hate speech will be tolerated

Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends

Loli, gore and rape is not allowed

Don't make parody accounts and don't spam

No bots are permitted on this instance

If you see any posts or behaviour that breech these rules then please report them (in the Toot Menu) or directly to the administrator @chidgey. All reports will be investigated, and if investigation determines you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.

NSFW (Not Safe For Work) is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the Toot/Message text box).

Email: admin@engineered.network

Admin: @engineered.space

herebedragons.io

about

preview

join

NUMQUAM TITIANDUM

Users: 1 . Toots: 648 . Connections: 565 . Language: English

Welcome to my personal instance, this is where I roam the fediverse. This instance runs on Digital Ocean and is maintained by me. If you are into software creation, automation or agile development, make sure to also check out my blog

Up since 04/18/2017

This instance is IPv6 compatible, has good HTTPS parameters, is following good security practices, is focused on speed and will be updated regularly.

Email: mastodon@herebedragons.io

Admin: @jan@herebedragons.io

Un punto de encuentro para usuarios latinos y especialmente chilenos que quieran comenzar en esta red social. Ya en etapa de producciÃ³n asÃ­ que podemos sumar mas usuarios al registro.

More Info... TÃ©rminos de Uso:

Este servidor autogestionado estÃ¡ en lÃ­nea solamente por el esfuerzo de su administrador, por lo cual es posible que existan ocasionales bajas del servicio (downtime), durante condiciones meteorolÃ³gicas extremas o cortes de energÃ­a prolongados. Las cuentas registradas en este servidor no pueden ser utilizadas para publicar contenido gore/snuff/pornografÃ­a infantil/pedofilia de ningÃºn tipo, de otra forma su cuenta serÃ¡ eliminada inmediatamente si se detecta esa actividad. Se puede publicar contenido ocasionalmente NSFW, pero inundar los espacios pÃºblicos (flooding) con publicaciones hardcore NSFW puede llevar a la eliminaciÃ³n de su cuenta. Este pod esta en contra de la publicaciÃ³n de contenido racista, sexista, homofÃ³bico o cualquier otro tipo de discriminaciÃ³n, asÃ­ como tambiÃ©n el uso de las cuentas con fines de propaganda/comerciales o de persecuciÃ³n y asedio a otros usuarios. Cuentas creadas en MastodonChile que queden abandonadas, sin publicaciones o suscripciones, serÃ¡n eliminadas en las limpiezas de rutina del servidor de cuentas creadas por bots, por lo tanto si se registra, use su cuenta y pruebe que existe o que no es un bot. Este servidor hace eco de los principios del software libre y nuestro espÃ­ritu militante, es ser un nodo mÃ¡s de una red descentralizada y federada que respeta al usuario y no invade su privacidad.

AquÃ­ pueden encontrar unas Peguntas Frecuentes.

mastodon.technology

about

preview

join

Mastodon for Tech Folks

Users: 3895 . Toots: 42027 . Connections: 1365 . Language: English

This Mastodon instance is for people interested in technology. Discussions aren't limited to technology, because tech folks shouldn't be limited to technology either!

Don't be a jerk to anyone or we'll need to be a jerk to you. We adhere to the TootCat Code of Conduct and follow the Toot CafÃ© list of blocked instances .

More Info... Code of Conduct

As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

Personal attacks

Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

Public or private oppressive language or actions

Other unethical conduct

Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

Not be used a profile picture

Be posted with a "NSFW" tag

Not be posted to the public timeline

the above rules apply to content that is:

Sexualized

Violent

Flashing or rapidly changing

By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on toot.cat and to public spaces when an individual is representing toot.cat or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

Email: ash@ashfurrow.com

Admin: @ashfurrow@mastodon.technology

mastodon.org.uk

about

preview

join

Mastodon.org.uk

Users: 240 . Toots: 5973 . Connections: 940 . Language: English

Statistics

How does it work? When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on mastodon.org.uk . That is your instance.
You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated.
The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on mastodon.org.uk and use it to access the Mastodon federation ).
The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers/

Need to know users
@xvilo Is the maintainer of this instance.
@STATUS Gives you information about this instance.
@userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots.

Bots on this instance
@STATUS Gives us an automated heads up when there is a new Mastodon Version available .
@userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots. Source on Github
@bigben Toots the time. Source on Github . Maintained by @followthesam
Bots are welcome here but please not that bots will be silenced when posting too much (e.g. flooding local timeline). If you have a bot, please contact me (@xvilo) . I can add it to the list.
Bots will be banned if they post inappropriate content or if I (@xvilo) get many complaints about it.

Blocks Pawoo.net - Silenced

Email: sem@tropical.email

Admin: @xvilo@mastodon.org.uk

social.lasanha.org

about

preview

join

Mastodon

Users: 9 . Toots: 100 . Connections: 331 . Language: English

social.lasanha.org

More Info... We are following the rules that mastodon.social also uses for moderation, so:

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lasanha.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising

Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism

Sexism or advocation of sexism

Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children

Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: mastodon@luizirber.org

Admin: @social.lasanha.org

Physi.cc Mastodon

Users: 38 . Toots: 1600 . Connections: 684 . Language: English

Mastodon is a distributed, open-source social platform. This instance is run by a graduate worker and physics PhD candidate in Ithaca NY , but can be used to connect with people on any other GNU Social compatible instance. There are no formal rules on this instance for now, just don't be a jerk! We reserve the right to keep anything and anyone bad off the server.

Bantha Milk is our sister instance.

"Star Wars is for everyone" therefore, Mos Eisley is for everyone.

Spoiler policy:

Adult and NSFW policy:

Tag all adult and NSFW content.

What is Mos Eisley?

Mos Eisley is the infamous space port from A New Hope. See Mos Eisley on Wookiepedia, The Star Wars Wiki.

-- English--

This server for Fukuda Takuro and some approved members and named "Dodonga-don". Approved people may not toot dangerous/outrage/crazy contents, so this server didn't have restriction policy. But if I found problem toot, I'll ban with posting reasons. This server will never shutdown except when this server has the problem. This server's official language is "Japanese",and sometime "English" or "Spanish". Thanks for reading, I appreciate. Maintenance time: Every month, 0:30~0:32 JST and everyday, 2:30~2:40 JST. My Blog: "Shtore". Note: English version is not post frequently.

Administrator's follow policy:

MUST: Follow copyrights

NOT: Curation media

NOT: Affiliater/Ponzi scheme/Slur/Obscene/Risky

MUST: Put CW/NSFW for nude/naked contents If you violate this policy, instance owner will block you or your instances.

Email: tea_hugutaku (ã‚ã£ã¨) yahoo.co.jp

Admin: @f@social.otya.me

RÃ¨gles

Comme dirait les anglais : Don't be a dick

Cette instance n'a pas vocation Ã  accueillir des robots et autres bots. HÃ©bergez votre propre instance ou rejoignez-en une qui les acceptent. Pareillement les follow bot ne sont pas bienvenus.

La propagande politique telle qu'elle Ã  lieu sur Twitter est priÃ©e de rester sur... twitter. C'est du spam et sera considÃ©rÃ© comme tel. Partagez vos opinions mais ne nous matraquez pas avec.

Le contenu pouvant choquer (NSFW, politique et cie) doit Ãªtre taguÃ© proprement Ã  l'aide du content warning (CW). Le but est de n'importuner personne. Votre avatar ne devra pas Ãªtre obscÃ¨ne ni classÃ© NSFW. En cas de doutes demandez Ã  @zoski ou @shug0

Je souhaite respecter la libertÃ© d'expression de tous mais les comportements dÃ©placÃ©s seront sanctionnÃ©s.

Vous pensez qu'il est important de rajouter certaines rÃ¨gles ici ? Contactez moi par Mastodon ou par e-mail.

Gestion de vos donnÃ©es

L'administrateur systÃ¨me (moi zoski) je m'engage Ã  protÃ©ger vos donnÃ©es au meilleur de mes compÃ©tences. Je ne vendrais pas, ni ne tirerais parti des informations que je peux Ãªtre amenÃ© Ã  voir dans l'exercice de mes fonctions.

Vos donnÃ©es, pouets (toots) et les mÃ©dia partagÃ©s sur masto.raildecake.fr se trouvent sur mon serveur hÃ©bergÃ© chez tetaneutral.net Ã  Toulouse. Un backup chiffrÃ© de ses donnÃ©es est effectuÃ© chaque nuit sur un disque dur Ã  mon domicile.

a.weirder.earth

about

preview

join

a weirder earth

Users: 187 . Toots: 6098 . Connections: 756 . Language: English

Hi and welcome to a weirder earth ! This is a mastodon instance, which means that if you create an account here you can use it to interact with mastodon users across all other instances. Think of it as a low-key distributed twitter.

a weirder earth itself is meant to be a community that skews thoughtful and weird. Everyone who abides by the code of conduct is welcome, thoughtful weirdos most of all! :)

If you run into trouble registering, ping @mykola here or on twitter for help.

More Info... Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, but if you do know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

Own Your Weird - This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Be true to yourself and let others do the same.

Share Your Weird - Talk about the weird shit you're into! Talk to other people about the weird shit they're into! Make weird shit together! Post your art! Bots welcome!

Cultivate the Weird - Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Keep A Weirder Earth Weird! - no brands, no marketing, no data-miners. You're here to use it for its social function, not to exploit it for some other purpose. Banal Bullshit Unwelcome - there's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't weird, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

Email: Not Available

Admin: Not Available

octodon.social

about

preview

join

Octodon

Users: 6986 . Toots: 121323 . Connections: 1567 . Language: English

octodon.social

More Info... Octodon:

no rules in particular, be nice be reasonable call me mommy stuff like that

Seriously though: It should be similar to mastodon.social.

NSFW/any legal porn is allowed, but tag it as NSFW or make it unlisted or less. Trolls are only allowed if they're quiet; you can shitpost but not harass someone, and my threshold is pretty low.

I'm not Twitter, I'll fuck up nazis and bullies for fun, and get an AI to do it if I get bored.

I'm your nice cyberpunk queen and I intend to keep this place decent and safe for everyone.

You should choose an instance based on shared values; here I believe everyone deserve freedom, but also to be safe from harassment and hate. Freedom will not be given a higher priority.

I'll always try to solve problems in the most rational and safe way possible for users, and try to discuss any issue with the people concerned if I think it's worth it. If you at least try to be good and comprehensive, so will I.

I understand and accept mistakes, but not being bad on purpose.

Advertising: Probably never, if any it will not be integrated into content or intrusive, at most I'm thinking about the Wikipedia way of asking for donation when needed.

Federation & Politics: It federates with nearly everything, I'll block whatever instance isn't compatible with this site's rules as needed. For example if a remote user harass a local user and their instance admin endorses it. See list at the end of this page.

Reminder: that's a private place and your free speech means very little to me and most of my users. If your instance gets blocked it's because you endorse hate and/or harassment; then why be pathetic now and bitch about it? You can't force people to like you and being an asshole won't get you friends. Go run your little world.

CW: On public toots (not unlisted, private, or direct), content warnings are required for

any kind of (explicit enough) violence (with or without pics, including gore, *phobia, abuse, sexual or not) and referring to it;

sexual content (pics must already be tagged as NSFW, use a CW if you have text or want to warn about specific content).

This is not about what is culturally or religiously accepted, but about common sources of trauma

that deeply hurt people for very real reasons. Consider yourself lucky if you don't need any of it, but it's not about you.

They are also appreciated but not mandatory on:

politics, spoilers, anything depressing or too negative. Use them in an opportunistic way.

Enforcement:

On this instance, a toot that doesn't follow these rules may be deleted.

On repeated offences or if disturbing public timelines,

the account may get silenced (only their followers will see toots).

If silencing is not enough (harassment, ...), the account may get

completely suspended.

If the account is on another instance, it may get silenced and suspended from here, and I will not hesitate to share reports

with other instance admins.

Instance admins, feel free to contact me about this instance's users' behavior.

Support / Servers:

You can support me/this server through a Patreon here and you can get a VPN here or send bitcoins to 1F3TeADq25W471a1G5W5gJJ1BWbQYn6Di5.

Anyway if you're wondering, it's hosted on Scaleway in France, and it should be pretty stable since I'm a competent sysadmin.

There are full backups done every 12 hours, and sent fully encrypted to an append-only remote server.

Feel free to report it to me directly if it's slow or anything doesn't work.

Server stats:

main,

app01,

app02,

sidekiq01.

Instance blocks:

NameReason

noagendasocial.comAdam is a fucking idiot who enjoys harassing people himself if they report someone. You're breaking the federation Adam.

pawoo.netToo much child porn in public timelines. (silenced) Also: sealion.club, heldscal.la, freezepeach.xyz, shitposter.club, unsafe.space, gs.smuglo.li, are blocked or silenced as they did allow hate speech and harassment.

Email: avoidstar@octodon.social

Admin: @CobaltVelvet@octodon.social

creativity.cafe

about

preview

join

creativity.cafe

Users: 89 . Toots: 2641 . Connections: 626 . Language: English

creativity.cafe is a Mastodon instance for people who make things - artists of any kind, including visual, musical, glitch, 3d, net art, writing, sculpture, and more. Even people who don't create but are just really enthusiastic about creating are welcome! Come on down to talk shop and be around fellow creators.

This is an invite only instance, in order to make sure that people who are here truly want to be here (and to keep my server costs low). If you want an invite , send your email and desired username directly to @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com .

More Info... Da Rules

Be kind to each other

Flag looping/flashing GIFs as NSFW for people with epilepsy/nausea/etc.

Also flag actually NSFW content as NSFW

This is an arts-focused instance. If you post work that isn't yours, try to find and include the source so we can find more of it :)

Harassment, slurs, hate speech, etc. explicitly unwelcome

Not a rule, but when you join feel free to introduce yourself with a post and the #introduction / #introductions tags! It's a great way to get found on the network, meet new people, and greet the community.

If you have any issues, reports, complaints, bug notes, or requests, you may contact the administrator, Way, via Mastodon at @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com.

Supporting creativity.cafe

Like human beings require touch to survive at a young age, instances require money. If you enjoy this instance, you can throw me a dollar or so to my Patreon to make sure it grows up to be strong and healthy.

Email: wayspurrchen@gmail.com

Admin: @way@creativity.cafe

BigDino Mastodon

Users: 399 . Toots: 3411 . Connections: 662 . Language: English

This is a Mastodon instance, hosted by BigDinosaur.org . Mastodon is a distributed social thing. All are welcome!

Guidelines:

Be kind to each other

Don't post illegal shit

Content warnings are required on NSFW images, no exceptions

As the admin, I reserve the right to change any policy and do anything I want at any timeâ€”this could include deleting posts, banning people, or converting the server into a juice machine

FUN IS MANDATORY

Just kidding, fun isn't mandatory But please have fun

Email: lee@bigdinosaur.org

mastodon.3bk.jp

about

ieji.de

about

preview

join

ieji.de

Users: 17 . Toots: 86 . Connections: 310 . Language: English

SECURE multiple A+ TLS ratings ( TLS OBS QUA HTB )
STABLE financially backed, won't go down in a week like some do
POWERFUL Intel Xeon E5-1650v3, DDR4-2133 RAM, WD SE HDDs RAID10 (high traffic configs)
LIBERAL based in Germany , Frankfurt and uses 1984.is DNS and LE Certs
IPv6 SUPPORT via tunnelbroker.net
NO LOGS nginx saves no logs, don't know about the mastodon ruby stuff though. Disregard the privacy policy, it's the default one
USE VIA TOR NETWORK AT iejidevtqqdlukju.onion for extra anonymity (you have to accept an invalid https certificate though, as Let's Encrypt disallows .onion certification)
KNOW YOUR HOST german legit Impressum (imprint) with many ways to contact

More Info... Code of Conduct:

ieji.de is availabe via Tor. That doesn't make this instance free of rules.

Do NOT:

- harass people in any way, constructive and founded critisism is ok

- spam at others, especially on other instances

- spread explicit pictures of minors

- spread copyrighted material

- break german law (no nazis or extremists allowed)

Depending on the rules broken I may have to report you to german authorities as precise as I can or give you at max two warning before blocking you out.

I'll do my best to respond to reports asap.

Abuse of the report option will get you banned after the third misbehaviour.

If you are an instance admin and run into a problem, be it technical or an abusive user, please reach out to me. Via mastodon account or mail displayed in the contact box.

Basicly, act accordingly to german freedom of speech rules or prepare to get warned/banned.

I'll be polishing the CoC soonish!

Impressum(german imprint)

Email: tor@ieji.de

Admin: @SolSoCoG@ieji.de

animalliberation.social

about

preview

join

Animal Liberation Network

Users: 593 . Toots: 1475 . Connections: 513 . Language: English

Animal Liberation Network is a community for animal activists on the Mastodon network. You can connect with other activists through the local timeline , as well as spread your activism to the outside world with the federated timeline . Please read our rules !

More Info... This is a website by and for animal activists.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of animalliberation.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising

Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism

Sexism or advocation of sexism

Speciesism or advocation of speciesism

Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children

Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: alex@alexgleason.me

Admin: @alex@animalliberation.social

Bienvenue sur l'instance Mastodon du Parti Pirate de Belgique .

Welkom op de Mastodon instantie gehost door de Belgische Piratenpartij .

We expect that everybody respects values shared by our Basic Text when sÂ·he speaks on our instance.

Nous nous attendons Ã  ce que chacunÂ·e respecte les valeurs vÃ©hiculÃ©es par notre Texte de Base lorsqu'iel s'exprime sur notre instance.

We verwachten dat hij/zij die op onze instantie spreekt de waarden gedeeld door onze Basistekst, respecteert.

party.personal.pizza

about

preview

join

Personal.pizza Party

Users: 29 . Toots: 153 . Connections: 408 . Language: English

party.personal.pizza is a mastodon instance.

ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰

Every pizza is a personal pizza if you try hard and believe in yourself.

ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰

âš ï¸ Please read this instance's extended description ! âš ï¸

About

This is a small, experimental instance, currently running on Heroku. If you want guarantees about uptime or stability, you might want to choose a bigger one from the list here.

The Rules

Only three:

Please follow the WeAllJS code of conduct.

Your benevolent instance admin reserves the right to hellban anyone whenever.

Likes are florps and timeline goes sideways

Email: e@cmendenhall.com

Admin: @ecmendenhall@party.personal.pizza

Les copains d'abord

Vous Ãªtes les bienvenus si on a dÃ©jÃ  bu un verre ensemble !
This site is for my friends. You're welcome if you know me in some way, for instance if we had a drink one day.

HÃ©bergement : Dublin, Irlande. C'est moi qui dÃ©cide ce qui est permis ou pas, en tentant de le faire avec bienveillance et en tenant compte de l'avis des inscrits. scholar.social

about

preview

join

Scholar Social

Users: 14 . Toots: 346 . Connections: 294 . Language: English

A Mastodon instance for academics

"The Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference"

Read more ...

More Info... This is a general-purpose federated Mastodon instance. You may use it as a personal account, but the focus is on academics. This is supposed to be "the Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference." :P

Real names and credentials are recommended for networking purposes but are absolutely not required.

Do

Brag about your publications

Share references and resources

Network with other academics

Add CW's (content warnings) to your posts liberally: label strong language, rants, spoilers of TV shows, etc. We're academics! We love meta-data!

Recruit participants for academic surveysâ€”formal, IRB-approved ones or even informal ones (just make sure to CW them and don't get too obnoxious about it)

Don't

Post anything that could be described as "spam"

Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.

Impersonate other people

Harass other people

In more detail

Many thanks to mastodon.social, from whom I took these policies.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of scholar.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising

Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism

Sexism or advocation of sexism

Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children

Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: scholar.social.mastodon@gmail.com

Admin: @socrates@scholar.social

ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼å®¹é‡å•é¡Œã«å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ç§»è¨­ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ãã®éš›ã€æ—¢å­˜ã®ç”»åƒã«ã¤ãã¾ã—ã¦ã¯å…¨ã¦æ¶ˆå»ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ãŠæ‰‹æ•°ã§ã™ãŒã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ç­‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯å†è¨­å®šã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™

ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯å¼•ãç¶šããã®ã¾ã¾ã”åˆ©ç”¨ã„ãŸã ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚

é‹å–¶æ–¹é‡ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

ã€Œã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚’éŠã‚“ã§ã‚‹äººãŒæ¥½ã—ãéã”ã›ã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã€ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¦ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ããŸã„ã¨è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ»æ³¨æ„äº‹é …

å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã«åã™ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ãŠã‚„ã‚ãã ã•ã„

mastonon.net

about

preview

join

Mastonon

Users: 1 . Toots: 174 . Connections: 154 . Language: English

ç¾åœ¨ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯å®Ÿé¨“ç›®çš„ã®é‹ç”¨ã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ä¸€èˆ¬å—ä»˜ã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚å°‘æ•°ã®æ–¹ã‚’é™å®šçš„ã«æ‹›å¾…ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã«å‚åŠ ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã„æ–¹ã¯ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‹ã‚‰ä»–ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’æ¢ã™ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™

Currently, this instance is personal use for experimental use. You cannot join here. If you want join to Mastodon, you can find here for other instances

Currently, this instance experimental accept to join a few users. However, this instance will possibility of stop for maintenance, update and what something.

More Info... About using our contents on your sites, and etc

All rights of users' contents within this instance belong to the user who posted. You can not be used without permission by each users. Also, when you are considering using for commercial purposes, we will refuse to use and reprint, basically including cases where we did not get a reply from us. If you want to use it absolutely, please contact the person directly and pay the appropriate remuneration and incentive.

* The terms "commercial purpose" as pointed herein refers to the case where it is operated for the purpose of obtaining some profit or consideration from users or sponsors.

About contacts

If you need ask something about this instance, please feel free to let owner know. You can contact us in English or Japanese.

Kirakiratter

Users: 2928 . Toots: 326791 . Connections: 1089 . Language: English

ã“ã“ã¯Mastodonã§ã™ãŒã€Œãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆï¼ã€ãŒã€Œã‚«ãƒ„!ã€ã«ã€ã¾ãŸè±¡ã§ã¯ãªãã†ã•ããŒã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã“ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã«å‚åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã®ã«ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚«ãƒ„ï¼ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã§ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€kirakiratterã«ã„ã‚‹ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚«ãƒ„ï¼ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚

è©³ã—ãã¯ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€ wiki ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚


It's Mastodon but "toot" is "katsu" and also there's a rabbit. You don't have to be an Aikatsu fan, but the majority of users on here are.

See the extended info page for more details.

More Info...

The site icon is by @southrop (CC-BY 4.0).

The Aikatsu-themed onboarding text is by @sumire and @bitmap.

The Kirakiratter theme, kktCSS, is by @MasterDalK and contributors, and is available on GitHub.

å…¬é–‹ç¯„å›²ã®åˆ¶é™ã‚„CWãƒ»NSFWã‚’æ´»ç”¨ã—ã¦ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã¯è¦ªå­ã§æ¥½ã—ã‚ã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã«ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†

ä»–äººã®ä½œå“ã‚’å‹æ‰‹ã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ã¦ã¯ã„ã‘ã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼ˆã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ã®ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ãƒãƒ£ã‚„å…¬å¼ã®ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é™¤ãã¾ã™ï¼‰

meemu.org

about

preview

join

Mastodon

Users: 15 . Toots: 362 . Connections: 362 . Language: English

A fluffy mascotted mastodon instance. Join us to worship in the cult of meemu, or if you just want to join a queer/furry friendly mastodon instance. Racist/sexist/homophobic/"loli" content is not welcome on this instance.

More Info... The cult of meemu, here, in the flesh and digital.

This instance is intended to be queer friendly and will be moderated with that goal in mind.

The following was taken from mastodon.social on April 13th, 2017 and the server will be run in accordance with these guidelines.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising

Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism

Sexism or advocation of sexism

Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children

Content illegal in the United States of America, where this instance resides

Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

Email: Not Available

Admin: Not Available

æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ å‰µä½œã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ ã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚å°èª¬ã ã‘ã§ã¯ãªãã€ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ»æ¼«ç”»ãƒ»å‹•ç”»ãªã© æ§˜ã€…ãªå‰µä½œã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ã®çš†ã•ã‚“ ã®ç™»éŒ²ã‚’ãŠå¾…ã¡ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

mstdn.pw

about

preview

join

mstdn.pw

Users: 15 . Toots: 28 . Connections: 111 . Language: English

mstdn.pw is a Mastodon instance that promotes healthy and open expression of individuals, ideas, and content. As you would expect, free speech is encouraged and viewed in high regard as is open discussion , spanning a multitude of viewpoints and among all users.

More Info... There are few rules here as we operate on the assumption that most users are not malicious in intent.

Rules:

Illegal content - no illegal content is allowed, including but not limited to underage content with the depiction of minors in any sexual context.

Non-consent - no content depicting anyone being forced against their will for entertainment. Exceptions include videos on real world events that have a societal impact. This content should help raise awareness and educate, and stir up healthy discussions.

Harassment - discussion, including disagreements, are encouraged, but harassment of other users is prohibited. We are defining harassment as: anything intending to incite others and elicit negative emotions and reactions from other users while not contributing to worthwhile discussion. Having one's feelings hurt and being offended by another user's opinions and world views does not constitute harassment. When in doubt, follow this piece of advice: Don't be a dick.

Circumventing blocks/suspensions - this is a great way to be removed from the instance. If someone blocks you, just leave it be. Going around the blocks to engage someone is harassment.

Considerations

Do keep in mind that we are part of a community. Please be considerate of others and use the CW and NSFW flags for content warranting it. However, this is not a requirement, and content will NOT be removed for disregarding this request.

Personal Responsibility

You're responsible for your content, the content you view, and your interactions with other users. This platform gives great granular support to each individual user and instance alike. Please make yourself familiar with the controls if you are not familiar with them already.

If you want content tailored to your liking, we're not sure this is the place for you, but you are allowed and encouraged to follow, unfollow, block, and unblock users as you see fit. We don't expect everybody will along all the time, so use these functions as you please. You control the flow of the information you see.

You're responsible for what you toot, boost, and favorite. Nobody will warn you when you get too close to the line and stop you before you cross it. We will work on the assumption that you were raised as part of a community, so we expect you know how to act alongside others. If you lack social skills or just want guidance, feel free to contact our admins for information. If you feel like you're getting too emotionally involved, allowing yourself to be distracted from work or from spending time with loved ones, know when to walk away. Nobody else knows your limit better than you do.

Email: jake@eightsix.in

Admin: @jake@mstdn.pw

lfsr.net

  • æŠ•ç¨¿ã™ã‚‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ã€å†…å®¹ã«å¿œã˜ã¦é©åˆ‡ã«å…¬é–‹ç¯„å›²ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†(ä¾‹ï¼šR18ç”»åƒã¯NSFWã€æ–‡ç« ã¯CWãªã©)

social.wxcafe.net

about

preview

join

MastocafÃ©

Users: 891 . Toots: 19402 . Connections: 1062 . Language: English

This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.

See the Goals, rules, and technical details for more information

More Info... Goals and Rules

The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better.

As such, we have a few rules we'd like everyone on the instance to follow :

Acting in any of the following ways will get you immediately suspended

Posting illegal content is, well, illegal. This server is in France. As such, heinous content, nazi propaganda, underage porn, and all other content that is illegal according to french law is forbidden.

Posting LGBTQIA+-phobic, whorephobic, sexist, racist, antisemitic, and islamophobic content. You can still discuss such topics, by including a CW, quotes, and a context.

Making public, by screencapping or copying, private or direct messages that the author didn't want made public

Taking part in targetted harassment

Posting spam, advertisment for a commercial product, etc

Being a techbro or Richard Matthew Stallman

Acting in any of the following ways will get your post deleted and you'll get a warning. After three warnings, you'll be suspended.

Posting pornographic images/videos or nude pictures without marking them NSFW, or posting them on the public timeline

Being clearly disrespectful towards another user

Being an asshole

Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".

Technical Informations

This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...

More

Feel free to contact me for more informations at the email address in the right sidebar, or directly on Mastodon :)

Email: wxcafe@wxcafe.net

Admin: @wxcafe@social.wxcafe.net

toot.kashishokunin.com

    techn.ical.ist

    about

    preview

    join

    technicalist

    Users: 107 . Toots: 1242 . Connections: 909 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance focuses on programming and computer science related topics.

    More Info...

    Code of Conduct

    >click to read>

    This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4,

    available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4.

    Our Pledge

    In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as

    contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and

    our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body

    size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience,

    nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and

    orientation.

    Our Standards

    Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment

    include:

    Using welcoming and inclusive language

    Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences

    Gracefully accepting constructive criticism

    Focusing on what is best for the community

    Showing empathy towards other community members

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances

    Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks

    Public or private harassment

    Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission

    Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

    Our Responsibilities

    Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable

    behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in

    response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

    Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or

    reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions

    that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or

    permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate,

    threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    Scope

    This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces

    when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of

    representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail

    address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed

    representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be

    further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

    Enforcement

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be

    reported by contacting the project team at contact@draft.li. All

    complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that

    is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is

    obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

    Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good

    faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other

    members of the project's leadership.

    Email: contact@draft.li

    Admin: @vhf@techn.ical.ist

    misanthropy.wang

    about

    preview

    join

    misanthropy.wang

    Users: 36 . Toots: 2589 . Connections: 621 . Language: English

    This is a mastodon instance that only exists because I thought the domain was funny.
    Also, mastodon is pretty neat.

    Keeping the server alive

    If you want to support this server, you can do so by either signing up and being nice to me or help me pay my hosting bills through my patreon

    More Info... Since this is a small instance on a small server, I'll reserve the right to close registrations at any time.

    I have not authored a full CoC yet, but you should be aware that using this instance you are going to be silenced, removed, blocked and whatever'd if someone reports you as abusive, you harass someone, or you spew sexist/racist/transphobic bullshit.

    Yes, this site is called misanthropy.wang, but that doesn't mean that everyone here hates each other. At least not, you know, verbally. Just on the inside.

    Location

    The server for this instance is located in Paris, France, and is operated from Germany. I don't know what exactly that might mean to you, but if you're the type of persons who cares, you probably already know.

    Email: jemus42@quantenbrot.de

    Admin: @jemus42@misanthropy.wang

    mastodon.groningendigitalcity.com

    about

    preview

    Mastodon Groningen, NL

    Users: 197 . Toots: 1282 . Connections: 284 . Language: English

    Groningse innovators helpen elkaar hier


    This Mastodon-instance is hosted in The Netherlands and has Dutch as its primary language. We have a strong focus on the (digital) community of the city of Groningen . If you're not comfortable talking Dutch and some English, please register at another instance.

    More Info...

    Moi eem! Wat barsten we van de ambitie in Stad en ommeland. Onze startups horen bij de snelst groeiende bedrijven in Nederland, onze fabrieken worden slimmer en we krijgen zowel een indrukwekkend Internet of Things-netwerk als een 5G-fieldlab. En oh ja: we proberen Tesla binnen te halen en willen de duurzaamste energieregio van het land worden.

    Misschien is het dus wel handig dat we elkaar goed weten te vinden. Voor inspiratie, ideeÃ«n, vragen en antwoorden. Waar dan ook over.

    Dat elkaar helpen, dat proberen we hier. Een Mastodon: een gezamenlijke plek, een soort interne Twitter. Een experiment, maar zo zijn we hier in Grunn: gewoon proberen en gÃ¡Ã¡n.

    Zeg ook moi! Het is gewoon gratis, gaaf en vast gezellig.*

    * Eierbal niet inbegrepen, die's al op...

    Email: hbokhoven+mastodon@gmail.com

    Admin: @the_admin@mastodon.groningendigitalcity.com

    Razmjena vjeÅ¡tina

    Users: 24 . Toots: 172 . Connections: 283 . Language: English

    The instance by the group behind Razmjena vjeÅ¡tina & the Hacklab in Mama, Zagreb.

    More Info... Hacklab in Mama and Razmjena vjeÅ¡tina

    We are based in Zagreb, Croatia.

    Hacklab in Mama is a public working space of technology enthusiasts in the Club Mama. Initiated by the group gathered around the Skill Sharing program, the methodology, atmosphere and philosophy of the gatherings quickly spread from the Skill Sharing gatherings on Saturdays to the rest of the week.

    â˜­ About our hackerspace on hackerspaces.org

    masuei@mstdn.masuei.netã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ãŸã ã®å‡ä¸¼

    ç‰¹ã«ä½•ã‹ï¼‘ã¤ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã«çµã£ãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ä½•ã‹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãŒæ±ºã¾ã‚Œã°ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒå¢—å¼·åŠã³ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ã‚‚å¢—ã‚„ã—ãŸã„ãªãªã‚“ã¦æ€ã„ã¤ã¤â€¦ã€‚

    social.lecker.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 2 . Toots: 1 . Connections: 264 . Language: German

    social.lecker.coffee

    More Info... Blocked instances

    We use the same blocking rules as Toot.cafe, which you can see here: Blocked instances

    Instance rules

    Rules are taken from Mastodon.social and Toot.cafe

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lecker.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: HeadBarista@lecker.coffee

    Admin: @HeadBarista@social.lecker.coffee

    social.bluecore.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Equestria Social Network

    Users: 15 . Toots: 430 . Connections: 118 . Language: English

    Equestria.Social est une instance Mastodon pour tous les fans de poneys , crÃ©Ã©e pour fÃ©dÃ©rer les Bronies et Pegasisters voulant rejoindre le "fediverse", et ceux dÃ©jÃ  prÃ©sents ! Mais nous sommes ouverts Ã  tous !

    Equestria.Social is a Mastodon instance for all pony fans , created to federate Bronies and Pegasisters wanting to join the "fediverse", and those already present ! But we are opened to everyone !

    #Brony #MyLittlePony #MLPFiM

    Equestria.Social (ou Eq.S) est une instance Mastodon pour tous les fans de poneys (Bronies et pegasisters), et aussi toutes les autres personnes qui veulent rejoindre le royaume de l'amitiÃ©, avec la libertÃ© de Mastodon.

    pawoo.net

    Code of Conduct

    We are dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone, and we do not tolerate harassment in any form.

    Please follow our code and rules:

    Be professional.

    Be responsible.

    Be welcoming.

    Be kind.

    Be respectful of other viewpoints and ideas.

    Be supportive and look out for each other.

    Don't flood

    Use NSFW tags for sensitive content

    Use content warning for spoilers

    Email: hello@hafen.io

    Admin: @HashDot@mastodon.hafen.io

    å„ç¨®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„å ´åˆ
    è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«è¨­å®šã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒã€Œè¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã€ç­‰ã¸æŒ¯ã‚Šåˆ†ã‘ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ãªã„ã‹ã€ã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ã€‚GBTDNã®ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã€gbtdn.tokyoã€‘ã‹ã‚‰ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’å—ä¿¡ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã€è¨­å®šã®ç¢ºèªã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    2017/4/15 ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆï¼

    More Info... ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰ã®ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®æ€§è³ªä¸Šã€ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰ã®ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¯ãŠæ§ãˆãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¯ã€GBTDNãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®æ„æ€ã‚’å¿…ãšã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ï¼ˆãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«æ¬„ã«ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã«ã¤ã„ã¦è¨˜è¼‰ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãŒå¤šã„ã§ã™ï¼‰ã€‚ãªãŠã€GBTDNãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®æ„æ€ã«åã—åŸ·æ‹—ã«ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’ã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºãŒè¦‹å—ã‘ã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆã€å½“è©²ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹è‡ªä½“ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯å¯¾è±¡ã¨ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆGBTDNãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’åˆ¶é™ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ï¼‰

    ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯çŠ¶æ³ã«ã¤ãã¾ã—ã¦ã¯ã€ç®¡ç†è€…ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚’ã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    *About remote follow from other instances

    Please refrain from remote follow on the nature of this instance. Also, in case of remote follow, be sure to check the intention of the follower user (There are many cases describing remote follow in the profile field.) In addition, if you act persistently remote follow against user's intention, there is a possibility that the instance itself is blocked.

    GBTDNã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³(ä»¥ä¸‹åˆ¥ã‚¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚¦ã§é–‹ãã¾ã™)

    â– ç™»éŒ²æƒ…å ±ã®å–ã‚Šæ‰±ã„ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    â– ãƒ“ã‚¸ãƒã‚¹ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ”¿æ²»çµŒæ¸ˆãƒ»ç¤¾ä¼šå•é¡Œã«ã¤ã„ã¦æƒ…å ±ç™ºä¿¡ã‚’è¡Œã†ã“ã¨ã‚’ç›®çš„ã¨ã—ãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã€‚åˆ©ç”¨è€…ã®è‡ªç”±ãªç™ºè¨€ã‚’æ”¯æ´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    An instance for freely discussion about politics, economics and other social issues in Japan.

    ä¸‰å¤§æ–¹é‡æ¤œé–²ã‚’ã—ãªã„æƒ…å ±ã‚’ç‹¬å ã—ãªã„åˆ©ç”¨è€…ã®è‡ªç”±ã‚’å°Šé‡ã™ã‚‹å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ã„ã‚ã‚†ã‚‹ã€Œã‚»ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒã‚¾ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã€ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¯é•æ³•ãƒ»æœ‰å®³æƒ…å ±ãŠã‚ˆã³ã‚¹ãƒ‘ãƒ æŠ•ç¨¿ã®å¯¾å‡¦ã«åŠªã‚ã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã‚Œä»¥å¤–ã®å•é¡Œã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã®åˆ¤æ–­ã«ä»»ã›ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼æƒ…å ±å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯æ—¥æœ¬ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã§ç®¡ç†ãƒ»é‹å–¶ã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚é€£çµ¡å…ˆè‡ªèº«ã®æ¨©åˆ©ä¾µå®³æƒ…å ±ã«ã¤ã„ã¦å‰Šé™¤ãƒ»ç™ºä¿¡è€…æƒ…å ±é–‹ç¤ºè«‹æ±‚ã‚’è¡Œã†å ´åˆã¯info@mevo.xyzã«é€£çµ¡ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚æ—¥æœ¬å›½ã®æ³•ä»¤ã«å‰‡ã£ã¦å¯¾å¿œã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰GitHub

    mastodon.notwebsite.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Not Mastodon

    Users: 94 . Toots: 94 . Connections: 215 . Language: English

    Just another Mastodon instance. This one is run by exnilio , a software consultancy run by a goofball named Vinney Cavallo . Enjoy!

    We don't have too many rules here. As long as content isn't impeding the mechanical usage of the instance (say, excessive spam) or illegal relative to whatever local laws apply, then it's allowed. This is not a safe space. That said, we reserve the right to change this policy at any time. I considered making every single user an admin, but that probably would break the site (I still sort of want to do it).

    Email: vinney.not_admin@exnil.io

    Admin: @not_admin@mastodon.notwebsite.com

    social.csswg.org

    about

    preview

    join

    W3C CSS Working Group Mastodon

    Users: 115 . Toots: 95 . Connections: 309 . Language: English

    Mastodon server for anyone interested in CSS or general web development

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.csswg.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: csswg@csswg.org

    Admin: @csswg@social.csswg.org

    tootplanet.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Toot Planet

    Users: 43 . Toots: 11292 . Connections: 590 . Language: English

    Help keep Toot Planet running! https://cash.me/$tootplanet
    We're a (lightly?) moderated community; harassment is not tolerated, and doing nothing but self-promotion or advertising is frowned on.
    Other than that, we welcome anyone who wants to come join and whatever language you speak! Anyone who creates - writing, drawing, game devs, crafting, you name it - is especially welcome, since we all do that kind of thing already. By a similar token, we are also a queer- and kink-friendly planet.
    Special thanks to @Daily@tootplanet.space for doing the Tooting Planet art, and to @catterfly@tootplanet.space for letting me make a background out of their awesome planet art.

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    TL;DR: No bots, no harassment, don't be an asshole.

    No Automated Accounts

    Don't: If you want to run an automated bot account, there are other instances that will much better suit your needs. We're aiming for a community of people, here, not a community of Markov chains.

    Do: Hooking your account here up to whatever site you share your work on - WordPress, Patreon, tumblr, etc. is totally okay! Automated toots linking to your posts are fine, as long as they aren't continually reposting it.

    No Parody Accounts

    Don't: If you want to make a joke account impersonating someone, there are other instances. This is not the one.

    Do: Fictional character accounts are okay, but should be labelled such in their bio.

    No Harassment

    Don't: Continually tooting at someone who has asked you to stop, continuing a conversation despite the other person trying to bow out, threats, unwanted insults, and hate speech all constitute harassment. Any of these things can (and will!) get you banned.

    Do: If you want to trash talk with your friends, that's A-OK.

    Be Considerate

    Don't: Posting inflammatory content, deliberately refusing to use content warnings or NSFW flags on anything that would reasonably be expected to upset or offend people, continuing offensive behavior even after being requested by an admin or moderator to stop, and generally being a complete asshole is in fact a bannable offense.

    Do: Post anything you want - within the legal limitations of the United States of America and your own location of residence - BEHIND an informative content warning or NSFW tag.

    Reportable Offenses

    This section covers what is permitted in the Federation, and what you can report to have silenced.

    No Automated Accounts

    I know, I know, this is the same heading. Following bot accounts is perfectly fine, but if you see any bots posting to the Federation, go ahead and report them. The official policy on regular bot accounts is to silence them; follow-bots are suspended with prejudice.

    Anything failing the "Be Considerate" rule.

    Especially illegal or untagged graphic content. If you're unsure if you should report it, please do. This includes all forms of hate speech and harassment, whether targetted at a person on Toot Planet or not. Accounts with illegal content will be suspended.

    Accounts with hate speech or harassment of remote accounts will be silenced. Accounts aiming any of these things at members of Toot Planet will be suspended. If members from a particular instance violate these rules often or severely enough, the instance will be silenced.

    Blocked Instances

    pawoo.net - silence, no media (legality issues)

    shitposter.club - suspend (encourages harassment)

    sealion.club - suspend (encourages harassment)

    freezepeach.xyz - suspend (encourages harassment)

    rainbowdash.net - suspend (encourages harassment)

    social.heldscal.la - suspend (encourages harassment) unsafe.space - suspend (encourages harassment)

    Email: admin@tootplanet.space

    Admin: @InspectorCaracal@tootplanet.space

    infinimatix.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Infinimatix

    Users: 59 . Toots: 381 . Connections: 421 . Language: English

    Infinimatix, coined by blending infinity and informatics , is a community of interest in informatics with a federated node in the Mastodon fediverse. The topics of informatics that we are interested in are mainly big data, data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, deep learning, data mining, information systems, cyber security, web design, web development, web performance optimization, human-computer interaction, user experience design, and so on. Reach out to @derekcecillewis if you'd like to have an appropriate discipline added to the list.

    Contact

    Derek Lewis

    @derekcecillewis

    Email: derlewis@iu.edu

    Admin: @derekcecillewis@infinimatix.net

    Things we will delete are:

    • threats and harassment
    • other antisocial behavior, at our discretion

    die Gratzhurksen sind heute

    wie Hundemurzen durch Lochexkursion.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankermÃ¶rteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Summelnder wÃ¼rgfratzelnder Schnapperzaff haut sie mit Rotfurzen.

    Oh Kraukenstachel,

    wie toll du hodenquarzelst

    mit deinen Onusticken.

    Stricken tust du Atzekra

    in Donnerponus dank Freutzelgebein.

    Wir blommsen dich in UrgesÃ¶ffel

    mit unseren Onusticken,

    auf das du wÃ¼rgejacheln kannst.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff ist unser

    Knochensturz und krasselnder Dumpfponus.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankermÃ¶rteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Dein Onusticken ist fÃ¼r uns wie

    Blommsgedeihe auf Atzekra.

    Wenn nicht werden wir dich blommsen

    mit unseren Rotzelquarzen.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff, warts nur ab!

    qwerty.city

    about

    preview

    join

    Qwerty City

    Users: 1 . Toots: 74 . Connections: 349 . Language: English

    take me down to Qwerty City \
    where the tyuiop is asdfgh \
    and the ghjkl are zxcvbn

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    Bots and automated accounts

    Automated accounts (â€œbotsâ€) should follow these guidelines:

    Bots should include, in their user information, an indication that they are automated.

    Bots should include, in their user information, a link to their creator. This may be an account on mastodon.social, an account on another Mastodon instance, or a link to a method by which mastodon.social moderators and administrators can easily contact the owner of the bot.

    In most circumstances, bots should be limited to Unlisted posts. Consider carefully whether you want your botâ€™s posts to appear on the public timeline.

    Minor transgressions

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    Major transgressions

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Automatic suspension

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Harassment

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Moderators

    The following Mastodon.Social community moderators will follow our moderation protocol while ensuring the above guidelines are respected:

    @CM_chrismartin

    @CM_eramdam

    @CM_noelle

    @CM_rushyo

    Email: cwm@posteo.net

    Admin: @cwm@qwerty.city

    For the sake of the admins' sanities, registration is not open.

    Be cautious in what you emit, and gracious in what you accept.

    Also, play nice.

    mastodon.expert

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 46 . Toots: 224 . Connections: 386 . Language: English

    General, fast, stable and open instance.
    Federate with everyone
    Dedicated to the tech experts, but everyone is welcome!
    Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    More Info... English version below, this instance is motsly french speaking.

    Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires.

    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.

    Les comptes parodiques sont tolÃ©rÃ©s Ã  condition de signaler qu'ils le sont dans leur description.

    Tous les contenus sont tolÃ©rÃ©s dans la limite de la lÃ©galitÃ©, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus inadaptÃ©s au public mineur ou nsfw.

    N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  signaler tout message ne respectant pas les rÃ¨gles.

    Toute personne ne respectant pas les rÃ¨gles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

    Compliance with the law and respect of other users are mandatory.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited.

    Parody account are allowed as long as their parodic status is clearly indicated in their description.

    Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents.

    Feel free to report any message that do not follow the rules.

    Any user who breaks the rules may get suspended without warning.

    Email: contact@mastodon.expert

    Admin: @mastodon.expert

    computerfairi.es

    about

    preview

    join

    Computer Fairies

    Users: 114 . Toots: 10054 . Connections: 648 . Language: English

    Computer Fairies is a Mastodon instance that aims to be as queer, friendly and furry as possible. We welcome all kinds of computer fairies!
    We are very new at this, so please bear with us!
    Mascot art by @blackle

    More Info... Guidelines:

    We (the admins) will not tolerate any sort of discrimination

    Basically, don't be a jerk and you'll be ok

    We reserve the right to remove anyone from this instance for being a jerk at our discretion, after fair warning depending on the case.

    table {

    color: #fac;

    }

    th {

    font-weight: bold;

    }

    th, td {

    padding: 3px;

    }

    tr:nth-child(even) {

    background: #ffaacc33;

    }

    Blocked Instances

    All blocked instances have media blocks regardless of block type.

    GNU Social instances are blocked due to a majority of them openly harrassing people, associations with 4chan, and incompatibilities with Mastodon's post privacy settings.

    Last updated 08/05/2017

    Domain

    Block

    Reason

    social.heldscal.la

    Suspend

    GNU Social instance, harrassment

    sealion.club

    Suspend

    GNU Social instance

    gs.kawa-kun.com

    GNU Social instance

    Lolicon

    GNU Social instance, harrassment under guise of "free speech"

    social.au2pb.net

    Suspend

    GNU Social instance

    gorf.club

    Suspend

    GNU Social instance

    gs.smuglo.li

    Suspend

    GNU Social instance, lolicon

    unsafe.space

    Suspend

    wrongthink.net

    noagendasocial.com

    More Info...

    å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã€å›½å†…æ³•ã«åã™ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿ã€çŠ¯ç½ªã«åŠ æ‹…ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªæŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ãŠã‚„ã‚ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    Mastodonã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®ç‰¹æ€§ä¸Šã€ä»–ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã§ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆæƒ…å ±ã‚’ä½¿ã„ã¾ã‚ã™ã“ã¨ã¯æ¥µåŠ›ãŠæ§ãˆä¸‹ã•ã„

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯å€‹äººãŒé‹ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚é¯–ã®æ°¸ç¶šæ€§ã¯ä¿è¨¼ã§ããªã„ç‚¹ã«ã”å®¹èµ¦ä¸‹ã•ã„

    æ¥½ã—ã‚“ã§è¡Œã£ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ï¼

    ä½œè€…: ã†ã©ã‚“ã•ã‚“ ( @hiyaudon )

    Enty

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ã€ç®¡ç†äººï¼ˆ @admin ï¼‰ã®ç§è²»ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šé‹ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    å¯„ä»˜ã‚’é ‚ãã“ã¨ã§ã€ã‚ˆã‚Šæ°¸ãã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’é‹ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒå¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ã”æ¤œè¨é ‚ã‘ã‚Œã°å¹¸ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    å¯„ä»˜ã‚’é ‚ã„ãŸæ–¹ã«ã¯ã€ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¸ã®ãŠåå‰æ²è¼‰ã‚„ã€ãã®ä»–ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¸ã®å°ç·šã€ãƒ¬ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®é–²è¦§ã€å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½é€£æºç­‰ã‚’è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Email: hari_sabo_bouzu@hotmail.com

    witches.academy

    about

    preview

    join

    Witches.Academy

    Users: 31 . Toots: 688 . Connections: 326 . Language: English

    Welcome to Witches Academy

    Admins

    Currently, the Admin are @spiderrobotpig and @ashkitten

    We are working together to keep the site up, and updated.

    We are a rather laid back community. However, as a note, there are several things that will not be tolerated here:

    • Harassment in any form
    • Anything resembling White Supremacy
    • Anyone defending White Supremacy
    • In general, awful behaviour
    • Ableism
    • Transmisia
    • Homomisia
    • Bigotry in general

    Basically, if you are a Nazi, TERF, or a sympathizer for either, you're gonna get banned.

    This is a very SJW friendly-Instance

    Don't let us down, witches.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of witches.academy; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: me@anjaghraves.com

    Admin: @spiderrobotpig@witches.academy

    sdfn-01.ninjawedding.org

    about

    preview

    join

    sdfn-01.ninjawedding.org

    Users: 1 . Toots: 507 . Connections: 424 . Language: English

    This is a small ship in the fediverse.

    The name is borrowed from the mass-produced Macross-class ships in the Macross universe; SDFN-01 Hayase was the first of the line. The ships were designed to scout emigration routes ahead of the Megaroad colonization ship.

    More information can be found at the Macross Compendium .

    Contact

    Business e-mail:

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    GGTea - Mastodon

    Users: 7 . Toots: 1945 . Connections: 712 . Language: Japanese

    ggtea.orgã®äººã®ã»ã¼å€‹äººç”¨ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™

    ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®ç¶™ç¶šæ€§ãã®ä»–ã¯ç®¡ç†äººãŒç®¡ç†å‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ç¯„å›²ã§å‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™

    • ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã®ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯éšæ™‚è¡Œãªã†å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã§ãã‚‹ã ã‘èµ·ã“ã‚‰ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã™ãŒãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹ã®çµæœãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒæ¶ˆãˆã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã¯å½“ç„¶ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    • ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒå†…ã®æ¯”è¼ƒçš„å¤ã„éå»ã®ç”»åƒãªã©ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯æ¶ˆã—ã¦ã„ãå¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒé«˜ã„ã§ã™ã€‚
    • ãã®ä»–æƒ³å®šå¤–ã®äº‹è±¡ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ã¯å¸¸è­˜çš„ã«è€ƒãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹æ–¹å‘ã«ãƒ™ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒˆã§å¯¾å¿œã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

    é€£çµ¡å…ˆ

    ç¥æ¥½å‚ã—ãˆã‚‹

    @Clworld

    ãƒ“ã‚¸ãƒã‚¹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹:
