    nrd.li

    about

    preview

    join

    nrd.li

    Users: 49 . Toots: 2208 . Connections: 781 . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for nerds. If you're passionate about something you're welcome here.

    More Info... Rules

    ğŸ¤– Bots welcome, if they aren't bad ğŸ’©

    ğŸ˜‡ Be good to each other

    ğŸ“ƒ Report things that are illegal. They will be removed and/or muted.

    ğŸ™Š If you harass users on other instances-- which is to say if you knowingly post content against the ToS of their instance to them-- action will be taken against you on this instance to protect our federation status. In extreme cases knowledge of an instances rules will not be necessary for action to be taken.

    Ultimately this instance aims to be as permissive as possible, while preserving federation with as many nodes as possible. In the interest of openness all administrative actions taken will be announced by a bot user on this instance (to be created when necessary).

    Actual terms of service to come when/if necessary.

    Blocks

    Blocking another instance from federating is, essentially, the nuclear option. I won't say that I will never block an instance, but I hope I never have to. I hope that we can judge people by their interactions with us, instead of where they have the misfortune of registering their account.

    If there is abuse, harassment, discrimination, or general prolonged unkindness from an individual, please report them and they will be silenced. Extreme cases, or people who have a pattern of bad behavior may be suspended. Send reports to @terribleplan@nrd.li

    Free speech is a right that the government cannot infringe upon. It is an important way to spread information however unpopular, hated, misguided, or plain wrong it may be. Luckily I am not the government, and I can choose who can speak (everyone by default), and who cannot on this small corner of the web I run and pay for.

    If there comes to be a democratic blocking system we may subscribe to it, or use it as a source of users to block at our own discretion. We will also report users that we block to such a service.

    Privacy

    This server is hosted in the United States by a US Citizen, and as such is subject to US Law. Any posts that are against the law will be removed and possibly reported to the relevant authorities.

    There is nothing special being done to track users, but the server does keep some logs and other potentially identifying information, including the IP address accessing the site, for abuse detection and statistical reasons. This information is not shared except as required by law.

    Email: kegan@keganmyers.com

    Admin: @terribleplan@nrd.li

    VOCALOMAKETS

    Users: 115 . Toots: 468 . Connections: 78 . Language: English

    ã€Œçµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã€ã‚’ä¼ç”»ã—ãŸãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pé›†å›£ã€ŒVOCALOMAKETSã€ãŒé‹å–¶ã™ã‚‹Mastodonã§ã™ã€‚ã€Œçµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã€ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹æƒ…å ±ç™ºä¿¡ãƒ»æƒ…å ±äº¤æ›ãƒ»äº¤æµãªã©ã‚’ç›®çš„ã¨ã—ã¦ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

    â€» ç™»éŒ²ã®ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«æŒ¯ã‚Šåˆ†ã‘ã‚‰ã‚Œãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€Œvocalomakets.jpã€ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®å—ä¿¡ã‚’è¨±å¯ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    More Info... ãŠæ–­ã‚Š

    ä¸»ãªç›®çš„ã¯ã€Œçµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã€ã‚’ä¸­å¿ƒã«å…¬å¼ã‹ã‚‰ã®æƒ…å ±ç™ºä¿¡ã€çš†æ§˜ã‹ã‚‰ã®ã”æ„è¦‹ã‚„æƒ…å ±ã®åé›†ã€ãã—ã¦äº¤æµã®å ´ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã‚Œã°ã¨è€ƒãˆã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    18ç¦ã«ãªã‚Šãã†ãªå†…å®¹ã«ã¯ã€ŒContent Warningã€ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ã€ç”»åƒã«ã¯ã€ŒNSFWã€ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    ä¸Šè¨˜å†…å®¹ã¯äºˆå‘Šãªãå¤‰æ›´ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã“ã¨ã‚’ã”äº†æ‰¿ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°æ—¥ï¼š2017å¹´04æœˆ27æ—¥ï¼‰

    çµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    7åã®ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pé›†å›£ã€ŒVOCALOMAKETSã€ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ä¼ç”»ã€æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾AHSã«ã‚ˆã‚‹åˆ¶ä½œãƒ»è²©å£²ã§ç”Ÿã¾ã‚ŒãŸéŸ³å£°åˆæˆã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚ã—ã£ã‹ã‚Šã¨ã—ãŸãã‚Œã„ãªæ­Œå£°ã‚’æŒã¤å¥³æ€§ã‚’ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«è£½ä½œã—ãŸã€ŒVOCALOID4 çµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã€ã€å¤§äººã®å¥³æ€§ã®æƒ…æ„Ÿã‚ãµã‚Œã‚‹å£°ã‚’ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¨ã—ãŸå…¥åŠ›æ–‡å­—èª­ã¿ä¸Šã’ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã€ŒVOICEROID2 çµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã€ã€è¿½åŠ éŸ³å£°ã®ã€ŒexVOICEã€ã¨ãƒãƒªã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³è±Šã‹ãªãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    VOCALOID4ã€€çµæœˆã‚†ã‹ã‚Šï½œè£½å“æƒ…å ±ï½œAHS(AH-Software)

    • æ³•å¾‹ã¯å®ˆã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼çŠ¯ç½ªã«åŠ æ‹…ã—ã¦ã„ãã†ã ã£ãŸã‚Šï¼Œæ—¥æœ¬æ³•ã«æŠµè§¦ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ï¼æœ€æ‚ªè­¦å¯Ÿã‚„è£åˆ¤æ‰€ã®è¦è«‹ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’é–‹ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼

    kitty.town

    about

    preview

    join

    Kitty.Town

    Users: 91 . Toots: 6291 . Connections: 520 . Language: English

    Kitty.Town is a small Mastodon instance for kind people. We are a creator-friendly community and residents are free to post about their work and ask for support as long as it stays within our Code of Conduct .

    Your choice of instance is an important one and we ask that you think on it carefully before making a decision.

    Please read over the Code of Conduct (located on the Extended Information page) before signing up.

    If our rules do not suit your needs, there are many instances to choose from here: instances.mastodon.xyz

    Thank you!

    You can help support Kitty.Town on Patreon , via Paypal , or by bitcoin donation (bitcoin:18ocF6gao55WNsTaFrrKKU1A4ax7xNM42m).

    You can find Kitty.Town items for sale in our shop .

    Follow @Katya (our town mascot) for updates and support for Kitty.Town.

    List of blocked domains.

    Kitty.Town logo/art by Reimena Yee

    More Info...

    As a resident (user) of Kitty.Town, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from Kitty.Town. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Mayor (Admin).

    Post Etiquette:

    We ask that you put the following topics behind a content warning (CW) and/or NSFW (you currently must tag any images you don't want immediately visible as NSFW, CW will not cover your images):

    â€¢politics

    â€¢graphic violence or gore

    â€¢sexual content

    â€¢spoilers

    â€¢hate topics (racism/sexism/homophobia/transphobia/etc)

    â€¢depression/suicide/mental health

    â€¢flashing video/gifs

    â€¢drug/alcohol use

    â€¢food/diet/weight

    â€¢medical

    â€¢religion

    When in doubt, CW. Our goal is to create a space where we are not overwhelmed by negative posts or bombarded by the 24 hour news cycle.

    No-Nos:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

    â€¢Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Mayor)

    â€¢Plagiarism (see definition)

    â€¢Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    â€¢Untagged gore and graphic violence

    â€¢Racism or advocation of racism

    â€¢Sexism or advocation of sexism

    â€¢Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    â€¢Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

    â€¢Sexual depictions of children

    â€¢Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    â€¢Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    â€¢Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from Kitty.Town.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    â€¢Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    â€¢Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    â€¢Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    â€¢Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    â€¢Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on Kitty.Town and to public spaces when an individual is representing Kitty.Town or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Mayor (Admin) reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to Kitty.Town, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: kittytownmail@gmail.com

    Admin: @GinnyMcQueen@kitty.town

    BOMUCHADON

    Users: 2 . Toots: 56 . Connections: 130 . Language: Japanese

    BOMUCHAã®ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ¼ãƒˆMASTODONã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚è©¦é¨“é‹ç”¨ä¸­ã§ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ¼ãƒˆãªMASTODONã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚ã„ã‚ã„ã‚è¨­å®šã‚’ã„ã¢ã‚Šã¤ã¤ã€æŒ™å‹•ã‚’ç¢ºã‹ã‚ãŸã‚Šã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    social.allthefallen.ninja

    about

    All The Fallen

    Users: 215 . Toots: 848 . Connections: 132 . Language: English

    Welcome, We allow all kinds of Loli and Shota posts and try not to silence people. You don't have to select nude images as NSFW, the NSFW button will be mostly used for Gore and similar stuff.

    The reason why the accounts aren't linked with the ATF Forum is that we do not wish to force people to register to the forum just to use this. This may move to its own Domain if it turns out to become rather popular.

    Email: admin@allthefallen.ninja

    Admin: @Iratu@social.allthefallen.ninja

    freeradical.zone

    about

    preview

    join

    Free Radical

    Users: 75 . Toots: 3043 . Connections: 788 . Language: English

    Free Radical is our social media haven. It's where we talk in an inviting, respectful setting where we can set our own boundaries. We'd love for you to join us!

    Read about our adventures on the Free Radical Blog .

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    Prior art

    Mastodon.social guidelines

    JSConf Code of Conduct

    Toot CafÃ© guidelines

    The short version

    Donâ€™t harass anyone

    If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator

    Have fun

    Be excellent to each other

    Moderators

    @tek

    Blocked instances

    We block some other instances. The full list is on GitHub. Contact a moderator if you wish to dispute an entry.

    Rules

    No advertising or excessive promotion

    No bots, unless theyâ€™re cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.

    No gore or graphic violence

    Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)

    No racism

    No sexism

    No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin

    No xenophobia or violent nationalism

    No sexual depictions of children

    No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union

    No stalking or harassment

    No fake accounts unless they are clearly labeled as such

    Handling harassment

    If you are being harassed, please report the user using the â€œâ€¦â€ button and then â€œReport.â€ For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator.

    If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

    The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderatorsâ€™ judgment.

    Privacy policy

    What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You wonâ€™t; brands and non-humans (other than fun/useful bots) are banned. How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your serviceâ€¦ none of that.

    We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. (Hopefully it wonâ€™t come to that!)

    Understand though that this instance is run by me and my friends, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) we potentially have access to your data, including DMs. The back-end is also not encrypted. If this is not okay with you, this might not be the instance for you.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no E2E encryption. So use Signal or WhatsApp for the things you really want to be private.

    More privacy measures on Free Radical:

    Our robots.txt file asks crawlers not to explore the site.

    HTTPS is used everywhere thanks to Letâ€™s Encrypt.

    No ads or trackers.

    Links are direct URLs rather than tracking redirects.

    Discussion and feedback

    For questions about policy, bots, design, theming, etc., please open an issue.

    About this server

    Free Radical is a Digital Ocean droplet in San Francisco. Itâ€™s maintained by Kirk Strauser. Thanks for visiting!

    Email: tek@freeradical.zone

    Admin: @tek@freeradical.zone

    ã‚ªãƒ•ä¼šå‹Ÿé›†å°‚ç”¨ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    åˆã‚ã¦ã®æ–¹ã¯ã¨ã‚Šã‚ãˆãšé€£åˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚’é–‹ã„ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ã‚ªã‚¹ã‚¹ãƒ¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    å‹Ÿé›†ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ï¼Ÿ
    ã€Œæ–°å®¿äºŒäººã€ãªã©ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã«æ”¾æµã—ã¦ãŠã‘ã°DMãŒé£›ã‚“ã§ãã¾ã™ã®ã§å„è‡ªé€£çµ¡ã‚’å–ã‚Šåˆæµã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
    å‚åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ï¼Ÿ
    ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ä¸Šã®å‹Ÿé›†ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ãƒ„ã‚¤ãƒ¼ãƒˆç”»é¢ä¸‹ã®åœ°çƒãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚’æŠ¼ã—ãƒ€ã‚¤ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆã«è¨­å®šã€ãƒªãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚’é€ã‚Šå‚åŠ ã‚’è¡¨æ˜ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
    ãƒ„ã‚¤ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®å…¬é–‹ç¯„å›²è¨­å®šã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
    ç„¡æ–™ãªã®ï¼Ÿ
    ç„¡æ–™ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã‚ªãƒ•ä¼šã©ã‚“ã£ã¦ï¼Ÿ

    ã‚ªãƒ•ä¼šå‹Ÿé›†å°‚ç”¨ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    çªç„¶ã§ãã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸä¼‘æ—¥ã«ã€ã‚¢ãƒ•ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ–ã®ä½™æš‡ã«ã€å‹é”ä½œã‚Šã«

    ã‚ˆãå‚åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ•ä¼šä¸»ã•ã‚“ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã—ãŸã‚Šã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“ã®ä¸­ã®ã¿ã§ã®ã‚ªãƒ•ä¼šã®å‹Ÿé›†ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚

    mastodon.me.uk

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.me.uk

    Users: 129 . Toots: 1182 . Connections: 666 . Language: English

    A Mastodon/OSocial server for users in the UK. Originally intended for the tech community, but open to anyone! As this is a volunteer-run server maintained by @floppy , users are required to abide by the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct - if you don't like it, there are plenty of other instances you can use.

    More Info... Bot Policy

    Bots are tentatively allowed on this server as long as they are useful, interesting, or amusing. Bots that post excessively, that simply boost or link other posts, that just follow other users, or that produce badly-formed output will be suspended. Contact the admins if you have a problem. Yes, we know it's vague.

    Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

    Our Pledge

    In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as

    contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and

    our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body

    size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience,

    nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and

    orientation.

    Our Standards

    Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment

    include:

    Using welcoming and inclusive language

    Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences

    Gracefully accepting constructive criticism

    Focusing on what is best for the community

    Showing empathy towards other community members

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances

    Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks

    Public or private harassment

    Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission

    Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

    Our Responsibilities

    Server maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable

    behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in

    response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

    Server maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or

    reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions

    that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or

    permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate,

    threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    Scope

    This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces

    when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of

    representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail

    address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed

    representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be

    further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

    Enforcement

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be

    reported by contacting the maintainer at @floppy. All

    complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that

    is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is

    obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

    Server maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good

    faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other

    members of the project's leadership.

    Attribution

    This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4.

    Email: james@floppy.org.uk

    Admin: @Floppy@mastodon.me.uk

    Qowala's Mastodon

    Users: 5 . Toots: 261 . Connections: 479 . Language: English

    Welcome to Qowala's Mastodon instance!
    Here, we love open source and we study and work on social networks so naturally we also host a Mastodon instance.
    Friendly people are welcome, but as this is a small server, there are limited available slots. So, choose wisely to join or not.

    Mastodon - General Social Network

    Users: 38 . Toots: 113 . Connections: 185 . Language: English

    Developed, uploaded and published by Chew Jian Yue on 14th April 2017. Maintained by the community and Chew Jian Yue, hosted in collaboration with Reveal.Today

    Federate this instance!

    Start federating and remote following @owl

    This instance is hosted in Seattle, US.

    This is a General Purpose Social Network instance.

    Although I don't live in Seattle, I am hosting it there because I want this instance to be more global and reach out to other parts of the world.

    Donate

    I need donations to keep this server running and to upgrade the server to accommodate more users and traffic. Donate $5

    preview

    join

    ãƒ‘ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒ©ãƒ–

    Users: 28 . Toots: 705 . Connections: 330 . Language: English

    ã‚†ã‚‹ãƒ¼ãç¹‹ãŒã‚ŠãŸã„ã€‚ãã‚“ãªã‚ãªãŸã«ã‚ªã‚¹ã‚¹ãƒ¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã¯ãƒã‚¹ã®æ™‚åˆ»è¡¨ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚†ã£ãŸã‚Šã§ã™ã€‚
    ã„ã¤ã§ã‚‚ã©ã“ã§ã‚‚ã€ãƒ‘ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã—ãŸããªã£ãŸã‚‰ã€ãƒ‘ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒ©ãƒ–ã«è¡Œã£ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã€‚
    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯è‡ªå®…ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã§é‹ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚äºˆå‘Šãªãã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®åœæ­¢ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã”äº†æ‰¿ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    social.collabora.digital

    A tech savvy Mastodon

    Users: 5 . Toots: 81 . Connections: 309 . Language: English

    Just another Pachyderm trying to fly like a bird.
    Feel free to sign up if you'd like to join conversations about IT, Open Source, Linux, various and miscellaneous.
    Mastodon instance supported by Omnis Systems Ltd a fine purveyor of Open Source and Linux based solutions to modern & dynamic organisations.

    Things may break while we are testing and/or updating this Mastodon instance. People will be kicked out from this instance if they misbehave.If you feel that any post may have hurt your feeling then stop reading it.If posts can/are considered indecent, inappropriate and/or illegal in UK or EU please do report them and actions will be taken ASAP.

    Email: paolo@collabora.digital

    Admin: @paolo@social.collabora.digital

    More Info...

    Cette instance et alternatives

    Ici, vous pourrez obtenir un compte au format "@PSEUDO@ponyfrance.net". Vous pouvez rejoindre n'importe quel instance ouverte et suivre les utilisateurs des autres sites. Une liste est disponible ici.

    RÃ¨gles de base

    Il va bien falloir instaurer quelques rÃ¨gles pour s'assurer que tout le monde puisse s'entendre. Sachez que l'expression qui va bien est Don't be a d*ck.

    En cas de problÃ¨mes, signalez les messages et comptes avec la fonction "Signaler..." dans le menu du message.

    Restez civil, respectez les autres personnes et leurs choix

    Evitez le flood et le spam

    Utilisez la fonction NSFW et les spoilers (bouton CW) si nÃ©cessaire, dans la limite des rá»gles

    Il n'est pas permi de poster...

    De la pornographie, y compris en dessin (la nuditÃ©e est permise, mais NSFW + CW)

    Du contenu gore, vore, homophobe et xÃ©nophobe

    La description du compte doit faire mention qu'il s'agit d'un compte parodique

    Users: 24 . Toots: 2214 . Connections: 663 . Language: English

    Ce service est fourni Ã  titre de courtoisie et absolument sans garantie.
    Je vous promets d'essayer de faire les choses bien et d'assurer une certaine stabilitÃ© du service (Ã  laquelle j'ai tout intÃ©rÃªt, car je l'utilise), mais n'attendez pas un support pro, je fais Ã§a juste pour le fun ;)
    Les rÃ¨gles de la modÃ©ration sont ici : https://pouet.yolops.net/about/more

    More Info... Cette instance est un endroit de libre-expression.

    Comme celle-ci doit malheureusement connaÃ®tre des limites, il est bon de les Ã©noncer.

    Voici ce que je n'admet pas en tant qu'administrateur de l'instance :

    -le racisme

    -le sexisme

    -la LGBTphobie

    -l'humiliation

    -l'appel Ã  la haine

    -le harcÃ¨lement

    -la volontÃ© de nuire Ã  l'autre

    -la pÃ©dopornographie

    Ã‡a n'est pas exhaustif ni figÃ©, mais c'est pour bien comprendre les valeurs en jeu ici.

    La personne qui fait Ã§a, de maniÃ¨re non Ã©quivoque, c'est un ban direct.

    Pour le reste, vous pouvez poster du porn, de la religion ou du steak tartare, en CW ou pas, je m'en balance.

    Ce sont vos valeurs morales, elles ne concernent que vous et vos interlocuteurs, s'ils veulent vous bloquer, qu'ils le fassent eux-mÃªmes. Si vous voulez vous censurer c'est pareil, je ne le ferai pas Ã  votre place.

    Enfin, Mastodon permet de bloquer au niveau de l'instance mÃªme, des utilisateurs d'autres instances, voire une instance entiÃ¨re.

    Ce pouvoir est particuliÃ¨rement lourd, voici donc la liste exhaustive des blocages en cours de maniÃ¨re globale Ã  l'instance :

    - utilisateur : @jpney@masto.themimitoof.fr

    - instance : https://pawoo.net/ (silence + no media caching : les toots ne s'afficheront pas dans la federated timeline, mais vous pouvez suivre des utilisateurs de cette instance) Ce service est hÃ©bergÃ© en Allemagne, les rÃ¨gles s'appliquant en termes de contenu et de gestion des donnÃ©es privÃ©es sont donc celles de ce pays.

    Email: mastodon-dek@iono.me

    scalie.club

    about

    preview

    join

    scalie.club

    Users: 2 . Toots: 85 . Connections: 144 . Language: English

    Scalie.club is a tiny, gentle instance of mastodon.social, a free, open-source social network! Registered primarily for Lobst and their amazing friends, this instance promises to deliver only the highest-quality posts directly to your desktop. Kobolds welcome!

    More Info... Server Rules:

    - This server is invite-only; for the time being, registrations will not be made public. Invites are limited to mutuals of @Lobst only (on Mastodon, Twitter, or Tumblr, generally).

    - There is a Discord server with many of the same rules. Much like scalie.club itself, invites are limited to mutuals.

    Code of Conduct:

    These are informal guidelines, and not a legal document. Interpretation is up to the scalie.club administrators. These guidelines are here to give you a general idea of what content is or is not allowed on this instance.

    - Treat others with respect, and be respectful in kind. Know where the boundaries are for those you interact with. If you accidentally cross them, retreat and apologize.

    - Harassment is not tolerated. Harassment campaigns may not be spread here; this includes doxxing and dogpiling. If you must call someone out, do it elsewhere and link it here.

    - Sexism, racism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and other forms of systemic abuse are not tolerated.

    - When it comes to defining what constitutes "systemic abuse", the opinions of the marginalized are given priority at all times.

    - This also applies to microaggressions (like intentional misgendering), "ironic" use of racist language, and other dogwhistles.

    - Holocaust denial or support for the National Socialist party will result in an immediate ban.

    - Sexually explicit images are allowed (encouraged, even!), but they must be behind content warnings and properly tagged. The same goes for discussions of sex.

    - All sexually explicit images must exclusively involve consent-capable adults. ("Consent-capable": If asked whether they'd like to pose for an adult photo, they would be capable of responding "yes", and that "yes" would be able to stand up in court of law.)

    - All other potentially upsetting content must be properly tagged: this includes discussions of politics, violence, rape, and bigotry. (No faces of famous politicians, please.)

    - Bad-faith interpretations of any of the above rules will not be tolerated.

    The administration of this website reserves the right to revoke any user's access without warning, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: tarah@lobstworks.com

    Admin: @scalie.club

    forum.manga.tokyo

    about

    preview

    join

    Forum.MANGA.TOKYO

    Users: 243 . Toots: 702 . Connections: 41 . Language: English

    A community for fans of Japanese culture, such as anime, manga, voice actors and more, operated by MANGA.TOKYO through a mastodon instance. Anybody can participate in talks about the hottest topics and the newest anime information as well as find new friends and talk to people who have the same interests.

    How to make an account

    To use forum.manga.tokyo you must create an account.

    1. Fill in your username, e-mail address and password and click â€˜Get Startedâ€™.

    2. You will receive a confirmation e-mail, please confirm your account by clicking on the link in the e-mail.

    3. Log in via the Login page.

    That completes your registration.
    Let's have fun!!

    Forum Rules

    Use hashtags when talking about specific anime/manga etc
    Use the spoiler tag â€˜CWâ€™ for spoilers
    Respect others to create a place that everybody likes to return to.

    Note

    • Acts against the law are prohibited.
    • Do not infringe on the rights of others.
    • Do not copy or post the work of others without permission.
    • Do not act against public order or morals.
    • Do not impersonate other people or imitate organizations etc.
    • Do not cause hurt or loss in any form to other people
    • Do not overload the server with material

    â€» Please note that anything you write in your toots (posts) here may be quoted on MANGA.TOKYO

    Contact and Inquiries

    Twitter: @manga_tokyo_

    If you find we have infringed upon copyright, please contact us on the following address

    Mail: info.manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Terms of Use

    Privacy Policy

    Contact

    MANGA.TOKYO

    @mangatokyo

    Business e-mail:

    manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Email: manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Admin: @mangatokyo@forum.manga.tokyo

    mastodon.weaponvsac.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon OSR

    Users: 125 . Toots: 2389 . Connections: 332 . Language: English

    A moderated Mastodon instance for the RPG community.

    NSFW content is allowed, but public posts must use the Content Warning feature or be deleted .

    More information on Mastodon OSR and our Code of Conduct can be found here .

    The Mastodon User Guide can be found here .

    To report a policy violation, use the 'Report' feature as explained in the Mastodon User Guide, as well as send a private message to a site administrator.

    Site administrators at Mastodon OSR are:

    • The Discordian
    • neoanderthal

    More Info... This is a moderated server focused on the discussion of RPGs. We talk about RPGs in general and occasionally about the OSR subculture in particular, as well as game design, board games, and all of the other varied topics you can find on other Mastodon instances.

    Any moderation of content on this server is intended to foster better discourse. Disagreement and discord are fine, but being an asshole who drives out other voices is not.

    And, to be clear, we're going to lean towards being SJW Cucks in this.

    Code of Conduct

    Behaviors that will get you kicked out of here, no exceptions:

    Racism, sexism, transphobia, ultranationalism, or the advocation thereof

    Sexual depictions of children

    Any conduct intended or perceived to be stalking, harrassing, denial of service, or the incitement thereof

    Aggregation, posting, and/or dissemination of a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission, or the advocation thereof

    The following types of posts will be deleted from the public timeline. Unrepentant repeat offenders will be removed from the community:

    Any untagged sexually-explicit content

    Any untagged depictions of extreme violence or gore

    Excessive advertising

    Links or advocation for items, services, or behaviors considered illegal in the United States of America

    These provisions notwithstanding the administation of this service reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: mastodon@weaponvsac.space

    Admin: @neoanderthal@mastodon.weaponvsac.space

    mastodon.art

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.ART

    Users: 241 . Toots: 9130 . Connections: 807 . Language: English

    Mastodon.art â€” a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life.

    More Info... Mastodon.ART General Information

    Mastodon.ART is a separate & independent instance & is not affiliated with the Mastodon organization. The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Mastodon.ART; they are here to provide you with an insight into the site & moderation policies:

    Mastodon.ART'ists

    All content is â“’ each artist & cannot be distributed or used without prior permission by the respective Mastodon.ART artist.

    Mastodon.art doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal informationâ€”your information is never for sale.

    Artists, by using this site you understand that it is not a backup or permanent repository for your information, statuses or media â€” additionally, your media was downsized on original upload & is not exportable at this time upon transferring to new instance

    Artists, you may leave and join another instance at any time by exporting your follow list

    No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting

    Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying â€” your account will be immediately suspended

    Your admin & moderator is: @Curator

    We block or suspend other instances that do not adhere to our CoC

    Thank you for simply enjoying a creative community run by someone supporting The Arts.

    You may support the community by boosting & positively interacting with everyone.

    Mastodon.ART has a patreon if you'd like to support the running of YOUR Art community.

    Hosting Information

    Mastodon.ART uses 5 separate servers & is hosted professionally in Amsterdam on UpCloud & Compose.io in the EU with multiple daily backups

    Mastodon.ART Mastodon Server

    Mastodon.ART provides your amazing toot experience from a UpCloud intel Xeon 4-core with 4GB of ram cloud server.

    Mastodon.ART Mastodon Media

    Mastodon.ART (curate.mastodon.art) media uses a self-hosted medais server utilizing the FOSS opensource MINIO.io code to serve your images from a separate 4-core/4GB ram cloud server with multiple daily automatic backups.

    Mastodon.ART Databases

    2 separate compose.io databases (PostgreSQL & Redis) protect your statuses and timely pushing/retrieving of federated statuses with daily backups

    Mastodon.ART eMail Notifications

    All the emails you receive go through Mailgun's paid subscription service.

    Federation Policy and Terms of Use

    Federation serves as a browsing & temporary cached link to cited work here on Mastodon.ART

    Other instances may not disseminate others' work or toots without credit and proper licensing.

    Other instances may not use dumb code, machine learning or AI to analyze any derived text or work for publication or profit without Mastodon.ART user consent. This includes serving ads next to copyright content originally submitted on Mastodon.ART

    Public toots are derived works that are still copyright protected.

    This instance honors noindex/nofollow and search engines are not allowed to index.

    Your instance will be blocked/suspended or silenced for willingly allowing any of the content prohibited by this instance

    Mastodon.ART Code of Conduct

    Guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Mastodon.ART; they are here to provide you with an insight into the site & moderation policies:

    All users, local and remote, are expected to adhere to the following interaction principles:

    Posting work of others must be cited (or say artist/author unknown) after searching. Fair Use of copyright applies here.

    Respect boundaries as placed by others

    Be respectful/apologize if someone tells you that you cross a boundary accidentally

    Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary

    If you are on either side of this and are worried about the situation escalating, contact the admin or a mod

    Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and other such topics

    All users, local and remote, will be considered in the wrong in a conversation that goes sour if they participate in the following:

    Microaggressions ("not all men", white/man/cis-splaining, using the wrong pronouns to address someone after being corrected, etc)

    Demanding education on problematic behavior from a non-admin/moderator

    Skirting the lines of being a troll

    Not tagging potentially sensitive replies

    This is not an exhaustive list. If any of these don't make sense, please speak with an admin or moderator- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Advertising

    News bots that do not tag upsetting content

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: â€”

    Admin: @Curator@mastodon.art

    mastodon.fishing

    mst3k.interlinked.me

    about

    preview

    join

    Interlinked MST3K

    Users: 86 . Toots: 20772 . Connections: 643 . Language: English

    This is a Mastodon instance run by the interlinked.me IRC network, primarily geared towards (but not exclusively for) users of Interlinked. See this for a primer on Mastodon, what it is, and why it's so cool.

    More Info... We are a general-purpose community and anyone is welcome, as long as they follow the rules.

    The rules boil down to this: DON'T BE A DICK. The below serves as a more specific Code of Conduct.

    Code of conduct

    This is not a legal document.

    Nothing in this document is or should be construed as legal advice. We're not lawyers.

    Information

    These are our rules. Failure to adhere to this will result in warnings, silencing, or blocking.

    This site is moderated. This is not a free speech zone. There are other instances devoted to this if you disagree with our policies.

    Interpretation is entirely up to us.

    Remote users and instances are held to these standards and will be dealt with accordingly.

    Community guidelines should be construed as a base for these rules and interpreted with that frame of reference.

    We reserve the right to silence or ban anyone for any reason not in the rules, or to proactively do so.

    These rules apply not only to posts, but also to boosts, favourites, bios, or anything else that involves interaction with the site

    Banned forms of conduct

    These forms of conduct are not permitted and will result in the aforementioned sanctions:

    Excessive advertising, spam, or ham

    Irritating bots

    Stalking; harassing; threatening; or advocating any physical, sexual, or emotional harm against individuals or groups

    Promotion of extremely authoritarian forms of rule, including fascism and Stalinism

    Denial of documented genocides, pogroms, or purges

    Content that is prohibited in Germany, France, the European Union, or the United States of America

    Any sexual content featuring anyone under 18, including artistic depictions

    Patterns of extreme trolling

    Engaging in bad faith debate, or refusing to end debate if the other party wishes to

    Encouraging others to disregard this or other codes of conduct at other instances, or refusal to abide by the code of conduct of other instances (at our discretion)

    Attempts to prevent others from using this service, or degrading the quality or performance of it

    Unauthorised distribution of any personal information or data

    Circumventing any sanction, or sockpuppeting or meatpuppeting to circumvent a sanction

    Using sockpuppeting, meatpuppeting, or organising others to break the rules en masse

    Bots that do not respect the #nobot profile tag (following a user with such a tag in their profile)

    Abuse or misuse of the code of conduct, pursuing or grandstanding after an issue has been resolved to our satisfaction, pettifogging, or rule lawyering

    Registering accounts with inherently malicious intent

    Conduct filtered from the public timeline

    The following forms of conduct will be removed from the public timeline if seen:

    Astroturfing

    Bots that engage in promotion of news sources without permission

    Untagged gore, pornography, or other explicit content (use the NSFW tag)

    Patterns of excessive rudeness

    Links to pirated content, or instructions on how to commit piracy

    Propaganda, except for demonstration purposes

    Jingoism

    Political extremism not otherwise prohibited

    Advocating or promoting illegal acts

    Silenced, suspended, and media blocked instances

    We do not federate everywhere.

    We silence, suspend, and media block certain instances. For a list of such instances, brief summary of rationales, and what to do if you're on the list, see here.

    Other information

    Our AmbassadorBot can be found here.

    If you are an Interlinked user, you may be interested in this information on who's who.

    You can visit us at the Interlinked IRC network if you want to talk to us.

    Administration

    The patients in charge of this asylum are:

    Elizafox

    Mismagius

    luciferMysticus

    amrofnoc

    Alms to the poor

    If you like the service, consider donating to our Patreon.

    A big shout out to our Patreon supporters:

    Kyle Griesbach

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    masto.io

    about

    preview

    join

    Masto.io

    Users: 496 . Toots: 1413 . Connections: 897 . Language: English

    Small alternative Mastodon instance with a short name. Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    More Info...

    Contacts

    Fell free to contact me (through @sena@masto.io or sena@smux.net) for any instance related issue.

    Rules

    Here are the house rules:

    No harassing other people;

    No posting NSFW content or spoilers without using the Content Warning feature;

    No posting illegal content which can get you or me in trouble (this content will be removed if necessary, you may or may not be banned);

    Parody accounts are permitted (and encouraged!), but it's suggested (not required) that such is stated in the bio.

    Just be a good human beingâ„¢.

    Location and jurisdiction

    Currently, the infrastructure which supports this instance is hosted in the United States (Kansas City, Missouri), although there are medium term plans to migrate it to some European location.

    I am not based on the United States, so I may be more or less free from harassment from US law enforcement. Keep in mind that they should be able to shut the instance down and eavesdrop on communications and data without even warning me.

    Federation

    For transparency reasons,here's a list of instances we don't federate with:

    we currently don't block any instance

    Donations

    If you want to help with hosting costs, feel free to donate through:

    Bitcoin: 1ESdVqpycpQoXjdzjnW7Q9GpVr2ehT9mCy;

    PayPal: paypal.me/jsribeiro.

    Email: sena@smux.net

    Admin: @sena@masto.io

    swast.club

    Swast Club

    Users: 5 . Toots: 43 . Connections: 239 . Language: English

    The Swast Club is a Mastodon instance for friends and family of Tim & Alexandra Swast.

    If you don't know Tim or Alexandra, consider using another Mastodon instance .

    • Be kind to each other.
    • Do not post content that is illegal in the United States of America.

    These guidelines are not a legal document. The final say is up to @tim and @alexandra. We reserve the right to remove your account from this instance.

    Email: tswast@gmail.com

    Admin: @tim@swast.club

    capitalism.party

    Users: 15 . Toots: 119 . Connections: 440 . Language: English

    capitalism.party is a paid signup Mastodon instance funded directly by users purchasing accounts for just $5. An inexpensive alternative to free signup platforms, we impose direct economic cost on trolls who want to avoid blocks by creating many accounts. This instance will actively respond to any problematic users.

    We're still figuring things out over here.

    We don't currently block any instances

    æ±æ–¹ã«é–¢é€£ã™ã‚‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚‚ãã†ã§ãªã„ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚‚OKã§ã™ã€‚å¿…ãšã—ã‚‚æ±æ–¹ã®è©±ã‚’ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    ã‚¢ãƒ€ãƒ«ãƒˆè¦ç´ ã®ã‚ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã«ã¯å¿…ãšNSFWã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ï¼ˆç”»åƒã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¾Œã«NSFWãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’æŠ¼ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼‰

    è‘—ä½œæ¨©ã‚’ä¾µå®³ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¯ã€è‘—ä½œè€…ã®ç”³ã—ç«‹ã¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦å‰Šé™¤ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    wsup.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 43 . Toots: 152 . Connections: 185 . Language: English

    Wsup!

    wsup.social is one of a myriad of Mastodon instances in the fediverse. We are currently open to registrations. Welcome!

    More Info... This is a Mastodon instance in the cloud.

    Anyone is free to join, as long as the person is not a jerk.

    Support with Ethereum: 0xD1db4a2e3A5520CD681219a62EE367C008462835or with Bitcoin: 19oNEzUyfLLkKCWV9Vxjti5wCcTVwsVjfT

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of wsup.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of this service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Like all things in life, the longevity of this instance is not guaranteed. Efforts will be made to support and keep this instance alive should things go wrong or it grows beyond initial forecasted capabilities, but use of this service means acceptance of the above statements.

    Email: dm@wsup.social

    Admin: @denmojo@wsup.social

    ã‚ˆã‚ã—ã

    è¿·æƒ‘è¡Œç‚ºã¯ã‚„ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚é¢å€’ãªã®ã‚‚å‹˜å¼ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    ç®¡ç†äººã®ç‹¬æ–­ã§ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆå‡çµã‚„ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹æ‹’å¦ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹å†…ã®ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹æ¨©åˆ©ã¯ã€å„ç™ºä¿¡è€…ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ä½†ã—ã€ç®¡ç†äººã¯å„ç™ºä¿¡è€…ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’åˆ¶é™ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    å±é™ºãªãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ç™ºè¦‹ã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€ã€Œé€šå ±ã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ã¤ã‹ã£ã¦çŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    å…è²¬

    å€‹äººã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚æƒ…å ±æ¼ãˆã„ãªã©ã®å±é™ºæ€§ãŒé«˜ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ç”Ÿã˜ãŸã„ã‹ãªã‚‹äº‹è±¡ã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã€å½“æ–¹ã¯ä¸€åˆ‡è²¬ä»»ã‚’è² ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ ã”ç†è§£ã®ä¸Šã€ã”ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    äº‘ã€…

    Email: admin@sanin.link

    Admin: @lynx@mstdn.sanin.link

    mstdn.nl

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon NL

    Users: 139 . Toots: 2470 . Connections: 481 . Language: English

    Deze Mastodon instantie wordt vanuit Nederland gehost, voert Nederlands als standaard taal voor alle menu's, knoppen en uitleg en is dus vooral gericht op Nederlandstalige gebruikers. Registratie is open: kies een gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord, bevestig per email en ga aan de slag!

    More Info... This Mastodon instance is hosted in The Netherlands and has Dutch as the default interface language. If you're more comfortable using another language, you can change the language under Preferences ("Voorkeuren").

    Wat is Mastodon?

    Mastodon is een gedecentraliseerd sociaal netwerk. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen bedrijf achter zit die als doel heeft zoveel mogelijk te verdienen aan gebruikers door bijvoorbeeld advertenties te plaatsen, surfgedrag van gebruikers op internet te "tracken" met cookies en die verzamelde data door te verkopen aan andere partijen.

    Over de hele wereld verspreid zijn er honderden zgn. 'instanties', een beetje een technische programmeurs term. Maar een instantie is zeg maar een portaal, een hub, een plek waar je je kunt aanmelden en via waar je kunt communiceren met Mastodon gebruikers wereldwijd.

    Alle instanties worden gerund door vrijwilligers die behalve hun tijd en liefde ook server ruimte en bandbreedte beschikbaar stellen aan het sociale netwerk. De software waar Mastodon op draait is open source - dus ook dat wordt onderhouden door vrijwilligers die via Github hun code delen met Mastodon. Zowel het werk als de kosten worden dus door honderden enthousiastelingen gedeeld.

    Hoe werkt het?

    Als je eenmaal bent aangemeld zul je zien dat je verschillende 'tijdlijnen' hebt:

    Je eigen tijdlijn

    Een lokale tijdlijn

    Een gefedereerde tijdlijn

    Net als op andere sociale media platforms kun je status updates posten (op Mastodon heten die "toets" - of "toots" in het Engels: je toetert dus!), anderen volgen, "toets" van anderen delen (een "boost" geven), aanklikken als "favoriet" en op reageren.

    Je eigen tijdlijn

    Op je eigen tijdlijn ("Home") zie je zowel openbare als besloten berichten van degenen die jij volgt, zowel hun eigen "toets" als "boosts" die ze doen van andere gebruikers.

    Lokale tijdlijn

    Op de lokale tijdlijn zie je de openbare status updates en boosts van andere gebruikers die zich via @mstdn.nl hebben aangemeld.

    Gefedereerde tijdlijn

    Weer zo'n ongemakkelijk woord. Maar Mastodon is dus feitelijk een federatie van onafhankelijke websites die elk hun eigen ledenbestand bijhouden. Op de gefedereerde tijdlijn zie je een samenvoeging van alle openbare berichten die gebruikers van @mstdn.nl in hun eigen tijdlijn zien. Daar zitten dus ook veel berichten tussen die afkomstig zijn van andere Mastodon instanties - van gebruikers die door @mstdn.nl gebruikers worden gevolgd. Je ziet daar alleen berichten die door gebruikers zelf zijn geschreven, dus geen "boosts".

    Hoe zit het met m'n gebruikersnaam?

    Je gebruikersnaam kun je een beetje vergelijken met een emailadres. Als je bijv. "alice" als gebruikersnaam hebt dan is je feitelijke Mastodon handle als je op @mstdn.nl bent aangemeld @alice@mstdn.nl - twee apenstaartjes dus! Op een andere instantie kan het heel goed zijn dat daar ook een gebruiker is die "alice" heeft ingevoerd, zo zal Alice op @mastodon.social @alice@mastodon.social als handle hebben. Net als dat er een alice@hotmail.com emailadres en een alice@gmail.com emailadres kan zijn.

    Op @mstdn.nl zal de handle van onze lokale Alice als @alice worden weergegeven, als er op @mstdn.nl berichten worden gedeeld van de Alice van @mastodon.social zal dat worden weergegeven als @alice@mastodon.social. Zo zie je dus meteen wie er lokaal is en wie op een andere instantie zit en kun je de verschillende Alice's makkelijk uit elkaar houden.

    Je kunt je ook aanmelden op meerdere instanties - en wellicht overal dezelfde gebruikersnaam invoeren, of juist verschillende gebruikersnamen. Sommige instanties kunnen gericht zijn op een speciaal onderwerp of doelgroep, sommige gericht op een specifieke taal of lokaliteit. En je kunt dus "toets" van jezelf op andere instanties dan ook weer "boosten" op @mstdn.nl en omgekeerd.

    Is er ook een App?

    Als je op Android zit heb je niet eens een App nodig. In Chrome kun je rechtsboven op het "hamburger menu" klikken waar je onderaan een optie vindt om @mstdn.nl aan je home-screen toe te voegen. Je krijgt dan dus een knop op je home-screen en als je daar op klikt dan opent Mastodon full-screen net als een geinstalleerde App van de Play Store. Is dat op iPhone ook zo?

    Voor iPhone wordt Amaroq vaak genoemd als goede App. Maar er is dus geen officiele centrale App, er zijn verschillende App's van andere partijen.

    Handige links

    instances.mastodon.xyz

    Een aktueel overzicht van alle Mastodon instanties wereldwijd. Je kun hier ook zien hoe het met hun beveiliging is gesteld, over ze open staan voor nieuwe registraties of besloten zijn, wat hun status is.

    Uitgebreide documentatie (Engelstalig)

    Hierboven heb je een beknopte uitleg kunnen lezen, voor volledig documentatie kun je bij de software ontwikkelaars terecht

    Apps Een overzicht van verschillende Apps voor verschillende platforms die beschikbaar zijn voor Mastodon.

    Email: mastodon@mstdn.nl

    Admin: @mastodon@mstdn.nl

    toot.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    Toot CafÃ©

    Users: 615 . Toots: 16190 . Connections: 1084 . Language: English

    Toot CafÃ© is an online club for tooting in a fun, safe, mammoth-themed environment.

    More Info... Toot CafÃ© is an instance that was seeded from the web development and design community, so topics may tend to be about JavaScript, CSS, etc. They're not limited to that, though; you can talk about anything you want as long as you follow the Code of Conduct.

    Code of Conduct

    Prior art

    Mastodon.social guidelines

    JSConf Code of Conduct

    The short version

    Don't harass anyone

    If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator

    Have fun

    Be excellent to each other

    Moderators

    @nolan

    @ohhoe

    @halkeye

    @luisbg

    Blocked instances

    We block some other instances. The full list is on GitHub and you are free to dispute it, but note that our preference is to err on the side of caution.

    Rules

    No advertising or excessive promotion

    No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.

    No pornography, nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a U.S. workplace, even behind a NSFW warning.

    No gore or graphic violence

    Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)

    No racism

    No sexism

    No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin

    No xenophobia or violent nationalism

    No sexual depictions of children

    No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union

    No stalking or harassment

    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts. Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.

    No "follow bots." We block these and our instance is on a "no bots" list.

    Handling harassment

    If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "â€¦" button and then "Report." For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator.

    If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

    The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.

    Privacy policy

    What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You won't; brands and non-humans (other than fun/useful bots) are banned. How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your serviceâ€¦ none of that.

    We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. (Hopefully it won't come to that!)

    More privacy measures on toot.cafe:

    EXIF data (GPS location, date, camera type, etc.) is stripped from images and never stored.

    All crawlers are blocked in robots.txt.

    HTTPS is used everywhere thanks to Let's Encrypt.

    No ads or trackers.

    Links are direct URLs rather than tracking redirects.

    Understand though that this instance is run by me and my friends, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) we potentially have access to your data, including DMs. The back-end is also not encrypted. If this is not okay with you, this might not be the instance for you.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no E2E encryption. So use Signal or WhatsApp for the things you really want to be private.

    Discussion and Feedback

    For questions about policy, bots, design, theming, etc., please refer to our discussions GitHub repo.

    About this server

    Purple theme and custom icons by Maxime Le Conte des Floris. This server is an Azure instance running Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS in US West 2 (near Seattle). It's maintained by Nolan Lawson, who has a Patreon if you would like to pitch in.

    Email: nolan@nolanlawson.com

    Admin: @toot.cafe

    mastodon.link

    about

    preview

    Mastodon Link

    Users: 388 . Toots: 2376 . Connections: 657 . Language: English

    Mastodon server hosted by iooner.
    A+ HTTPS, hosted in France, IPv6 coming.
    Trouble registering ? Send me a mail contact@mastodon.link.

    More Info... mastodon.link

    Guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.link; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    More (in french)

    Le serveur est fourni en "best effort", l'Ã©quipe d'administration fait donc de son mieux sans donner aucune garantie de service.

    Nous nous rÃ©servons le droit de fermer les inscriptions au node Ã  tout moment Si le node venait Ã  s'arrÃªter nous ferons le maximum afin de vous avertir le plus tÃ´t possible.

    Email: contact@mastodon.link

    Admin: @iooner@mastodon.link

    mastodon.at

    Mastodon

    Users: 1871 . Toots: 111433 . Connections: 1102 . Language: English

    mastodon.at is open to all users and federates with most instances.

    ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ mastodon.at ist offen fÃ¼r alle User und ist mit vielen anderen Instanzen verbunden.

    More Info... Welcome to mastodon.at! This instance is open to all users and federates with all other instances with the exception of those with community values that are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service below.

    Please read the section Responsibility of Contributors below and report any content that you feel might be inappropriate.

    Follow @Support for important updates!

    ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ Willkommen auf mastodon.at! Diese Instanz ist offen fÃ¼r alle User und ist mit allen anderen Instanzen verbunden, mit der Ausnahme jener, deren Werte mit unseren Nutzungsbedingungen (siehe unten) Ã¼berwiegend inkompatibel sind.

    ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ Bitte lies den Punkt Responsibility of Contributors unten genau durch und melde Inhalte, die du fÃ¼r unangebracht hÃ¤ltst.

    Folge @Support fÃ¼r wichtige Updates!

    Terms of Service:

    The following terms and conditions govern all use of the mastodon.at website and all content, services, and products available at or through the website. Our Services areÂ offered subject to your acceptance without modification of all of the terms and conditions contained herein and all other operating rules, policies (including, without limitation, the Privacy Policy) and procedures that may be published from time to timeÂ by mastodon.at (collectively, the â€œAgreementâ€).Â You agree that we may automatically upgrade our Services, and these termsÂ will apply to any upgrades.

    Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using our Services. By accessing or using any part of our services, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access or use any of our services. If these terms and conditions are considered an offer by mastodon.at, acceptance is expressly limited to these terms.

    Use of ourÂ Services requires a mastodon.at account. You will be solely responsible and liable for any activity that occurs under your username. You are responsible for keeping your password secure.

    1. Your mastodon.at Account

    If you create an account on mastodon.at, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and blog, and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with your account. You must immediately notify mastodon.at of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. mastodon.at will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions.

    2. Responsibility of Contributors

    If you post material to mastodon.at, post links on mastodon.at, or otherwise make (or allow any third party to make) material available (any such material, â€œContentâ€), you are entirely responsible for the content of, and any harm resulting from, that Content or your conduct. That is the case regardless of what form the Content takes, which includes, but is not limited to text, photo, video, audio, or code. By using mastodon.at, you represent and warrant that your Content and conduct doÂ not violate the following terms:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Austria and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    If you delete Content, mastodon.at will use reasonable efforts to remove it from mastodon.at, but you acknowledge that caching or references to the Content may not be made immediately unavailable. Without limiting any of those representations or warranties, mastodon.at has the right (though not the obligation) to, in mastodon.atâ€™s sole discretion, (i) reclaim your username or websiteâ€™s URL due to prolonged inactivity, (ii) refuse or remove any content that, in mastodon.atâ€™s reasonable opinion, violates any mastodon.at policy or is in any way harmful or objectionable, or (iii) terminate or deny access to and use of mastodon.atÂ to any individual or entity for any reason.

    3. Responsibility of Visitors.

    mastodon.at has not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, posted to ourÂ Services, and cannot therefore be responsible for that materialâ€™s content, use or effects. By operating our Services, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses the material there posted, or that it believes such material to be accurate, useful, or non-harmful. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. Our ServicesÂ may contain content that is offensive, indecent, or otherwise objectionable, as well as content containing technical inaccuracies, typographical mistakes, and other errors. Our Services may also contain material that violates the privacy or publicity rights, or infringes the intellectual property and other proprietary rights, of third parties, or the downloading, copying or use of which is subject to additional terms and conditions, stated or unstated. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from the use by visitors of our Services, or from any downloading by those visitors of content there posted. Youâ€™re encouraged to report any content that you feel is inappropriate or in violation of these terms.

    4. Content Posted on Other Websites.

    We have not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, made available through the websites and webpages to which mastodon.at links, and that link to mastodon.at. mastodon.at does not have any control over those non-mastodon.at websites, and is not responsible for their contents or their use. By linking to a non-mastodon.at website, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses such website. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from your use of non-mastodon.at websites and webpages.

    5. Changes.

    We are constantly updating our Services, and that means sometimes we have to change the legal terms under which our Services are offered. If we make changes that are material, we will let you know by posting on one of our admin accounts, or by sending you an email or other communication before the changes take effect. The notice will designate a reasonable period of time after which the new terms will take effect. If you disagree with our changes, then you should stop using our ServicesÂ within the designated notice period. Your continued use of our ServicesÂ will be subject to the new terms. However, any dispute that arose before the changes shall be governed by the Terms (including the binding individual arbitration clause) that were in place when the dispute arose.

    6. Termination.

    mastodon.at may terminate your access to all or any part of ourÂ ServicesÂ at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. If you wish to terminate this Agreement or your mastodon.at account (if you have one), you may simply discontinue using our Services. All provisions of this Agreement which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

    7. Disclaimer of Warranties.

    Our Services areÂ provided â€œas is.â€ mastodon.at and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither mastodon.at nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that our Services will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you download from, or otherwise obtain content or services through, our Services at your own discretion and risk.

    8. Limitation of Liability.

    In no event will mastodon.at, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable with respect to any subject matter of this Agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to mastodon.at under this agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. mastodon.at shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.

    9. General Representation and Warranty.

    You represent and warrant that (i) your use of our Services will be in strict accordance with the mastodon.at Privacy Policy, with this Agreement, and with all applicable laws and regulations (including without limitation any local laws or regulations in your country, state, city, or other governmental area, regarding online conduct and acceptable content, and including all applicable laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from Austria or the country in which you reside) and (ii) your use of our Services will not infringe or misappropriate the intellectual property rights of any third party.

    Adapted from WordPress.com Terms of Service and the mastodon.social content guidelines. WordPress.com Terms of Service available under the Creative Commons Sharealike license.

    Witches Town

    Users: 1527 . Toots: 234031 . Connections: 1213 . Language: French

    Witches Town est lÃ  pour fournir un endroit accueillant sur Mastodon pour les personnes queers, fÃ©ministes, anarchistes et compagnie ainsi qu'Ã  leur sympathisantâ‹…eâ‹…s. Nous sommes surtout des francophones mais vous Ãªtes bienvenuâ‹…eâ‹…s mÃªme si vous parlez une autre langue.

    Merci de prendre le temps de lire les informations dÃ©taillÃ©es de notre instance .

    Witches Town is made to provide a nice place on Mastodon for queer, feminists, anarchists and stuff as well as their sympathizers. We are mostly french-speaking people but you are welcome even if you speak another language.

    Please, take the time to read the extended informations of our instance .

    More Info... RÃ¨gles de Witches Town

    Notez que si vous n'aimez pas les SJW (Social Justice Warriors), les fÃ©minazies, les antifascistes, etc vous gagnerez probablement du temps en vous inscrivant ailleurs.

    Quelques rÃ¨gles :

    Ne participez pas Ã  du harcÃ¨lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.

    Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations privÃ©es ou des DM.

    Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en gÃ©nÃ©ral vous vaudront d'Ãªtre suspendu, mÃªme utilisÃ©s dans des conversations non-publiques.

    Il est permis de poster du porn ou de la nuditÃ© mais uniquement en utilisant la fonction NSFW et en aucun cas sur une timeline publique. Votre compte passerait en mode Silence. (Demandez autour de vous comment faire des posts non-publics)

    Soyez gentilâ‹…les les unâ‹…es avec les autres.

    D'autres infos

    Certaines informations complÃ©mentaires sont visibles sur Github :

    La liste des instances suspendues ou silencÃ©es

    Les signalements de problÃ¨mes techniques

    Notez que les profils et les messages ne sont pas indexables par Google, Bing ou d'autres moteurs de recherches classiques.

    Si vous souhaitez soutenir financiÃ¨rement l'administratrice de l'instance, vous pouvez lui faire un don rÃ©current sur son profil Liberapay.

    The rules of Witches Town

    Please take note that if you don't like SJWs, feminazies, antifa or whatever, it might save you some time to go somewhere else.

    Some rules

    Do not engage in harassment of any kind.

    Do not publish private conversations or DMs.

    Racial, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.

    You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)

    Be nice to each other

    Additionnal informations

    Some informations are visible on Github :

    The list of suspended or silence instances

    The list of technical issues you might encounter

    Your profile and messages on witches.town won't be indexed by classical search engines like Google, Bing, etc.

    If you wish to financially support the instance's administrator, you can give her a recurring donation on her Liberapay profile.

    Email: witches-town@ltch.fr

    Admin: @Alda@witches.town
