    mastodon.rocks

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Rocks

    Users: 1685 . Toots: 7552 . Connections: 837 . Language: English

    Because Mastodon rocks !

    More Info... English

    Welcome

    Here some resources to understand Mastodon :

    Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron

    Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

    Rules

    No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law.

    No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc).

    No parody account.

    No bot (for the moment).

    Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning.

    No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Mobile applications

    Android : Tusky

    iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon

    Full list

    Support Mastodon

    The code source can be found here : Github

    You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

    Support this instance mastodon.rocks

    FranÃ§ais

    Bienvenue

    Voici quelques ressources pour comprendre Mastodon :

    Welcome to Mastodon par @Alda

    DÃ©couvrez Mastodon, un clone de Twitter libre, open source et dÃ©centralisÃ© par @Numerama

    Le rÃ©seau social Mastodon, un Â« Twitter plus proche de lâ€™esprit originel Â» par @Willvs (pour Le Monde)

    RÃ¨gles

    Tout contenu doit respecter la loi relative Ã  l'hÃ©bergement de contenu sur Internet.

    Tout contenu oppressif (sexiste, homophobe, etc.) entraÃ®ne un ban.

    Pas de compte parodique.

    Bots fortement dÃ©conseillÃ©s (pour l'instant).

    Les mÃ©dias violents doivent obligatoirement Ãªtre accompagnÃ©s d'un Content Warning.

    Pas de contenu sexuel sans content warning dans la TL publique (il vous suffit de mettre les toots en "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Applications mobiles

    Android : Tusky

    iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon

    La liste complÃ¨te

    Contribuer Ã  Mastodon

    Le code source est disponible sur Github

    Vous pouvez aider financiÃ¨rement le dÃ©veloppeur sur Patreon

    - Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes etc sont interdits.- La fonction NFSW doit Ãªtre utiliser pour masquer les mÃ©dias sensibles (sexe, violence).ğŸ”

    There is no content restriction on this instance.However few rules must be respected:

    anticapitalist.party

    about

    preview

    join

    anticapitalist.party

    Users: 878 . Toots: 31850 . Connections: 1099 . Language: English

    Anticapitalist Mastodon instance. Party means fun, not political party. But we're still political.

    This instance follows stable updates (currently v1.3.3), it's not getting dev updates from the master branch.

    Registrations are invite-only on this instance. You must be recommended by a user to get in. How to invite a friend to anticapitalist.party ? Or : Joining anticapitalist.party without an invite

    More Info... Hello everyone! Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    anticapitalist.party wasn't designed for sensitive militant operations. Such operations shouldn't be discussed here, and on any other social network. Details

    Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here. Illegal content will be deleted,

    and may lead to an account suspension.

    Porn is allowed, with NSFW tag on. Porn without that tag will be deleted.

    Content Warning HAS to be used for the following :

    violence (text and medias)

    stories including *phobias (text and medias)

    sexual content (text and medias)

    Please remember to use the NSFW tags for all of the above, are medias are displayed enven with Content Warning on.

    Parody accounts are allowed, and are advised to specify that they are as such in their description or name.

    We're blocking the following instances (what I think about blocking instances) :

    .tg {border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;}

    .tg td{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg th{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg .tg-9hbo{font-weight:bold;vertical-align:top}

    .tg .tg-yw4l{vertical-align:top}

    instance

    severity

    reason

    shitposter.club

    suspend

    harrassment

    @Akatookey is in charge of moderation

    âš ï¸ Warning! I am not a professional sysadmin, and downtime may happen â€” you have been warned.

    Donâ€™t forget to follow me on Mastodon and Twitter to stay up-to-date with problems, updates and server downtime : @corzntin

    æš´åŠ›çš„ãªã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã€äººç¨®å·®åˆ¥ç­‰ã«å¯¾ã™ã‚‹æ”¯æŒã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚‚ã®

    Mastodon on GLaDOS

    Users: 179 . Toots: 781 . Connections: 499 . Language: English

    Bienvenue sur l'instance Mastodon de GLaDOS.ch. Pour toutes questions ou demandes merci de contacter celri[at]glados.ch (attention je ne suis pas support technique pour Mastodon).

    Welcome to the Mastodon instance of GLaDOS.ch. For any questions or requests please contact celri[at]glados.ch (note : I am not technical support for Mastodon).

    Mastodon v1.4.0.2

    Quelques rÃ¨gles

    Some rules

    Soyez sympa entre-vous.Be nice with each other.

    Quand c'est nÃ©cessaire utilisez, s'il vous plait, les tags NSFW sur les photos et le content warning.When it's necessary, please use NSFW tags on photos and content warning.

    Vous avez la possibilitÃ© de reporter les toots, n'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  le faire si besoin.You have the possibility to report toots, do not hesitate.

    clacks.link

    about

    preview

    join

    The Clacks

    Users: 7 . Toots: 134 . Connections: 242 . Language: English

    Welcome to The Clacks

    Named after the transcontinental communications network from Terry Pratchett's Discworld.

    More Info... Welcome to the Clacks. I created this instance for my own use, and perhaps my friends if they are interested. I have decided to keep signups open for now, but will close them down if it becomes an issue.

    Follow @tithonium for status updates, planned downtimes, upgrade announcements, etc. If this instance gets busy enough, I'll probably create a separate account so you don't have to follow my other nonsense.

    Also: I tend to run against the master branch, and update when I remember to. Bugs happen.

    Rule Overview

    Most of the rules boil down to:

    Don't be a dick

    Don't get me in trouble with the law or my network provider

    Don't embarrass me in front of the other Mastodon admins

    You're literally in my house; Don't give me a reason to kick you out

    The Clacks is hosted on a physical server owned by me, @tithonium, located in my office at home, on my own internet connection. When it comes down to it, you are in my home and I decide if you get to be here.

    If you cause problems, I will deal with you based on my perception of the severity. This could be anywhere from [telling you to knock it off] up to [deleting your account and everything associated with it, blocking your IPs at the firewall, and reporting you to your ISP and law enforcement].

    Please don't make me do the latter. Seriously.

    I will try to avoid blocking /entire/ instances, but will do so when necessary. If and when I do start blocking users or instances at a site level, I will try to remember to maintain a list here.

    I will also try to remember to announce when I change these rules. But I've also included a revision date down at the bottom.

    Finally: I'd love to switch out the default Mastodon images and such for something more thematically appropriate, if any artists would be willing to help out for the pittance I can justify spending on this project.

    Some Specific Rules

    (lifted from other Mastodon instances)

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of clacks.link; they are here to provide you with an insight into my content moderation policies:

    Please report violations of these rules by local users as needed. This site is not responsible for, and has little control over, the actions and content of users of other federated sites. That said, if a non-local user is a problem, please do let us know about that too, so we can decide how we need to handle it.

    The following types of accounts are disallowed:

    RSS-feed bots not connected to feeds of a Clacks user.

    Commercial/Advertising accounts

    Parody accounts

    In addition, accounts that go unverified or unused for a long period will be suspended.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged or Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    Misinformation for a purpose other than to entertain

    My rules about NSFW-tagging-required may change in the future, I'm not entirely sold on it.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Nazi symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary

    Confederate symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary

    Content illegal in the state of Washington

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed in bios and avatars:

    Sexual content of any sort

    Violent content of any sort

    Images that flash or change rapidly

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

    Last Revision: 2017-05-06

    Email: admin@clacks.link

    Admin: @tithonium@clacks.link

    mastodon.mit.edu

    about

    preview

    join

    mastodon.mit.edu

    Users: 364 . Toots: 2828 . Connections: 437 . Language: English

    mastodon.mit.edu

    More Info... mastodon.mit.edu is a Mastodon instance for the MIT community. Anyone with an @mit.edu or @*.mit.edu email address can create an account and participate in the global Mastodon fediverse. Content posted on this instance does not reflect the opinions or policies of MIT.

    Content Guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.mit.edu; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Content in violation of US law

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mastodon@mit.edu

    Admin: @mastodon@mastodon.mit.edu

    ä¸€èˆ¬ã«18ç¦ã¨å‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªæ–‡ç« ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯Content Warningã§éš ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€18ç¦ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¢ï¼ˆç”»åƒãªã©ï¼‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ä¸é©åˆ‡ãªã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¨ã—ã¦ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚(NSFWãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã§ã§ãã¾ã™)

    social.freechristian.life

    about

    preview

    join

    freechristian.life

    Users: 24 . Toots: 64 . Connections: 141 . Language: English

    In an effort to make local timelines more meaningful and make the instance a decision of note, this instance is for Christians. Commonly accepted core beliefs held in all denominations, sects, and times are sacred here. However, the walls in this garden have many doors on all sides that lead to many other places. You are encouraged to create your experience for yourself and others in the same instance.--- check junk folder if you don't receive a confirmation email. . .

    Since Christ, all Christians have believed in certain common things throughout time. This instance is intended for them. Due to the way this federated system works. You are encouraged to create your experience for yourself an others in the same instance. So on with the experiment.

    Email: @sym@social.freechristian.life

    Admin: @sym@social.freechristian.life

    More Info... ã“ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã¯webmaster@pachi.houseã¾ã§

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

    xhr.open('GET', 'https://viav6.kibousoft.co.jp/', true);

    xhr.onreadystatechange = function(){

    if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200){

    var dom = document.getElementById('kibousoft-viav6');

    dom.innerHTML = xhr.responseText;

    }

    };

    xhr.send(null);

    â‘¢ã€Œç™»éŒ²æƒ…å ±ã€ã€€-ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ç™»éŒ²ã‚’å—ã‘ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒå½“ç¤¾ã«æä¾›ã—ãŸæƒ…å ±ã‚’ã„ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    â‘£ã€Œå€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã€ã€€-ç™»éŒ²æƒ…å ±ã®ã†ã¡ã€æ°åã€ä½æ‰€ã€ç”Ÿå¹´æœˆæ—¥ã€é›»è©±ç•ªå·ã€é›»å­ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã€é‡‘èæ©Ÿé–¢ã®å£åº§æƒ…å ±ã€ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¸ãƒƒãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰æƒ…å ±ãã®ä»–ç‰¹å®šã®å€‹äººã‚’è­˜åˆ¥ã§ãã‚‹æƒ…å ±ã‚’ã„ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    1 ã€€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ»ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã€ŒKibousoft Nowã€ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¦æœ¬ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆä¸Šã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãŸæŠ•ç¨¿ã€ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã€å…¬é–‹ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®è‡ªå·±ç´¹ä»‹ãªã©ã®ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã€ãŠã‚ˆã³ç”»åƒã‚„å‹•ç”»ãƒ»éŸ³å£°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãªã©ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã«ä»˜éšçš„ã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿(ä»¥ä¸‹ã€ŒæŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã€ã¨ã„ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚)ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€è‡ªã‚‰ãŒæŠ•ç¨¿åˆã¯é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®é©æ³•ãªæ¨©åˆ©ã‚’æœ‰ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã€åŠã³æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ãŒç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’ä¾µå®³ã—ãªã„ã“ã¨ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€è¡¨æ˜ã—ã€ä¿è¨¼ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    2 ã€€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€å½“ç¤¾ã«å¯¾ã—ã€æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€ç„¡å„Ÿã«ã¦åˆ©ç”¨(è¤‡è£½ã€è¤‡å†™ã€æ”¹å¤‰ã€ç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã¸ã®å†è¨±è«¾ãã®ä»–ã®ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹åˆ©ç”¨ã‚’å«ã‚€ã€‚)ã™ã‚‹æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’è¨±è«¾ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚æœ¬é …ã«åŸºã¥ãã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®å½“ç¤¾ã¸ã®åˆ©ç”¨è¨±è«¾ã®ç¯„å›²ã«ã¯ã€æœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’é€šã˜ã¦ã€å½“ç¤¾ãŒä»–ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã®åˆ©ç”¨ã‚’å†è¨±è«¾ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚å«ã‚€ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ç‰¹ã«ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯æœ¬ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãŸã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€ã‚¹ãƒ‹ãƒšãƒƒãƒˆãªã©ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã«é¡ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¯ä»–ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒå•†ç”¨ç§ç”¨å•ã‚ãšä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’è¨±è«¾ã—ã€ä»–ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€æœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ä¸Šã§ä»–ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒæŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãŸæŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã‚’ã€å½“ç¤¾ã®å®šã‚ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã§ç·¨é›†ã€æ”¹å¤‰ã€è¤‡è£½ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãŸã ã—ã€ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒæ˜è¨˜ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€ã“ã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹å†…å®¹ã«å¾“ã†ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    mastodon.land

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 904 . Toots: 5661 . Connections: 791 . Language: English

    Free Mastodon instance open to all users.
    Create an account here give you an opportunity to interact with mastodon users across all other instances.

    More Info... Description

    We believe in free softwares and we plan to maintain our instance on the long term.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.

    Any user not respecting these rules may get suspended.

    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited

    Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

    Servers location : France

    Stats

    Mastodon

    SystÃ¨me

    Email: contact@rock-hosting.com

    Admin: @Yann@mastodon.land

    mastodon.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 62559 . Toots: 1796905 . Connections: 2393 . Language: English

    mastodon.social

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: eugen@zeonfederated.com

    Admin: @Gargron@mastodon.social

    â˜…é‡è¦ï¼šç™»éŒ²ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒã€è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã«å±Šãå ´åˆãŒå¤šã„ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ï¼ï¼ç‰¹ã«Gmailã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹æ–¹ã‹ã‚‰ã®ã”é€£çµ¡ãŒå¤šã„ã§ã™ã€‚ã”ç¢ºèªé ‚ã‘ã‚Œã°å¹¸ã„ã§ã™ï¼HTMLãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå—ä¿¡ã§ããªã„ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ç­‰ã§ã¯ç™»éŒ²ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼

    â˜…ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«å†…å®¹ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ç­‰ã«ã¯ã€ç®¡ç†äººã¯å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ãŸã”æœ¬äººã«æ³•çš„ãªè²¬ä»»ãŒç”Ÿã˜ã¾ã™ã€‚ç™ºè¨€å†…å®¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€ååˆ†æ°—ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚ç™»éŒ²ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã®IPã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰å€‹äººã®ç‰¹å®šã¯ã§ãã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚ˆã‚ã—ããŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å¤šãã®æ–¹ãŒè¦‹ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ç‰¹å®šã®å€‹äººã¸ã®å¨åœ§çš„ãªã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚„ä¸å¿«ãªç™ºè¨€ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    ï¼‘ï½ï¼’ã‹æœˆé–“ã®æœŸé–“ä¸­ã«ä¸å¿«ãªå†…å®¹ã‚„éæ¿€ãªç™ºè¨€ãŒãªããªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã—ãŸã‚‰ã€ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¹å‡¦ç†ã‚’è§£é™¤è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆå†…å®¹ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã¯ã€ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¹ç¶™ç¶šã‹ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®å®Œå…¨å‡çµã‚’è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å«ŒãŒã‚‰ã›è¡Œç‚ºã¯ã€åˆ‘äº‹äº‹ä»¶ã¨ãªã‚‹å¨åŠ›æ¥­å‹™å¦¨å®³ç­‰ã«è©²å½“ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ç¯€åº¦ã®ã‚ã‚‹äº¤æµã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    â€»è‡ªè²»ã§é‹å–¶ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã®å‡¦ç†èƒ½åŠ›ãŒéå¸¸ã«ä½ã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯ã§ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã«è² è·ã®æ›ã‹ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã•ã›ã¦é ‚ãã¾ã™ã€‚ä¸€åº¦ã«30ä»¶ä»¥ä¸Šã®CSVãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€å‡¦ç†èƒ½åŠ›ã‚’è¶…ãˆã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¤§é‡ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆç­‰ã¯çµ¶å¯¾ã«ãŠæ§ãˆä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚Pawooç­‰ã¨æ¯”ã¹ã‚‹ã¨æ•°åƒå€ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯ã®å·®ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã”ç†è§£é ‚ã‘ã‚Œã°å¹¸ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    â€»ä»–ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¯åŸå‰‡ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ã¯é–¢ä¿‚ã®ãªã„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¤§å¹…ã«å¢—ãˆã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ãŒé…ããªã£ãŸã‚Šã€HDDã®å®¹é‡ãŒä¸€æ¯ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ãªã©ã®å¼Šå®³ãŒå‡ºã‚‹ç‚ºã§ã™ã€‚ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¯ã€pawoo.netã‚„friends.nicoç­‰ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ãŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    â€»ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¨é–¢ä¿‚ã®ãªã„å®£ä¼ç›®çš„ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯å³æ™‚ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚è²§å¼±ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãªã‚“ã§ã™ã€‚

    â€»æœæŸ»æ©Ÿé–¢ç­‰ã‹ã‚‰ã®è¦è«‹ãŒæ¥ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ç­‰ã®å€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    â€»ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼è²»ç”¨ç­‰ã®è² æ‹…ãŒçµæ§‹å¤§ãã„ç‚ºã€ä»Šå¾Œé‹å–¶è²»ã‚’è³„ã†ç‚ºã«ã€åºƒå‘Šç­‰ãŒå…¥ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«æ¯æœˆã‚¦ãƒ³åä¸‡ç¨‹åº¦ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼è²»ç”¨ãŒæ›ã‹ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚‚ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã”æŠ•ç¨¿é ‚ã„ãŸãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ã€å¤šåª’ä½“ã§ã®ç´¹ä»‹ã‚„äººå£çŸ¥èƒ½ã‚’ç”¨ã„ãŸã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã§åˆ©ç”¨ã•ã›ã¦é ‚ãå ´åˆãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚åç›ŠãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€é‹å–¶ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç¶™ç¶šã•ã›ã‚‹ç‚ºã®è²»ç”¨ï¼ˆã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ä»£ã€é‹å–¶è²»ç­‰ï¼‰ã«å……ã¦ã•ã›ã¦é ‚ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    â€»é€€ä¼šå‡¦ç†ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã¯ã€ç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã«ã¯ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã®ã§ã€ç®¡ç†è€…ã«ã”é€£çµ¡é ‚ã„ã¦ã‚‚å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã‹ã­ã¾ã™ã€‚äºˆã‚ã”äº†æ‰¿ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚é€€ä¼šã«è¿‘ã„å‡¦ç†ã‚’è¡Œã„ãŸã„æ–¹ã¯ã€ã”è‡ªèº«ã§ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’å¤–ã—ã€ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å¤‰ãˆã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ¨ã¦ã‚¢ãƒ‰ã«å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ç­‰ã®å¯¾å¿œã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦é ‚ãå¿…è¦ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    social.nasqueron.org

    about

    Social Nasqueron

    Users: 893 . Toots: 5764 . Connections: 839 . Language: English

    Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

    We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

    We are Nasqueron.

    More information

    Email: dereckson@social.nasqueron.org

    Admin: @Dereckson@social.nasqueron.org

Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans prÃ©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.

    Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s Ã  utiliser la fonction de rapport (â€œReportâ€) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant Ã  lâ€™encontre de nos rÃ¨gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne rÃ¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.

    Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant lâ€™aspect activiste de notre dÃ©marche. Pendant que nous y sommes si lâ€™Ã©criture inclusive vous dÃ©range sachez que vous n'Ãªtes qu'Ã  un clic de souris de la sortie.

    Notre rÃ©seau social, et son rÃ©seau entier selon nous, est dÃ©diÃ© Ã  la rÃ©appropriation des moyens de communication et Ã  la crÃ©ation de communautÃ©s meilleures pour le collectif.     Ces rÃ¨gles ont Ã©tÃ© inspirÃ©es par celles Ã©crites par wxcafe, merci Ã  lui. ğŸ¤˜Retrouvez la liste des comptes bloquÃ©s ici, nos mentions lÃ©gales gÃ©nÃ©rales ici ainsi que nos CGU par lÃ .

    mastd.racing

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Racing

    Users: 33 . Toots: 5267 . Connections: 287 . Language: English

    Mastodon Racing
    Instance dedicated to motorsport .
    Instance dÃ©diÃ©e aux sports mÃ©caniques .

    More Info... Small instance dedicated to motorsport. Several bot accounts publish news about motorsports.

    Petite instance dÃ©diÃ©e aux sports mÃ©caniques. Plusieurs comptes bot publient les actualitÃ©s en sports mÃ©caniques.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: racecontrol@mastd.racing

    Admin: @RaceControl@mastd.racing

    bagels.pizza

    Users: 70 . Toots: 140 . Connections: 157 . Language: English

    bagels.pizza is a Mastodon instance for artists, queers, activists and all the weirdos who live in New York City or just love bagels and/or pizza.

    All forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. Please use the report feature if anyone or anything is bothering you. Be specific by including a comment and we will deal with it to the best of our ability.

    Email: ivansafrin@gmail.com

    Admin: @ivan@bagels.pizza

    mastod.life

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastod Life

    Users: 62 . Toots: 135 . Connections: 472 . Language: English

    A friendly mastodon instance for anyone to sign up to.

    • Fast
    • Secure
    • Stable
    • Reliable
    • Friendly
    • Awesome

    This instance does take a lot of hard work to run, and renting servers is not free. If it is at all possible a small donation towards the running costs would be grateful. You can follow this link for a few different methods of donating.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastod.life; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: paul.meeke@acclaro.digital

    Admin: @pmeeke@mastod.life

    social.gemuplay.com

    gemuplay.com

    Users: 5 . Toots: 127 . Connections: 601 . Language: English

    Community of gamers from casual to hardcore and from mobile to consoles. Are you up for the challenge?

    We trust you to be responsible and respect the members of our community.

    The following is a general list of what is not accepted:

    Nudity or sexual content, harmful/violent/graphic content, hate/harassment, threats or spam/scams Remember that this is our community. Each and every member makes this site what it is, so don't be afraid to get involved.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    Anitwitter [Pawoo]

    Users: 213 . Toots: 4621 . Connections: 462 . Language: English

    Anitwitter is a Anime-focused Mastodon instance, with a focus on free speech and little to no moderation.

    More Info... Don't be a dick.

    Please note: your confirmation email will LIKELY go to spam. Check there.

    Moderation disclaimer:

    Toots made on anitwitter.com will not be moderated in any way. I believe that forcing people to abide to what they can say online is not my business, and people are able to filter the content they don't want to see.

    That being said, NSFW post flagging is not required.

    HOWEVER

    If you do nothing but harass people mindlessly just to be an edgelord werido I will have zero qualms about investigating why I should keep you on this instance.

    Also don't post child porn** or something,

    **Lolicon art isn't child porn.

    Email: dogrunes@outlook.com

    Admin: @dogrunes@anitwitter.com

    anti.energy

    about

    preview

    join

    so very tired

    Users: 53 . Toots: 1317 . Connections: 650 . Language: English

    NO. FUCKING. NAZIS.

    More Info... This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything.

    I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I'd really rather let users make their own sense of it.

    This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking.

    I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we'll see what's cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it.

    If I can get the new UI working, I'd like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

    Email: superbranch@riseup.net

    Admin: @superbranch@anti.energy

    kosmos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    kosmos.social

    Users: 164 . Toots: 1556 . Connections: 551 . Language: English

    A friendly place for tooting. Run by the Kosmos peeps.

    More Info... Technical Details

    kosmos.social is currently hosted on a dedicated server at Hetzner in Germany (renewable energy source, German laws apply). We configure and deploy everything via Chef cookbooks. Your uploads are stored on Amazon S3. Automated backups are run regularly and pushed to S3 as well.

    Our fork of the source code is publicly available at https://github.com/67P/mastodon/ (we deploy the kosmos branch). We frequently update the repo and running code with the latest fixes and improvements.

    TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.

    IRC room

    If you're into that jazz, you can find us in #kosmos on Freenode. If there's no immediate response to a question, just idle for a while.

    The Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kosmos.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mail@kosmos.org

    Admin: @kosmos@kosmos.social

    queer.party

    Queer Party!

    Users: 155 . Toots: 1491 . Connections: 595 . Language: English

    A silly instance of Mastodon for queer folk and queer folk accessories. Let's be friends!

    More Info... Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website,

    aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. The rules pretty much boil down to "be good to each other", but a few rules I'd like to explicitly list out are as follows:

    Any content or postings which may be illegal under French or Scottish law are not permitted.

    Any content or postings containing Nazi symbolism, ideology and the promotion thereof, are strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    Racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and any other discriminatory conduct which attacks any individual or group of individuals based on what they are or what they believe in, is strictly forbidden and also seriously uncool.

    Any conduct which abuses this Mastodon instance, or which causes harm to other Mastodon instances, and/or the users thereof, is strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    A status page for this Mastodon instance is available here.

    This Mastodon instance generally operates in open federation, but specific domains are blocked if and when identified as being either indifferent to or permissive of abusive conduct. In the interest of full transparency, this list is published below.

    Table last updated 18/4/17.

    DomainSeverity

    shitposter.clubsuspend

    mastodon.0-z-0.comsuspend

    mastodon.delurk.comsuspend

    notmastodon.xyzsuspend

    mastodon.desync.netsuspend

    tooter.frsuspend

    mastodon.hostsuspend

    freezepeach.xyzsuspend

    sealion.clubsuspend

    rainbowdash.netsuspend

    social.heldscal.lasuspend

    pawoo.netsilence reject-media

    Email: mastodon-queeries@maff.im

    Admin: @maffsie@queer.party

    Mastodon Huma-Num

    Users: 324 . Toots: 3656 . Connections: 591 . Language: English

    L'instance mastodon d'Huma-Num est dÃ©diÃ©e Ã  l'enseignement supÃ©rieur et Ã  la recherche. Elle se veut interdisciplinaire et ouverte Ã  tous. Elle est mise en oeuvre et maintenue par la trÃ¨s grande infrastructure de recherche Huma-Num pour les sciences humaines et sociales numÃ©riques.

    More Info... A propos de cette instance

    Instance mastodon dÃ©diÃ©e Ã  l'enseignement supÃ©rieur et Ã  la recherche. Elle se veut interdisciplinaire et ouverte Ã  tous. Elle est mise en oeuvre et maintenue par la TGIR Huma-Num.

    Nous vous demandons de rester courtois et polis dans vos Ã©changes. De plus, les contenus suivant sont strictement interdit : Raciste, sexiste, homophobe, apologie du terrorisme, incitation Ã  la haine raciale ou au suicide, pornographie, etc. Nous nous rÃ©servons le droit de bloquer tout utilisateur ne respectant pas ces rÃ¨gles de base.

    Huma-Num est une trÃ¨s grande infrastructure de recherche (TGIR) visant Ã  faciliter le tournant numÃ©rique de la recherche en sciences humaines et sociales. Pour remplir cette mission, elle est bÃ¢tie sur une organisation originale consistant Ã  mettre en Å“uvre un dispositif humain (concertation collective) et technologique (services numÃ©riques) Ã  lâ€™Ã©chelle nationale et europÃ©enne en sâ€™appuyant sur un important rÃ©seau de partenaires et dâ€™opÃ©rateurs.

    La TGIR Huma-Num favorise ainsi, par lâ€™intermÃ©diaire de consortiums regroupant des acteurs des communautÃ©s scientifiques, la coordination de la production raisonnÃ©e et collective de corpus de sources (recommandations scientifiques, bonnes pratiques technologiques). Elle dÃ©veloppe Ã©galement un dispositif technologique unique permettant le traitement, la conservation, l'accÃ¨s et l'interopÃ©rabilitÃ© des donnÃ©es de la recherche. Ce dispositif est composÃ© de services dÃ©diÃ©s, d'une plateforme d'accÃ¨s unifiÃ© (ISIDORE) et d'une procÃ©dure d'archivage des donnÃ©es Ã  long terme.

    La TGIR Huma-Num propose en outre des guides de bonnes pratiques technologiques gÃ©nÃ©ralistes Ã  destination des chercheurs.     La TGIR Huma-Num est portÃ©e par l'UnitÃ© Mixte de Services 3598 associant le CNRS, l'UniversitÃ© d'Aix-Marseille et le Campus Condorcet.

    æ±äº¬ã®ä¸‹åŒ—æ²¢ãŒå¤§å¥½ããªäººãŸã¡ã®Mastodonã§ã™ã€‚ã§ã‚‚ã€shimokitaã£ã¦å‘½åã—ãŸã®ã§ã€é’æ£®çœŒã®ä¸‹åŒ—åœ°æ–¹ã®ã¿ãªã•ã‚“ã‚‚ãœã²ï¼ã€€çµ¶è³›å®Ÿé¨“ä¸­ãªã®ã§ã€Œã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€ã‚’èª­ã‚“ã§ã‹ã‚‰å‚åŠ ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã¾ã›

    ã¾ãšæœ€åˆã«ã€å‹¢ã„ã ã‘ã§ç«‹ã¦ãŸMastodonãªã®ã§ã€ã„ã¤æ­¢ã¾ã£ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã‹ã‚‚ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã—ã€çªç„¶çµ‚äº†ã—ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã‚ã¨ã€å…¨ç„¶ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã¾ã¾å§‹ã‚ãŸã®ã§ã€ä½•ãŒèµ·ãã‚‹ã‹ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    aleph.land

    about

    preview

    join

    Aleph

    Users: 722 . Toots: 21315 . Connections: 1047 . Language: English

    aleph.land

    More Info... Welcome to the × community!

    First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

    The respect of others is primary.

    This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.

    Each user is responsible of their account.

    Rules of Aleph.land

    You can be suspended for:

    Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).

    Taking part of a harassment.

    Putting someone in danger.

    Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.

    Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

    You can be muted from the public timelines for:

    Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:

    nudity (#nude)

    gore (#gore)

    pornography (#porn)

    a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)

    spoil (#spoil)

    Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.

    Making abusive ads.

    Posting automatic toots from another source.

    Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.

    If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :)

    You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

    Email: madeorsk@protonmail.com

    Admin: @Madeorsk@aleph.land

    é£›æ•£ã—ãŸéš•çŸ³ã®ã‹ã‘ã‚‰ã‹ã‚‰ç”Ÿã¾ã‚ŒãŸè¬ã®ç”Ÿå‘½ä½“ã€æ†‘å–ªã€ãŒæ®‹ã£ãŸéƒ½å¸‚ã‚’è¹‚èº™ã€ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ã¨åã®ã¤ãå…¨ã¦ã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’é£Ÿã„è’ã‚‰ã—ã€é‚ã«ã¯äººã€…ã®å‘½ã«ã‚‚æ‰‹ã‚’ã‹ã‘å§‹ã‚ãŸã€‚

    æ†‘å–ªã«å¯¾ã—ã¦æˆ‘ã€…ã¯ã¾ã£ãŸãã®ç„¡åŠ›ã ã£ãŸãŒã€ã¨ã‚ã‚‹ç¥ç¤¾ã«å¥‰ç´ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸç¥åˆ€ãŒæ†‘å–ªã«æœ‰åŠ¹ã ã£ãŸã¨ã„ã†å ±å‘ŠãŒåæ’ƒã®ç³¸å£ã¨ãªã‚‹ã€‚

    ç™ºæ˜ã•ã‚ŒãŸå¤æ–‡æ›¸ã‹ã‚‰ã€ç‰¹æ®Šãªé›ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œæ–¹ã‚’ã—ãŸåˆ€å‰£ã«ã¯æ†‘å–ªã«å¯¾æŠ—ã—ã†ã‚‹åŠ›ãŒå®¿ã‚‹ã®ã ã¨ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã€ç ”ç©¶ã®çµæœã€ç§˜ä¼ã®é›åˆ€æ³•ã®å†ç¾ã«è‡³ã£ãŸã€‚

    äººé¡ã®å­˜äº¡ã‚’è³­ã‘ã‚ˆã¿ãŒãˆã‚‹æ•°ã€…ã®ååˆ€ã¨ã€ååˆ€ã«é­…å…¥ã‚‰ã‚Œã—çœŸå‰£å°‘å¥³é”ã®ç‰©èªãŒã„ã¾å§‹ã¾ã‚‹!!

    social.etc-services.de

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon social.etc-services.de

    Users: 41 . Toots: 130 . Connections: 313 . Language: English

    It's an open Mastodon instance, feel free to join us ;)

    More Info... Blocked servers

    There are no blocked servers atm.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.etc-services.de.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: social@duke.de

    Admin: @duke@social.etc-services.de

    pegelinux.ga

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 33 . Toots: 1576 . Connections: 334 . Language: English

    Pegelinux
    This is a community for people who are interested in Programming, Science, and Technology. Our goal is to share and discuss insightful ideas that gratify intellectual curiosity, exchange experience, and help each other to make awesome things.

    More Info... How does it works ?

    When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on pegelinux.ga. That is your instance.

    You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated.

    The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on pegelinux.ga and use it to access the Mastodon federation ).

    The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers.

    How do I get verified ? Who is who ?

    Do it yourself ;) For now there is no verification on Mastodon, it's just an emoji that people add as a joke.

    Your identity on Mastodon and the fediverse ( the federation of all the Mastodon instances ) is [emailÂ protected]/* */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* */, so when you register here, your identity is [emailÂ protected]/* */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* */ . You can follow and communicate with anyone in the fediverse if you know his/her [emailÂ protected]/* */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* */!

    How do I follow a user from another instance ?

    If you know his username and his instance, you can search for @[emailÂ protected]/* */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* */ and from there it should be pretty easy. It's pretty young so there's room for improvements, and I'm sure that we'll end up being able to search across instances. There is now also some sites that allows searching users. You can always look at the federated timeline and find some interesting contacts !

    How do I mask X language from the timelines ? I can't read that

    That's a feature being developed at the moment, but you can always head to Mastodon lang remover to do it in your browser without waiting for the feature to be integrated.

    Who is moderating the instance ?

    For the moment, you, by reporting the posts and users and the admin enforcing the rules. (@kimiamania)

    How often do you update the service ?

    Usually the day a new stable version is released. You can follow @kimiamania for announces when this is happening.

    How much does it cost ?

    Mastodon is free for the users. This instance is hosted by me, @kimiamania, on my personal funds. Your help is appreciated to maintain/make the platform evolve.

    How can I help ?

    You can get involved in multiple ways, you can welcome new users, animate the local timeline, promote our instance and invite new users here, report posts and users not respecting our rules...

    You can also help with the costs of running the service by donating, any small amount is appreciated ! Donations are accepted on:

    Paypal: https://paypal.me/RezhaJulio

    Local Indonesian Bank: BCA, Mandiri, BTPN

    Email: contact@rezhajulio.id

    Admin: @kimiamania@pegelinux.ga

    Welcome to Ivri Anochi - ×¢×‘×¨×™ ×× ×•×›×™ - a Mastodon based social network for Jews of all walks of life...
    Come on in, pull up a chair and make yourself comfortable. We're happy to have you.

    #Jewish #Jew #Hebrew #Israel


    More Info... Ivri Anochi - ×¢×‘×¨×™ ×× ×•×›×™ is a custom instance of the Mastodon Social Network which is made available for the Jewish world. It is moderated, and any and all forms of anti-semitism will result in immediate banning. While this instance is created primarily for Jews, we do not discriminate against persons of other faiths or origins, so long as they abide by our standards.

    All tooters on this instance are expected to uphold an environment that is tolerant and inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. It is expected that members adhere to general codes of conduct, and avoid the following:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct Users are responsible for their own content, and their help in addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct is greatly appreciated.

    mastodon.night.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    mastodon.night.coffee

    Users: 200 . Toots: 631 . Connections: 535 . Language: English

    Mastodon instance based in Oklahoma, USA for night.coffee and friends. We are one of many federated Mastodon instances and aim to be friendly and socially responsible. See our extended about page for more details.

    More Info... mastodon.night.coffee

    We're a laid back instance that enjoys the finer points of geek culture. Don't be a douche/nazi.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.night.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Bot software that automates posts, aggregates other user content, or other such behavior is considered spam and will result in an immediate silence or suspension of the account. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: tim@night.coffee

    Admin: @bratta@mastodon.night.coffee

    m.netwkr.net

    Users: 1 . Toots: 3 . Connections: 3 . Language: English

    This is the private Mastodon instance for the operator of the netwkr.net domain.

    More Info... Not yet open as still making some changes, but will be eventually. I am running this instance for fun, but also in the hope I can create a more fun atmosphere for friends and anyone who wishes to tag along. Community above division.

    Not permitted on this instance:

    - Racism (in any form)

    - Sexism (in any form)

    - Xenophobia (in any form)

    - Abusive and/or harassing behaviour (in any form)

    - Promotion of violence or threatening behaviour (in any form)

    - This list may be extended at any time but general rule of thumb: If you're about to say something that may offend one or more people there's a chance it's not appropriate here and any and all reported transgressions will be acted upon.

    I will work with law enforcement if requested and will request law enforcement assistance should any content be of questionable legality. Break the rules of this service and I will have no problems throwing you under the bus.

    As per the services of old your use of this service is a privilege, not a right. I reserve the right to block access to this service anyone I deem to be harmful to this community.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    toot.BERLIN

    Users: 477 . Toots: 3886 . Connections: 895 . Language: English

    The Mastodon instance for Berlin. Mastodon is a free, decentralised microblogging platform (think Twitter, but free).
    Provided by the devops nerds at Planio .
    Impressum Â· DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung

    More Info... This instance is humming nicely on a 6 core, 16 GB RAM KVM VM on a 12 core, 128 GB RAM bare metal hardware node with dual SSDs in a RAID1, hosted at Hetzner in Germany with multiple redundant uplinks on 100% renewable energy sources. We perform offsite backups daily and upgrade to the latest Mastodon version frequently.TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.Code of conduct: We value free speech as long as it's not harming anybody. Just don't be a jerk.

    Email: jan@toot.berlin

    Admin: @jan@toot.berlin

    Users: 1855 . Toots: 17843 . Connections: 549 . Language: English

    More Info... Il servait de base Ã  notre petite communautÃ© helvÃ©tique pour l'organisation et les rÃ©sumÃ©s de sÃ©ances.

    Face Ã  la centralisation du web et Ã  la rÃ©gression de la qualitÃ© des conversations en ligne, l'Organisation TrÃ¨s SecrÃ¨te a tentÃ© de dÃ©ployer de nouveaux services auto-hÃ©bergÃ©s (Rocket.chat, NodeBB, blogs Ghost, ...) sans jamais connaÃ®tre le succÃ¨s.

    Heureusement, le projet Mastodon semble en phase de concrÃ©tiser un rÃªve : associer la puissance du web moderne et la dÃ©centralisation du web d'origine.     wickedtotally.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Wicked Totally

    Users: 76 . Toots: 77 . Connections: 299 . Language: English

    wickedtotally.com

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: atergens@gmail.com

    Admin: @AterNox@wickedtotally.com

    Users: 775 . Toots: 10327 . Connections: 1081 . Language: English

    mastodon.partipirate.org est une instance de mastodon gÃ©rÃ©e par le Parti Pirate FranÃ§ais.
    mastodon.partipirate.org is a mastodon instance handled by the Parti Pirate (French Pirate Party).

    More Info... TolÃ©rance

    Nous, Pirates, assumons notre espoir d'une sociÃ©tÃ© de bienveillance, de tolÃ©rance et de coopÃ©ration.     Le texte ci-dessus, intitulÃ© "TolÃ©rance", est issu de la DPG du Parti Pirate.     mstdn.protoxin.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ProToxin.Net Mastodon Instance

    Users: 1 . Toots: 111 . Connections: 145 . Language: English

    U2FsdGVkX1/jlsIQBWFmCX9BlinMBUMq1iYlzu7cWjCfk6zGykzmWJDT7tYxiz4a

    More Info... Private instance with open minds

    Invites available soon.

    Notice

    We have a common-sense policy. Would you talk to your mother that way? If you can't, then we don't need it here. We are happy to support your ideas and politics, however, there is no reason to be an ass. If you can't be nice here, go back to Twitter or any other social media platform.

    Anything that is illegal in Europe/USA shall not be posted on this server, Lolicons for example are illegal. Globally common sense applied, don't do illegal stuff, don't discriminate, don't be a racist, etc...

    If you encounter a protoxin.net user being abusive, please report them. -

    ProToxin (https://keybase.io/protoxin)

    Privacy policy

    We will never sell (or give away) your information to third-parties. Ever. The only exception of providing instance/user information is upon legal request.

    Updates

    The SLA for updates on this instance is within "24 hours of tagged release pushed on the Mastodon GitHub".

    Donate

    This instance and all other projects I do are all self funded. That being said, things can get expensive. If you are interested in donating (any little bit helps), I accept bitcoin at the following address:

    1LA2xyaLUnvqWuzq5MNJTNpxu85gyndiqG

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    lgbt.io

    about

    preview

    join

    LGBT.io

    Users: 32 . Toots: 592 . Connections: 466 . Language: English

    By signing up, you agree to abide by the Terms and the Rules for this instance as follows:-

    1. Do not discriminate, harrass and/or insult members based on their religion, race, sex, political beliefs, or whether they are gay or straight.
    2. Do not bully and/or pick on other members.
    3. Do not flame other members.
    4. Do not advertise. As of now, you are not permitted to make money using lgbt.io.
    5. Do not publicly expose your real identity unless you're using "Direct" privacy and you're communicating with someone you can trust.
    6. Do not post screenshots or history of toot conversations publicly without all participants' consent.
    7. Do not post copyrighted, piracy, warez and leaked content.
    8. Do not spam.
    9. All NSFW/sexual content must be accompanied by NSFW (not safe for work) and/or CW (content warning) option when writing a toot.
    10. ..more rules will be added when needed.

    Note: Make sure to report any toots that violate the rules. A staff member will evaluate the reported toots and take appropriate actions against the them.

    Happy tooting! :)

    Support us on Patreon

    Email: admin@lgbt.io

    Admin: @self@lgbt.io

    ã€Œæ˜Ÿã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚£ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‚‹ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã€ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’å»ºã¦ã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã¨ã¯ã„ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€ã‚ãã¾ã§ã‚‚å…¬å¼ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ã•ã‚“ãŒæ­£å¼ãªã‚„ã¤ã‚’å»ºã¦ã¦ãã ã•ã‚‹ã¾ã§ã®ã¤ãªãã¨ã§ã‚‚ã„ã„ã¾ã™ã‹ã€ãŠè©¦ã—ç‰ˆã¿ãŸã„ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã‚’æ„å›³ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆã‚ã¨ã¯è‡ªåˆ†ã®ãŠå‹‰å¼·ã‚‚å…¼ã­ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼‰

    torontomusic.cloud

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Toronto Music

    Users: 54 . Toots: 264 . Connections: 309 . Language: English

    A social network for Toronto music folks: artists, bands, presenters, independent media, concertgoers, collaborators, DJs, producers, music sharers, venues, indie record labels, and whoever else wants to join. There are no ads, and no algorithms. All your followers will see your posts here, and you won't miss any posts by your favourite people.

    Mastodon is a new open-source Twitter alternative that's beginning to get popular in Japan and France. It's a bit basic compared with established social networks, but it's brand-new. There's a community of volunteer developers working on it and it's getting better every day.

    For now, torontomusic.cloud will use the policies of the main English-language Mastodon network, mastodon.social. In the future these will be determined by the users of torontomusic.cloud, but many of them seem unlikely to change.

  • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  • The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive promotion (promotion is great and encouraged! we're talking about extreme, spammy promotion here)
      2. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      3. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    2. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Contact

    Business e-mail:

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    banthamilk.blue

    about

    preview

    join

    Bantha Milk

    Users: 6 . Toots: 143 . Connections: 191 . Language: English

    Welcome to Bantha Milk, a Star Wars themed Mastodon instance! The instance is not restricted to Star Wars related content: general use is welcome and expected. Mos Eisely is our sister instance.

    More Info... Want to support our community financially?

    PayPal

    Patreon

    Our sponsor and admin:

    @GadgetVirtuoso

    Thank you for any support you provide!

    Code of Conduct:

    "Star Wars is for everyone" therefore, Bantha Milk is for everyone.

    Spoiler policy:

    Tag all spoiler content related to any movies or TV shows.

    Adult and NSFW policy:

    Tag all adult and NSFW content.

    Suggested Roleplaying Protocols:

    ğŸ’­ thoughts

    ğŸ—¯ yelling

    ğŸ’¬ incoming communication, or communication to other character

    [[actions]]

    âŒ speaking as the account owner, not as the character

    What is Bantha Milk Blue?

    Bantha milk, also know as blue milk, is the famous beverage from A New Hope. See Blue Milk on Wookiepedia, The Star Wars Wiki.

    Disclaimer:

    Bantha Milk is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Disney, Lucasfilm Limited or any of its subsidiaries, employees, or associates.

    Email: info@banthamilk.blue

    Admin: @gadgetvirtuoso@banthamilk.blue

    ltu.social

    about

    preview

    join

    ltu.social

    Users: 121 . Toots: 1117 . Connections: 460 . Language: English

    Mastodon instance intended for Lithuania ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¹, but everyone is welcome! Have any questions/suggestions? hello@ltu.social ğŸ“©

    ltu.social has two admins at the moment Vaidotas and Karolis. Feel free to contact them if need any help.

    Simple rules to follow:

    No advertisement, no flooding.. ğŸš¯

    NSFW content allowed, but use NSFW tag. ğŸ”

    No bots. ğŸ¤–

    No harassments.

    Email: hello@ltu.social

    nomofomo.social

    about

    preview

    join

    nomofomo

    Users: 65 . Toots: 447 . Connections: 568 . Language: English

    This is a work in progress so be patient and be cool

    If you want to support this server or continuing development, bitcoin is always appreciated.
    1F69UCFCL24xNcRzCeRFMNmGLuaPi1z8yn

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of nomofomo.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: info@nomofomo.social

    Admin: @internaut@nomofomo.social

    mastodon.fun

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.fun | Mastodon

    Users: 1470 . Toots: 7507 . Connections: 1090 . Language: English

    A new instance of mastodon using a new gTLD domain ! Sign up !

    More Info...

    Welcome to mastodon.fun !

    I'm @Aguay a french Sysadmin which is also a tech enthusiast.

    I'm not running my blog (yet ?) but i love to see what people are able to create to try it later.

    This instance was create to be a part of this wonderful project.

    If you have any issue to sign up don't hesitate to contact me by mail

    My tech army will help you ASAP

    Rules :

    Don't flood

    Use NSFW tags for NSFW content

    Use content warning for spoilers

    Respect each other

    Of course have fun. Don't we use a .fun gTLD?

    free to report users or contents that don't belong here.

    Where is this hosted ?

    For now, the instance is running on a VC1L Scaleway server running docker. The VM itself is hosted in France.

    Donations

    I have a job i earn my own money, but the server will be more reliable depending of donations.

    For the moment this is just a good way to test the load of the server.

    Feel free to donate if you like what i have done.

    This give me a way to improve the hosting.

    Paypal

    Patreon

    Supporters

    To be on this list, you need to support me on my Patreon page or Paypal :)

    Thanks @Captainark for your support !

    Thanks for joining :) and do not hesitate to Toot me @Aguay

    Metrics

    Link

    Email: aguay@mastodon.fun

    Admin: @Aguay@mastodon.fun
