    social.targaryen.house

    about

    preview

    join

    House Targaryen

    Users: 3777 . Toots: 49960 . Connections: 1421 . Language: English

    social.targaryen.house is one of several mastodon instances in the fediverse. It aims to be an alternative choice, and it will federate with other instances. Fire and Blood!

    More Info... Goal of this instance

    This is a generalist instance. Either you like Game of Thrones or not, either you support the house Targaryen or not, you will always be welcome. This instance was made because the guy behind believes we can make the Internet better by decentralising. He's also a nerd so he uses a strong TLS configuration and all best practices that he's aware of to make this instance secure.

    This instance is up and running since the 1st April 2017.

    Source code changes

    For your information, this instance is using its own fork of Mastodon available on Github : Wonderfall/mastodon-targaryen. Don't panic, it's still Mastodon, but as you can see it's... tweaked, so the look can be a real immersion into the Targaryen house.

    Some lexical changes were made :

    Burn : AKA "boost", "reblog", or "retweet"

    Fire! : AKA "toot", "post", or "tweet"

    Valyria : the local timeline

    The Known World : the federated timeline

    There are other tweaks, like the responsive columns (at the moment, it's not in Mastodon). I'm also fetching the master branch from the official Mastodon repository. It means we benefit from the latest features, but at the risk of rollbacks (hence a little downtime, though I do my best if something goes wrong). Don't say I didn't warn you.

    What rules?

    First, keep in mind the Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen (1789). Since the server is hosted in Germany, you must also respect the Law of Germany. Any (commented) report is reviewed and the content can be moderated, but every user is encouraged to use the block and mute functions.

    Be respectful, be human. Honour the House Targaryen.

    You should avoid :

    Sharing pornography content without the NSFW tag.

    Spreading harming spoilers without CW.

    Doing excessive harassment.

    Spamming on public timelines.

    This is just common sense and how to behave correctly with others. Unfortunately we cannot always know what hurts people, but I guess it's... life?

    Moderation policy

    Take a moment to read the following lines, and don't underestimate the importance of understanding them. If you don't, you're free to choose another instance, that's the spirit.

    Freedom of speech is a human right. In fact, you can post everything which injures no one else (article 4 - DRMC 1789). Then it would be ironic to have a severe censorship policy, so first, we won't block entire instances. Consider the admin as an hoster rather than an editor of the content you can see.

    Except for "very good reasons" (as a matter of law and interference with freedom of thinking), this instance won't intervene much in your content : you have at your disposal the tools to block/mute an account yourself. If you want a strong moderation policy, this instance may not suit your requirements.

    Note that your admin is not necessarily a robot, so if you feel that something should be discussed, feel free to contact him. Regarding the suspension/silence of remote accounts, a blocklist is publicly available (theoretically, because at the moment, there is no effective suspension).

    Recommended accounts and bots

    Every user is advised to follow these accounts :

    Wonderfall : the admin of this instance (info, support)

    Khalkount : a usercount bot for this instance

    Drogon : a multifunction low-IQ bot (server stats)

    Khaleesi : the Queen

    By the way : if you intend to run your own bot on this instance, you should tell us first. We won't be mad at you, but we have to know what's going on this instance, especially if your bot is flooding the timeline. Thanks!

    What's behind?

    This instance is hosted on a Hetzner dedicated server located in Germany (EU). It has the following specs :

    CPU : Intel Xeon E3-1271v3

    RAM : 32GB (4*4) DDR3 ECC

    HDD : 2*4TB (RAID)

    OS : Debian 9 Stretch - Linux 4.10

    Bandwidth : 1 Gbit/s

    Encrypted backups of Mastodon are made daily. This dedicated server is hosting other services but they shouldn't interfere. On top of that, I tuned Mastodon so it can be incredibly fast.

    Who can I blame?

    @wonderfall (FR/EN) maintains the server and is the main administrator of this instance. If you encounter any problems, send him some mail, or send him a direct message. There's no service guarantee, I'm admin on my free time...

    How to donate?

    Litecoin : LTEHhMW6XUupZKVbJBtXKDNnVMogYiVynK

    Bitcoin : 3Pak9gkiU4R7K9qeHYySFyueRRCRuioXsN

    Liberapay : donate recurrently!

    Patreon : become a patron!

    To guarantee the longevity of this instance, every single donation is useful. If you made a donation, don't hesitate to tell me : I can make you a free Nextcloud account. Anyway,

    I would be immensely grateful.

    Email: wonderfall@targaryen.house

    Admin: @wonderfall@social.targaryen.house

    æ—¥æœ¬ã«è¨­ç½®ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ³•å¾‹ã‚’å®ˆã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ç„¡å·®åˆ¥ãƒ–ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ»ç„¡å·®åˆ¥ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ»ç„¡å·®åˆ¥ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒœã‚‚ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã®è² è·ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ã‚„ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®å®¹é‡ã‚‚æœ‰é™ãªã®ã§å¤§ããªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯å¤–éƒ¨ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’æ´»ç”¨ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ç®¡ç†è€…ãŒç¶™ç¶šä¸èƒ½ã¨åˆ¤æ–­ã—ãŸå ´åˆã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯äºˆå‘Šãªãçµ‚äº†ã—ã¾ã™

    ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®å‰Šé™¤ã¯è¡Œã„ã¾ã›ã‚“

    å®£ä¼ç³»ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯è‡ªåˆ†ã§ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ç«‹ã¦ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼ˆè¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã‚‰Suspendã—ã¾ã™ï¼‰

    é€šå ±ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    å¿…ãšç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã‹ã‚‰è¦‹ã¦æ­£å½“ãªç†ç”±ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã®ã¿é€šå ±ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    é€šå ±ã®éš›ã¯ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆæ¬„ã«çŠ¶æ³ã‚’è©³ã—ãæ›¸ã„ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    SILENCEã‹SUSPENDã‹ã¯ç®¡ç†è€…ãŒæ±ºã‚ã¾ã™

    è‡ªåˆ†ãŒãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã˜ã‚ƒæ¸ˆã¾ãªã•ãã†ãªå ´åˆã¯ç©æ¥µçš„ã«é€šå ±ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ãƒœãƒƒãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ãƒœãƒƒãƒˆã‚’é‹ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯å¿…ãšUnlistedã§ç™ºè¨€ã•ã›ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    Publicã§ç™ºè¨€ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒœãƒƒãƒˆã¯SILENCEã—ã¾ã™

    ã•ã„ã”ã«

    ã¿ã‚“ãªã¸ã„ã‚ã«ãã ãã ã—ã‚ˆã†

    ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    FUJITSU PRIMERGY TX1310 M1ã¨ã„ã†ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã§ã™

    ã¾ã™ã¨ã©ã‚“ä»¥å¤–ã«ã‚‚å‹•ã‹ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§

    å‡¦ç†èƒ½åŠ›ã‚’ãƒ•ãƒ«æ´»ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯ã§ããªã„ã§ã™

    CPU: Celeron G1820(2.70GHz)

    RAM: 4GBâ†’8GBï¼ˆã™ã”ãƒ¼ã„ï¼ï¼‰

    ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ã¦ãã¨ã†ã«ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ä½œã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

    èµ·å‹•ã—ãŸã‚‰ã‚ãã„ã‚“ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’æŠ¼ã™ã¨ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ãŒèµ·å‹•ã—ã¦ã¾ã™ã¨ã©ã‚“ã®èªè¨¼ã‚’ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã‚«ãƒ¡ãƒ©ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚¯ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€

    é‰›ç­†ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šãƒã‚¹ãƒˆ

    å®¶ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ TL

    äººã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«TL

    å†™çœŸã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šãƒãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚¿ã‚°ã€Œ#ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€ã€

    åœ°çƒã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ï¼šé€£åˆTL

    ã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚¯ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€ï¼šå†™çœŸã‚’æ’®ã£ã¦ã€Œ#ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€ã€ã«ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆ

    æ¨ªæ–¹å‘ã«ã—ã‚…ã£ã¨ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨éš£ã®ç”»é¢ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ä¸€ç•ªä¸Šã§ä¸‹ã«å‘ã‹ã£ã¦ã—ã‚…ã£ã¨ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã™

    ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°APIãŒæœ‰åŠ¹ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã—ã‚…ã£ã¨ã‚„ã‚‰ãªãã¦ã‚‚å‹æ‰‹ã«æ›´æ–°ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™

    ã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚¯ã­ã“ã«ã†ã‚€æ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒä¸‹æ‰‹ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã‚¹ãƒ‘ãƒ æŠ•ç¨¿ãªã®ã§sns.gdgd.jp.netã«ã—ã‹ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã§ããªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ä½œã£ãŸã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªãªã®ã§ç¢ºå®Ÿã«å‹•ãã‹ã©ã†ã‹ã¯ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    muhroads.party

    about

    preview

    join

    muhroads.party

    Users: 16 . Toots: 155 . Connections: 161 . Language: English

    muhroads.party is a liberty-minded Mastodon instance with free speech being highly valued in order to promote free, open discussion among users of all backgrounds and viewpoints, refusing to sacrifice free expression in order to protect sensitivities. As a result, moderation will be very limited in scope. We welcome you. Taxation is theft.

    More Info... There are few rules here as we operate on the assumption that most users are not malicious in intent.

    Rules:

    Illegal content - no illegal content is allowed, including but not limited to underage content with the depiction of minors in any sexual context.

    Non-consent - no content depicting anyone being forced against their will for entertainment. Exceptions include videos on real world events that have a societal impact. This content should help raise awareness and educate, and stir up healthy discussions.

    Harassment - discussion, including disagreements, are encouraged, but harassment of other users is prohibited. We are defining harassment as: anything intending to incite others and elicit negative emotions and reactions from other users while not contributing to worthwhile discussion. Having one's feelings hurt and being offended by another user's opinions and world views does not constitute harassment. When in doubt, follow this piece of advice: Don't be a dick.

    Circumventing blocks/suspensions - this is a great way to be removed from the instance. If someone blocks you, just leave it be. Going around the blocks to engage someone is harassment.

    Considerations

    Do keep in mind that we are part of a community. Please be considerate of others and use the CW and NSFW flags for content warranting it. However, this is not a requirement, and content will NOT be removed for disregarding this request.

    Personal Responsibility

    You're responsible for your content, the content you view, and your interactions with other users. This platform gives great granular support to each individual user and instance alike. Please make yourself familiar with the controls if you are not familiar with them already.

    If you want content tailored to your liking, we're not sure this is the place for you, but you are allowed and encouraged to follow, unfollow, block, and unblock users as you see fit. We don't expect everybody will along all the time, so use these functions as you please. You control the flow of the information you see.

    You're responsible for what you toot, boost, and favorite. Nobody will warn you when you get too close to the line and stop you before you cross it. We will work on the assumption that you were raised as part of a community, so we expect you know how to act alongside others. If you lack social skills or just want guidance, feel free to contact our admins for information. If you feel like you're getting too emotionally involved, allowing yourself to be distracted from work or from spending time with loved ones, know when to walk away. Nobody else knows your limit better than you do.

    Email: jake@eightsix.in

    Admin: @jake@muhroads.party

    Users: 2 . Toots: 628 . Connections: 95 . Language: English

    ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚ªãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³2ï¼ˆPSO2ï¼‰ã‚’ä¸­å¿ƒã¨ã—ãŸãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼é–¢é€£ã®è©±é¡Œã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚€Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    åˆã‚ã¦æ¥ã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸæ–¹ã¯ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨é¢é£Ÿã‚‰ã†ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ã“ã“ã«ã„ã‚‹ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©ã®äººãŒã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§çŸ¥ã‚Šåˆã£ãŸåŒå£«ãªã®ã§ã€æ°—æ¥½ã«å‚åŠ ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆã‚Œã°ã€‚æ‰€å±Shipã‚‚ãƒãƒ©ãƒãƒ©ã§ã™ã€‚
    é›‘è«‡ã—ã¦ã‚‹æ‰€ã«æ··ã–ã‚‹ã®ã‚‚ã„ã„ã§ã™ã—ã€ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®è³ªå•ã‚„ãƒã‚¿ã‚’æŠ•ã’ã‚Œã°é«˜ç¢ºç‡ã§èª°ã‹ãŒåå¿œã—ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚ã‚Šã¨ã¿ã‚“ãªè­°è«–ã—ãŸã‚Šã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ã‚¹ã—ãŸã‚ŠãŒå¥½ããªã®ã§ã€æ˜¯éæ˜¯éä½•ã‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    ç™»éŒ²ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ãã‚Œã§ã‚‚å±Šã‹ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ã€æ‰‹å‹•ã§å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€Twitter @pso2_emg_hour ã¾ã§ã€ç™»éŒ²ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ·»ãˆã¦ã”é€£çµ¡ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    More Info...

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«é™ã‚‰ãšMastodonã‚’ä½¿ã†ã«ã‚ãŸã£ã¦

    Mastodonã¯ä¸–ã«å‡ºã¦æ—¥ã®æµ…ãã€ä»ŠãªãŠä½œã‚Šè¾¼ã¿ãŒé€²ã‚“ã§ã„ã‚‹ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã‚¦ã‚§ã‚¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    é‹å–¶è€…ã¨ã—ã¦æœ€å¤§é™æ°—ã‚’é…ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€æœªçŸ¥ã®ãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ãŒã‚ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚’å®Œå…¨ã«ã¯å¦å®šå‡ºæ¥ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    ãã®ã‚ˆã†ãªãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ã«é­ã£ã¦ã‚‚å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ãªã‚ˆã†ã«è‡ªè¡›ã—ã¤ã¤æ¥½ã—ãä½¿ã£ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    æœ€ä½é™ã€ä»–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã¨ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ä½¿ã„å›ã—ã¯çµ¶å¯¾ã«ãƒ€ãƒ¡ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã¾ãŸã€æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ä¼šå“¡ç™»éŒ²åˆ¶ã§ã™ãŒã€TLã®é–²è¦§ã«ã¯ãã®åˆ¶é™ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    ãã®ä¸Šã€ä»–ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ç¹‹ãŒã‚‹Mastodonã®æ€§è³ªä¸Šã€ä¸€åº¦æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãŸç‰©ã¯ã©ã“ã¾ã§æ‹¡æ•£ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‹åˆ†ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    è¦‹ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦å›°ã‚‹å ´é¢ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªã„ç‰©ã¯ã€æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãªã„ã®ãŒå®‰å…¨ã§ã™ã€‚

    é€†ã«åŠ å®³è€…ã«ãªã‚‰ãªã„ç‚ºã«ã€ã€ä»²é–“å†…ã ã‘ã§é€šã˜ã‚‹éš›ã©ã„ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã€ã¿ãŸã„ãªãƒ¢ãƒã®æ‰±ã„ã«ã‚‚æ°—ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    è„…ã‹ã™ã‚ˆã†ãªäº‹ã°ã‹ã‚Šè¨€ã£ã¦ã¦ä½•ã§ã™ãŒã€Mastodonã¯é©åˆ‡ã«ä½¿ãˆã°ä¾¿åˆ©ãªãƒ¢ãƒã§ã™ã€‚

    å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã‚‚çš†æ§˜ã«æ¥½ã—ã‚“ã§é ‚ã‘ã‚Œã°å¹¸ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ ã‚‚ã†ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ãŠã‘ã‚‹Mastodonã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¯1.3.3ã§ã™ã€‚

    äºˆæƒ³ã‚ˆã‚Šå¤šãã®äººã«æ¥ã¦é ‚ã„ãŸã®ã§ã€ç¶™ç¶šçš„ãªé‹å–¶ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¦4/28ã«ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼äº¤æ›ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

    ã¾ãŸåŒæ™‚ã«ã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚‚å°å…¥ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ä»¥å‰ç™»éŒ²ã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã—ã¦ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãšã‚ãã‚‰ã‚ãŸæ–¹ã‚‚ã€ä»Šä¸€åº¦è©¦ã—ã¦é ‚ã‘ã‚‹ã¨ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ç¶­æŒã®è¶³å ´å›ºã‚ãŒä¸€æ®µè½ã¤ã„ãŸã®ã§ã€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ä¾¿åˆ©ãªæ©Ÿèƒ½ã®è¿½åŠ ã‚„ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã«ç€æ‰‹ã—ãŸã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã¾ã™ãŒã€ä½•æ™‚å®Œæˆã™ã‚‹ã‹ã¯å…¨ç„¶åˆ†ã‹ã‚“ãªã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã‚ã¨ã€ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®è¦‹ãŸç›®ã‚’å¤‰ãˆãŸã„ã¨ã‚‚æ€ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€æ®‹å¿µãªãŒã‚‰çµµå¿ƒã‚‚ãƒ‡ã‚¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚‚ç„¡ã„ã®ã§ã€çš†æ§˜ã«ã”åŠ©åŠ›ã‚’ä»°ãã“ã¨ã«ãªã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã€‚

    ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ç”»åƒãã‚‰ã„ã¯ã¨ã£ã¨ã¨å¤‰ãˆãŸã„ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€‚

    Eletuskï¼ˆãˆã‚ŒãŸã™ãï¼‰ã¨ã„ã†åå‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    æµ·å¤–ç‰ˆãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ï¼’ã«å‡ºã¦æ¥ã‚‹æ•µ"Mastodon"ã®è‰²é•ã„ç‰ˆã®åå‰ã‹ã‚‰æ¥ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚

    å¤‰ã«æ»ã‚‰ãšã€ç´ ç›´ã«ãƒãƒ«ãƒ¢ã‚¹ã¨ã‹ã«ã—ã¨ã‘ã°è‰¯ã‹ã£ãŸã¨å¾Œæ‚”ä¸­ã€‚

    ã‚¹ãƒãƒ•ã‚©ãƒˆã©ãƒ¼ã‚“

    ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›å†™çœŸ

    ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ã§æ’®ã£ãŸå†™çœŸã‚„ã€ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒˆã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ¼ãŒé›†ã†å ´ã€‚

    ä½•æ°—ãªã„æ—¥å¸¸ã®ã‚¹ãƒŠãƒƒãƒ— / ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒˆ / ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆ / é™ç‰© ãªã©ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ«å•ã‚ãšã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ã§æ’®ã£ãŸå†™çœŸã‚„ã€æ’®å½±æ–¹æ³•è«‡ç¾© / åˆ©ç”¨ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒª / ãŠã™ã™ã‚ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªãªã©ã®æƒ…å ±äº¤æ›ãªã©è‚©è‚˜å¼µã‚‰ãšã«ãŠæ°—è»½ã«ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    off-the-clock.us

    about

    preview

    join

    Off The Clock

    Users: 130 . Toots: 489 . Connections: 315 . Language: English

    Just your run of the mill Mastodon server. We use mail-gun for email notifications, check your spam folder and mark us as "not spam" please.

    Status: http://status.off-the-clock.us/

    More Info... This server is operated by Nick Gerakines, please contact him @ngerakines@off-the-clock.us for questions or issues.

    Rules and Guidelines

    Don't be a jerk -- this goes both ways. Everyone has bad days, so if you are having a bad day then try not to take it out on anyone. If you see someone else having a bad day, try to uplift them.

    This server is meant for personal, non-commercial use. Promoting your services, projects, and products is OK, but don't be excessive. Corporate accounts, organizations, and businesses don't jell with being "off the clock", and probably don't belong here.

    Some content doesn't belong here. I'm generally pretty OK with NSFW content, but please know your audience and use content warnings. Any content that is considered illegal, graphic, or promotes/is hate speech will not be tolerated.

    This really boils down to rule #1, don't be a jerk.

    This server should not be used to transmit sensitive information or secrets. Please do not jeopardize the network, the other accounts on this server, or the operator by having information on here that other people would be interested in.

    If you object to or have a problem with these rules, then you probably don't belong here. They are pretty tame and flexible.

    Blocked Servers The full list of blocked servers can be found here: https://github.com/off-the-clock/blocked-servers

    Email: nick@gerakines.net

    Admin: @ngerakines@off-the-clock.us

    todon.nl

    about

    preview

    join

    Todon.nl

    Users: 28 . Toots: 1726 . Connections: 456 . Language: English

    Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressive people. Although we are located in the Netherlands, we like to welcome every progressive person from all over the world.
    So if you are (for example) a leftist, socialist, anarchist, Marxist, ecologist, green, vegan, open-minded, anti-racist, pirate, social democrat or social liberal, please join us!


    Todon.nl is een Mastodon-server voor progressieve mensen. Ondanks dat wij ons in Nederland bevinden, willen wij elk progressief persoon van over de hele wereld welkom heten.
    Dus ben je (bijvoorbeeld) links, socialist, anarchist, ecologisch, groen, vegan, ruimdenkend, antiracist, piraat, sociaaldemocraat of sociaalliberaal, meld je dan aan!


    More Info... (Nederlands onderaan)

    These Terms of Service are only valid for Todon.nl. See also Mastodon's (more general) Terms of Service. However, the terms on this page are leading. If you can't agree with the conditions below, you can still use Mastodon, but you should use another instance with different conditions. Or you can deploy your own instance, where you can set your own terms.

    After you sign up, you have to verify your email address. Check your spam folder if you didn't receive a verification email. If after a while an account has 0 toots (posts), follows no one and/or has not set an avatar, we consider this account a ghost account, and will probably suspend it.

    We have to adhere to Dutch and European law. Leading for us however is the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

    You are personally fully responsible and accountable for what you publish on Todon.nl. Without any exception, whether you use a pseudonym/alias or not. In other words: we from Todon.nl and the Mastodon Project in general are completely not responsible and accountable for what you publish, in any form whatsoever.

    We do not tolerate, among other things, racism, homophobia, transphobia and other forms of discrimination, no (sexual) abuse of minors and adults, no calls to and glorification of violence, no right wing and religious extremism, no harassment, and of course no spam. We always keep the right to silence or suspend your account. We are fortunately very tolerant, and freedom of speech and expression are highly valued by us, and therefore we will always think twice before we take these actions. Please use the report tool if you think someone on this instance did not comply with our guidelines.

    Copyright

    Everything you toot is yours and stays yours. You are free to release your toots under any kind of license. We advise you to use a Creative Commons license. You can put this in short in your bio. When you don't indicate a license, the Dutch copyright Law applies. Work from others is of course not your work and using that is completely your risk. So keep yourself well informed about the copyright of third party content. Usually more flexible conditions apply for embedded content and citations.

    Warranty

    Todon.nl and the Mastodon project cannot, in any way be held liable for damages and harm. Todon.nl and the Mastodon Project work hard to prevent fatal server and software failures, but we can never ever guarantee this.

    The text above can be modified by us. Check therefore regularly if you still agree with these terms.

    Deze gebruikersvoorwaarden gelden alleen voor Todon.nl. Zie ook Mastodons (meer algemene) gebruikersvoorwaarden (Engels). De voorwaarden op deze pagina zijn echter leidend. Als je niet akkoord kan of wil gaan met onderstaande voorwaarden, dan kan je nog steeds gebruik maken van Mastodon, maar dan wel op een andere Mastodon-server met andere voorwaarden. Of je kan je eigen Mastodon-server installeren, waar jezelf de voorwaarden mag bepalen.

    Nadat je je hebt registreert, moet je eerste jouw e-mail verifiÃ«ren. Kijk in je spambox wanneer je geen verificatiemail hebt ontvangen. Wanneer blijkt dat na een tijdje een account 0 toots (berichten) heeft, niemand volgt en/of geen avatar heeft ingesteld, beschouwen we dit account als een spookaccount en zullen we het waarschijnlijk blokkeren.

    Wij moeten ons aan de Nederlandse en Europese wet houden. Leidend voor ons is echter de Universele verklaring van de rechten van de mens.

    Jij persoonlijk bent volledig verantwoordelijk en aansprakelijk voor wat jij op Todon.nl plaatst. Zonder enkele uitzondering en of je nu een pseudoniem/alias gebruikt of niet. In andere woorden: wij van Todon.nl en van het Mastodon-project in zijn geheel zijn niet verantwoordelijk en aansprakelijk voor wat jij hier publiceert in welke vorm dan ook.

    Wij tolereren onder andere geen racisme, seksisme, homofobie, transfobie, en andere vormen van discriminatie, geen (seksueel) misbruik van minder- en meerderjarigen, oproep tot en verheerlijking van geweld, geen rechts- en religieus extremisme, niet het lastig vallen van mensen, en uiteraard geen spam. Wij houden ten allen tijde het recht om jouw account het zwijgen op te leggen of te blokkeren. We zijn gelukkig heel tolerant en hebben de vrijheid van meningsuiting hoog in het vaandel staan, en denken daarom altijd twee keer na voordat we daartoe overgaan. Gebruik de rapporteerfunctie wanneer jij denkt dat iemand op deze Mastodon-server zich niet aan onze richtlijnen houdt.

    Auteursrecht

    Alles wat jij toot is van jou en blijft van jou. Je bent vrij om jouw toots onder elke soort licentie vrij te geven. Wij adviseren om een Creative Commons-licentie te gebruiken. Dit kan je dan het beste in het kort in jouw bio kenbaar maken. Wanneer je geen licentie kenbaar maakt dan geldt de Nederlandse auteurswet, wat inhoudt dat alle rechten bij jou liggen. Werk van anderen valt uiteraard niet onder jouw auteursrecht en het gebruik daarvan is volledig jouw risico. Stel je dus goed op de hoogte van het auteursrecht op werk van derden. Voor ingesloten inhoud (embedded content) en citaten gelden meestal soepelere voorwaarden.

    Garantie

    Todon.nl en het Mastodon-project kunnen op geen enkele manier aansprakelijk worden gesteld voor geleden schade. Todon.nl en het Mastodon-project doen hard hun best om fatale server- en software-problemen te voorkomen, maar we kunnen dit nooit ofte nimmer garanderen.

    Bovenstaande tekst kan door ons aangepast worden. Controleer daarom regelmatig of je je nog in bovenstaande voorwaarden kunt vinden.

    Email: admin@todon.nl

    Admin: @admin@todon.nl

    babuu.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Babuuï¼ˆãƒãƒ–ãƒ¼ï¼‰

    Users: 266 . Toots: 9191 . Connections: 210 . Language: English

    ã€Babuuã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€‘

    è‚²å…ã®åˆé–“ã®ä¸€æ¯ã«ã€ãƒãƒã•ã‚“ãƒ‘ãƒ‘ã•ã‚“é”ã®ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ã€ãœã²ã”åˆ©ç”¨ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    More Info... â– æœ€ä½é™ã®åˆ©ç”¨ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    ãŸã¨ãˆãã‚ŒãŒã‹ã‚ã„ã„èµ¤ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã§ã‚‚ã€å±€éƒ¨ã®å†™ã‚Šè¾¼ã‚“ã å†™çœŸã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯NGã§ã™ã€‚

    R18ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ãŠæ§ãˆãã ã•ã„ã€‚åˆ¤æ–­ãŒé›£ã—ã„å ´åˆã¯ç©æ¥µçš„ã«CWã‚„NSFWã‚’æŠ•ç¨¿æ™‚ã«ã«æ´»ç”¨ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

    ãã®ä»–å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã«åã™ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    â– ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    Babuuå†…éƒ¨å‘ã‘ã‚¢ãƒŠã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰è¡Œã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Babuu(@Babuuclub)

    â– ç®¡ç†è€…ã¨ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›å…ˆ

    Babuu(@itacchiku)

    ã¾ã§ã”é€£çµ¡ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    â– ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã—ãŸQ&A;

    hackers.town

    about

    preview

    join

    The Gibson Mainframe

    Users: 190 . Toots: 3419 . Connections: 510 . Language: English

    Rules?

    1. Just be cool. Don't fuck the place up... We can have nice things... Don't be a jackass to others.

    2. Oh, and please don't try to Pwn it. I'm sure anyone with Kuang Grade Mark Eleven Penetration Programs could if they try...You'd be proving nothing at all.

    3. If you need to "TOOT" more than 500 characters, please do not. instead, create a QR Code for the Toot, and post the QR code. It's the 21st century... stop living like savages.

    Anyhow any of you looking for a new arcology... feel free to register.

    There are no edible cookies.

    More Info... Ultimately, I am not doing this to be more hardcore than others. I just want to contribute to a federation that I believe represents the natural path of the Web as it was before the Megacorps took over the sprawl.

    You see, it is being run on an Azure instance that is paid for by a monthly MSDN credit... It is paid for by the man, to fight the man.

    This pleases me greatly. Punk as fuck.

    I will codify rules if and when it becomes a problem.

    If illegal activity happens, I will not protect others. Call me selfish, but I have a family to support. I am hosting this because I like it. I will abide by the laws of the applicable nation and locale.

    Email: thegibson@m4squared.com

    Admin: @hackers.town

    boredom.land

    about

    preview

    join

    ğŸ’¤.ğŸŒ

    Users: 35 . Toots: 74 . Connections: 284 . Language: English

    boredom.land

    More Info... Boredom Land Rules

    Be nice

    No harassment or stalking

    No advertising

    No untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    No untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    No racism

    No sexism

    No discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    No xenophobia or violent nationalism

    No sexual depictions of children

    No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union

    If you harass another user, you will be warned and/or banned.

    Privacy

    Your data will not be shared with anyone.

    About this instance This instance runs a fork of Mastodon based off tagged releases on Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS. The server is a Digital Ocean VPS near NYC.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    linuxrocks.online

    about

    preview

    join

    LinuxRocks.Online

    Users: 433 . Toots: 3322 . Connections: 550 . Language: English

    Linux Community Group Community-driven instance for people who love linux
    This instance is dedicated to Linux and technologies.
    Some rules for this Instance.
    When you post something offensive it shows up in the Local feed. Since this instance is dedicated to Linux and a Collaboration of technologies we do not tolerate obscene behavior. As we oppose the idea of censorship we also do not want a toxic area for our users.
    Remember Mastodon is suppose to work as each instance being a subreddit that's the point of the local feed. As we do enjoy the off-topic conversation the main voice should be around Linux and technologies.
    Remember you have the ability to only post to your followers then it will not show up in the local feed or even post directly to a given user within the mastodon network.

    Linux Community Group

    Email: support@linuxrocks.online

    Admin: @omnipotens@linuxrocks.online

    wandering.shop

    about

    preview

    join

    Wandering Shop

    Users: 177 . Toots: 9560 . Connections: 432 . Language: English

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct .

    Code of Conduct

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone. By joining the Wandering Shop, you're agreeing to abide by our code of conduct .

    More Info... The Wandering Shop Code of Conduct

    Welcome!

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics.

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form.

    Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

    Unacceptable Behavior

    The following behavior is not welcome anywhere in The Wandering Shop:

    Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

    Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism.

    Deliberate or persistent misgendering.

    Threats of violence.

    Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.

    Deliberate intimidation.

    Publishing any individual's address, phone number, or other private identifying information without consent.

    Sexual depictions of children.

    Unwelcome sexual attention, including sharing sexual content with specific users without consent.

    Gratuitous sexual images or behavior without a content warning.

    Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like â€œ*hug*â€ or â€œ*backrub*â€) without consent or after a request to stop.

    Publication of non-harassing private communication without consent.

    Sustained disruption of discussion.

    Continued communications with someone who's asked that you leave them alone.

    Unwelcome comments regarding a personâ€™s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment.

    The following behavior is not allowed on the public timeline:

    Graphic violent or sexual content without a content warning

    Gratuitous advertizing or spam. It's fine to promote your work, but it shouldn't be the bulk of what you share.

    Known Harassers:

    The admins may ban or silence users whom we know to be harassers or abusers, even if they have not violated the rules of this instance. The mere presence of a harasser can make past or potential victims uncomfortable, and it can put potential victims who are unaware of the person's history in particular danger. Users are encouraged to individually mute, block, and/or report accounts they don't want to see, but at our discretion, we may take the additional step of blocking or silencing someone instance-wide if we believe they endanger the safe and welcoming space we're trying to maintain.

    Reporting

    The current admins are:

    Annalee

    Phildini

    If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the admins. They'll respond as promptly as they can.

    We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom weâ€™ve received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent.

    Consequences

    Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

    If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from the wandering shop and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

    Credits and License This code of conduct is based on Annalee Flower Horne's Sample Slack Code of Conduct, which is in turn based on Geek Feminism's Community Anti-Harassment Policy.

    Email: phildini@phildini.net

    Admin: @phildini@wandering.shop

    oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une modÃ©ration active. oc.todon.fr is an actively-moderated French-speaking Mastodon instance. oc.todon.frã¯ã€ç©æ¥µçš„ã«ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ•ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¹èªåœã®Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    More Info... oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une modÃ©ration active.

    RÃ¨gles : Aucun type de harcÃ¨lement ou de (micro-)agression n'est tolÃ©rÃ©, qu'elles soient personnelles ou relÃ¨vent d'un systÃ¨me oppressif (misogynie, racisme, LGBTphobies/queerphobie, validisme, etc.). De mÃªme pour la promotion de ces oppressions et des mouvements politiques associÃ©s (masculinisme, suprÃ©macisme, etc.). La pornographie et la nuditÃ© sont tolÃ©rÃ©es pour le moment, mais doivent Ãªtre obligatoirement indiquÃ©es comme NSFW. De mÃªme pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un Content Warning appropriÃ©. Sauf exception accordÃ©e par l'admin, les publicitÃ©s sont bannies de cette instance. Enfin, vous devez respecter les lois franÃ§aises, y compris celles concernant les droits d'auteurs.

    Ã€ propos de cette instance :

    Cette instance est maintenue sur mon temps libre, et je ne souhaite pas me faire rÃ©munÃ©rer pour cela. Cependant, je dois louer le matÃ©riel, et vous pouvez me donner un coup de main sur Liberapay si vous le souhaitez.

    Pour suivre les mises Ã  jour de l'instance, abonnez-vous au compte @admin. Vous pouvez aussi me contacter via ce compte, ou par email Ã  l'adresse progval+octodon arobase progval point net.

    Mentions lÃ©gales

    Ce site web est hÃ©bergÃ© Ã  titre non lucratif par Val Lorentz sur un serveur louÃ© en France chez Online.net. Les contenus prÃ©sents sur ce site sont uniquement la responsabilitÃ© de leur auteurice.

    Email: progval+octodon@progval.net

    Admin: @val@oc.todon.fr

    You may support the hosting of this instance on Patreon.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.

    Any user not respecting these rules may get silenced or suspended.

    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    mastodon.top

    Mastodon.top

    Users: 942 . Toots: 43234 . Connections: 707 . Language: English

    FranÃ§ais :

    Mastodon.top est une instance mastodon hÃ©bergÃ©e en France par VirtuBox . Notre instance est mise Ã  jour Ã  chaque nouvelle release de mastodon. Visitez notre page Ã  propos pour en savoir plus sur les rÃ¨gles de l'instance et notre politique de modÃ©ration.

    English :

    Mastodon.top is an mastodon instance hosted in France by VirtuBox . Our instance is updated with each new release of mastodon. Visit our about page to learn more about the rules of the instance and our moderation policy.

    More Info... Welcome on mastodon.top !

    We are very happy to be a part of the mastodon project and we will do our best to keep this instance running up. The instance is updated with each new release of mastodon, and we perform a daily backup on a offsite storage. We support freedom of speech, and we will not block instances or users unless there is a good reason. We may silence users or instances to hide them in the public timeline, this way only followers will see their toots.

    Follow-us

    â€¢ Status@mastodon.top

    â€¢ Thomas @VirtuBox

    â€¢ VirtuBox

    Rules :

    â€¢

    Don't flood

    â€¢

    Respect each other

    â€¢

    Legal NSFW is allowed with Content Warning only

    â€¢

    Use content warning for spoilers

    â€¢

    Our servers are under French jurisdiction.

    What is under the hood ? :

    â€¢ 8 vCores XEON E5-1620v2

    â€¢ 8GB RAM DDR3 ECC

    â€¢ 100GB SSD + Backup storage

    Server status :

    The full monitoring dashboard is available here.

    mastodon.top is hosted by VirtuBox

    Install mastodon tutorial available on Anystack & Jesuisadmin

    Email: contact@virtubox.net

    Admin: @virtubox@mastodon.top

    tusk.schoollibraries.net

    about

    preview

    join

    School Libraries Community

    Users: 5 . Toots: 5 . Connections: 52 . Language: English

    This Instance has been created to help educators collaborate and provide feedback to establish and improve the School Libraries Resource Network

    More Info... In the nineteen-eighties, the Internet was a small, decentralized collective of computers. This is not the same Internet we know today. Today most communication flows through a small set of corporations; and thus, falls under the influence of those companies and institutions.

    Internet users now regularly submit to terms-of-service agreements that give companies license to share their personal data with other institutions, from advertisers to governments.

    Distributed solutions like Mastodon and WebSonar will allow us to start to create outposts that can grow into the better web Berners-Lee envisions, where users control where their data is stored and how itâ€™s accessed.

    For example, social networks would still run in the cloud. But you could store your data locally. Alternately, you could choose a different cloud server run by a company or community you trust.

    Email: cowboy@wisdomquest.com

    Admin: @tusk.schoollibraries.net

    mastodon.homeip.net

    Mastodon on Raspberry Pi3

    Users: 2 . Toots: 101 . Connections: 268 . Language: English

    A test instance to see how difficult it is to run up Mastodon on a Raspbery Pi3 using Raspbian as the base OS. Registrations are restricted.

    More Info... This instance is running on a Raspberry Pi3 at the end of a residential ADSL connection, on IPv6. It is purely for testing an to learn about Mastodon.

    Currently silencing pawoo.net and denying image content from there, no restriction on following people on that instance though..

    This instance does not condone the following:

    content deemed illegal in Australia (including but not limited to peodiophilia, Nazi propaganda, etc)

    Bullying of users

    Anti-social behaviours

    Racism

    Email: david.degroot@gmail.com

    Admin: @david@mastodon.homeip.net

    nog20.social

    about

    preview

    join

    noG20.social -

    Users: 37 . Toots: 106 . Connections: 114 . Language: English

    Since the 1999 Seattle WTO protests, social media has been an integral part in organizing protests. This year, the G20 will take place in Hamburg, Germany. Since 1999 the world and the web have changed. Twitter is full of fascists, sexists and misogynists. But a safe place to share ideas and discuss is more needed than ever! Thats why we created nog20.social. A safe place for everyone who wants to do something about the upcoming summit of the worldâ€˜s 20 economically and politically most powerful countries. Warning! This site will close down and will be deleted after July 10th

    more info

    More Info...

    Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    nog20.social was not designed for sensitive communication. Such communication shouldn't be discussed here, or on any other social network.

    Illegal content will be deleted, and may lead to an account suspension.

    Content Warning should be used for the following :

    violence (text and medias)

    stories including *phobias (text and medias)

    Please use the report feature if you see a rule violation. Be specific by including a comment.

    @chris

    is in charge of moderation

    Donâ€™t forget to follow @chris to stay up-to-date with problems, updates and server downtime

    We are also reachable via email: contact@nog20.social.

    GPG Fingerprint: C64A 0730 3CC0 3BD3 1141 AEA2 8EAC F5C4 5C45 C68F

    Email: contact@nog20.social

    Admin: @chris@nog20.social

    TUNERï¼ˆãƒãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒŠãƒ¼ï¼‰ã¯ãƒ‹ãƒƒãƒãƒ³æ”¾é€ãŒé‹å–¶ã™ã‚‹Mastodonã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼ˆã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ï¼‰ã§ã™ã€‚ ã€Œãƒ©ã‚¸ã‚ªã‚’ä¸­å¿ƒã¨ã—ãŸè‡ªç”±ãªã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚ã‚‹å ´ã€ã¨ã—ã¦ã€ã©ãªãŸã§ã‚‚å¹…åºƒãã”åˆ©ç”¨é ‚ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚å›½å†…ãƒ»å›½å¤–ã®ã©ã®å±€ã®ãƒ©ã‚¸ã‚ªã®è©±é¡Œã‚’ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã„ã¦ã‚‚æ§‹ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    ohai.su

    about

    preview

    join

    ohai.su mastodon

    Users: 50 . Toots: 871 . Connections: 679 . Language: English

    ohai.su

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    The use of sexualized / violent language or imagery at non-consenting parties, on the public timeline, or without the nsfw filter

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on ohai.su and to public spaces when an individual is representing ohai.su or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: lukas@fnordserver.eu

    Admin: @lutoma@ohai.su

    myriad.social

    about

    preview

    join

    myriad.social

    Users: 17 . Toots: 241 . Connections: 372 . Language: English

    " a social network where i'm not blocked...yet " - @Dre2Dee2

    myriad.social is a discrete node in the mastodon network and the gnu social -compliant fediverse .

    myriad.social is hosted in bucharest, romania and operates as a 'free-speech friendly' instance with emphasis on low moderation, high security, and full transparency, and operates under the auspices of the myriad truths project.

    More Info... myriad.social has a 'low-moderation' policy to facilitate free speech on this instance. This is not a legally binding document and may be updated and changed at our discretion, but currently our policy is to only remove content if it:

    - depicts minors in a sexually explicit manner

    - is illegal in romania (the locale where our infastructure resides)

    - disrupts the stability of the instance for other users

    please report any content which violates one of these directives. general security-related correspondence, such as vulnerability disclosures, are gladly received at security@myriad.social. myriad.social is a venture of The Myriad Truths Project, which accepts financial contributions from individual supporters and backers.

    Email: speak@myriadtruths.com

    Admin: @myriadtruths@myriad.social

    è»Šå¥½ãã®ç‚ºã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™!
    å›½ç”£ã€è¼¸å…¥è»Šã€ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ„ã‚«ãƒ¼ã€ã‚»ãƒ€ãƒ³ã€SUVã€ãƒŸãƒ‹ãƒãƒ³ä½•ã§ã‚‚OK
    æ¥½ã—ãäº¤æµã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼

    ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒè¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«åˆ¤å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªã®ã§ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„ï¼ã£ã¦æ–¹ã¯è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚„ã”ã¿ç®±ç­‰ã‚’ã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    mammouth.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    Mammouth CafÃ©

    Users: 90 . Toots: 3373 . Connections: 763 . Language: English

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.
    PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

          .----.-.     _____________________________________
     /    ( o \   /   Welcome! Bienvenue! Willkommen!   \
    '|  __ ` ||  /\  Benvenuta e benvenuto! Bainvegni!  /
     |||  ||| -'   -------------------------------------

    (In the spirit of tilde.club ...)

    English: Mammouth CafÃ© is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.
    Registrations will be limited to 640 users ( â€˜640 users ought to be enough for anybody.â€™ â€” Bill Gates ).

    FranÃ§ais: Mammouth CafÃ© est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur franÃ§ais et ouverte au monde. Nous accueillons particuliÃ¨rement volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et auteurs, les bibliothÃ©caires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ingÃ©nieures et les ingÃ©nieurs, les enseignantes et enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.
    Les inscriptions Ã  cette instance seront limitÃ©es Ã  640 utilisateurs ( Â«640 utilisateurs devraient suffire Ã  quiconque.Â» â€” Bill Gates ).

    Italiano: Mammouth CafÃ© Ã¨ un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, cosÃ¬ come tutte le menti curiose.
    Le iscrizioni su questa istanza saranno limitate a 640 utenti ( â€œ640 utenti dovrebbero bastare a chiunque.â€ â€” Bill Gates ).

    With â¤ from Atelier Mammouth .

    More Info... [ English | FranÃ§ais | Italiano ]

    (Source)

    English

    Welcome to the Mammouth CafÃ©

    In the spirit of tilde.club, here are a few, simple rules:

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.

    There is NO GUILT here. NOR SHAME. Not knowing things is fine. Not finishing them is fine too.

    We're all trying, and we're all in this together. :)

    IMPORTANT NOTE: PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

    Guidelines

    Aside from the general rules stated above, mammouth.cafe follows principles similar to those of mastodon.social, to wit:

    Absolutely no content allowed that would be illegal in Switzerland and/or France.

    No discrimination, no racism, no xenophobia, no sexism, no incitement to hate or to violence of any kind.

    We take a very dim view of stalking or harassment of other persons, here or elsewhere.

    Same goes for encouraging or inciting other people to take part in such activities.

    There are CW (Content Warning) and NSFW (Not Safe For Work) options: use them accordingly when you post.

    No hard or child/minor pornography of any kind, and keep material of an erotic nature behind CW and/or NSFW filters.

    No gore or extremely graphic violence.

    No spam, no ads, no affiliate links or excessive promotion.

    Of course, you are still welcome to announce your latest comic, self-published novella or upcoming local amateur theatre stage play to our community.

    We discourage any sort of corporate accounts: we prefer to keep it personal.

    On the other hand, educational institutions, associations and other non-profit organisations (such as e.g. amateur dramatics groups) are warmly welcome.

    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

    We discourage bots, unless they're cute or friendly.

    Robots that bang on the server will get bitcanned.

    Replicants are like any other machine: theyâ€™re either a benefit or a hazard. If theyâ€™re a benefit, itâ€™s not our problem.

    No zombies allowed under any circumstance.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    Final interpretation and implementation of these rules, guidelines and of general good netiquette, as well as all decisions that may result in account suspension and/or revocation of access, will be up to the administration of mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Support is available: ping @support@mammouth.cafe.

    For status updates, planned downtimes and so on, you can follow @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Please remember: this is essentially a one-man show for now, so do not expect an answer within the hour. If it's urgent, try asking the community: someone may be able to lend you a hand.

    We'll try not to mess things up, but we probably will at some point. If you feel that what you post here is vital to you, do make a backup somewhere else (atom feeds are available for every account) or, even better, give some of your time and knowledge to help us out with this thing.

    Handling abuse and harassment

    If you are being abused or harassed, please report the user using the "â€¦" button and then "Report."

    If you engage in abusing or harassing behavior, the administration may take any action we deem appropriate, such as an account suspension or revocation of access.

    Abuse is anything we say it is. Too bad if you disagree.

    Blocked instances

    We do block some Mastodon instances where a sizeable part of their community infringes our rules and/or guidelines with their behaviour. We do not usually comment on individual accounts muting, suspension or removal.

    Privacy and security

    We value your privacy. We are here to have fun, not to make any money by throwing ads down your throat or monetizing the shit out of your online activities. No ads or trackers are installed on this instance.

    Please understand however that mammouth.cafe's administrators have potentially access to your data, including your direct messages. The backend is also not encrypted. If this is not all right with you, this might not be the instance you're looking for.

    Finally, a word of advice: consider this a public space. Whatever you publish here is public and can (and probably will) be read by someone else or potentially be archived by the Internet Archive and/or other similar insititutions.

    We'll try to keep things reasonably safe, but if you need to keep your sources confidential or you are involved in activities that may put yourself or others in jeopardy in your country or elsewhere, please take into account the fact that we won't be able to offer you the necessary confidentiality and/or security here.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. Use a dedicated E2E application with good reputation, like e.g. Signal, for the communications you really want to keep private.

    And remember to always practice safe hex.

    About this instance

    This instance is run by Atelier Mammouth in a TARDIS somewhere/time in a big ball of wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey... stuff.

    For the time being, costs for running this server are pretty reasonable and the admin can afford them. You should absolutely not feel obliged to pay anything, but if you really wish to support this thing, you can donate something on our Liberapay account. Thank you so much!

    But remember: we only accept donations. You don't pay us for this service. Don't act like you do.

    And remember: this is FREE software and...

    â€œ...if it destroys your computer, rapes your pet, installs Win98 on your toaster and microwave, stops your pacemaker, causes sexual dysfunction, and turns your children into fucked-up trenchcoat-wearing teens carrying guns and worshipping Hitler, don't blame me because I told you it could do that and you went ahead and used it anyway.â€

    â€” James Turinsky

    â¤´

    FranÃ§ais

    Bienvenue au Mammouth CafÃ©

    Dans l'esprit du tilde.club, voici quelques rÃ¨gles simples:

    Amusez-vous. Respectez les autres. Pas de drame.

    Il n'y a PAS DE FAUTE ici. NI DE HONTE. Ne pas savoir quelque-chose c'est bien. Ne pas finir quelque-chose c'est bien aussi.

    Nous faisons de notre mieux, et nous sommes Ã  bord du mÃªme bateau. :)

    NOTE IMPORTANTE: SVP NE CASSEZ PAS LE GIBSON.

    Lignes directrices

    Outre les rÃ¨gles gÃ©nÃ©rales mentionnÃ©es ci-devant, mammouth.cafe suit des principes semblables Ã  ceux de mastodon.social, Ã  savoir:

    Nous ne permettons absolument aucun contenu qui serait illÃ©gal en Suisse et/ou France.

    Pas de discrimination, pas de racisme, pas de xÃ©nophobie, pas de sexisme, pas d'incitation Ã  la haine ou Ã  la violence d'aucune sorte.

    Nous ne tolÃ©rons pas le harcÃ¨lement ou l'intimidation d'autres personnes, ici ou ailleurs.

    Nous avons la mÃªme attitude envers quiconque encouragerait ou inciterait d'autres personnes Ã  procÃ©der de la sorte.

    Des options CW (Content Warning = avertissement de sujet sensible) et NSFW (Not Safe For Work = pas adaptÃ© Ã  un environnement de travail ou public) vous sont proposÃ©es: employez-les Ã  bon escient au moment de publier.

    Pas de pornographie dure ou impliquant des mineurs, d'aucune sorte. Veuillez Ã©galement placer vos contenus de nature Ã©rotique derriÃ¨re des filtres CW et/ou NSFW.

    Pas de contenu violent.

    Pas de spam, pas de pubs, pas de liens affiliÃ©s ou de promotion excessive.

    Bien entendu, vous pouvez sans autres annoncer votre derniÃ¨re BD, votre roman auto-publiÃ© ou le prochain spectacle de votre troupe de thÃ©Ã¢tre amateur locale Ã  notre communautÃ©.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les comptes d'entreprise: on prÃ©fÃ¨re garder une touche personnelle.

    D'autre part, nous accueillons volontiers les Ã©coles, associations et autres organisations Ã  but non lucratif (telles p.ex. les troupes de thÃ©Ã¢tre amateur).

    Pas de faux comptes personnifiant des cÃ©lÃ©britÃ©s, mÃªme dans un but humoristique.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les bots, Ã  moins qu'ils ne soient mignons ou attachants.

    Les robots qui abusent du serveur seront envoyÃ©s Ã  la casse.

    Les rÃ©pliquants sont comme les autres machines: ils sont ou bÃ©nÃ©fiques, ou nocifs. Sâ€™ils sont bÃ©nÃ©fiques, câ€™est pas notre problÃ¨me.

    Aucun zombie n'est admis, en aucun cas.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interprÃ©tation et l'application finales de ces rÃ¨gles, lignes directrices et de ce qui constitue une bonne nÃ©tiquette en gÃ©nÃ©ral, ainsi que toute dÃ©cision pouvant rÃ©sulter en la suspension et/ou la suppression d'un compte, est du seul privilÃ¨ge de l'administration de mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Vous pouvez contacter notre support en suivant ou contactant ce compte: @support@mammouth.cafe.

    Afin d'obtenir des informations sur le statut du serveur, les arrÃªts planifiÃ©s pour des mises Ã  jour, etc., vous pouvez Ã©galement suivre @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Veuillez prendre bonne note que ceci est pour l'instant un spectacle interprÃ©tÃ© et mis en scÃ¨ne par une seule et mÃªme personne. Ne vous attendez donc pas Ã  une rÃ©ponse dans l'heure qui suit. S'il s'agit d'une urgence, essayez de poser votre question Ã  l'ensemble de la communautÃ©: il se peut que quelqu'un puisse venir Ã  votre aide.

    Nous allons tÃ¢cher de ne pas gaffer, mais probablement que cela nous arrivera un jour ou l'autre. Si vous considÃ©rez ce que vous publiez ici comme absolument vital pour vous, faites-en une sauvegarde ailleurs (des flux atom sont disponibles pour chaque compte) ou, encore mieux, mettez Ã  disposition un peu de votre temps et de vos connaissances pour nous aider avec tout ceci.

    Traitement des abus et du harcÃ¨lement

    Si vous Ãªtes victime d'abus ou de harcÃ¨lement, veuillez signaler l'utilisateur Ã  l'aide du bouton "â€¦" puis "Signaler".

    Si vous avez un comportement abusif ou harcelant, l'administration peut prendre toute mesure que nous jugeons appropriÃ©e, telles une suspension de compte ou une rÃ©vocation d'accÃ¨s.

    Un abus est tout ce que nous considÃ©rons comme tel. Tant pis si vous n'Ãªtes pas d'accord.

    Instances bloquÃ©es

    Nous bloquons certaines instances de Mastodon dans les cas oÃ¹ une partie importante de leur communautÃ© enfreint nos rÃ¨gles et/ou lignes directrices avec son comportement. Nous ne faisons gÃ©nÃ©ralement aucun commentaire au sujet des comptes individuels ayant Ã©tÃ© rendus silencieux, suspendus ou supprimÃ©s.

    ConfidentialitÃ© et sÃ©curitÃ©

    Nous respectons votre vie privÃ©e. Nous sommes ici pour nous amuser, pas pour gagner de l'argent sur votre dos en vous faisant avaler des tonnes de pubs indigestes ou en monÃ©tisant Ã  longueur de journÃ©e vos activitÃ©s en ligne. Aucune publicitÃ© ou traceur n'est installÃ© sur cette instance.

    Veuillez toutefois prendre bonne note que les administrateurs de mammouth.cafe ont potentiellement accÃ¨s Ã  toutes vos donnÃ©es, y compris vos messages directs. Le backend n'est pas chiffrÃ© non plus. Si cela ne vous convient pas, ceci n'est peut-Ãªtre pas l'instance que vous recherchez.

    Enfin, un bon conseil: considÃ©rez ceci comme Ã©tant un espace public. Tout ce que vous publierez ici est public et peut Ãªtre (et probablement sera) lu par d'autres personnes ou potentiellement Ãªtre archivÃ© par l'Internet Archive et/ou d'autres insititutions similaires.

    Nous allons tÃ¢cher de maintenir une sÃ©curitÃ© raisonnable, mais si vous Ãªtes dans l'obligation d'assurer la confidentialitÃ© de vos sources ou que vos activitÃ©s risquent de mettre en pÃ©ril vous-mÃªme ou d'autres personnes dans votre pays ou ailleurs, veuillez tenir compte du fait que nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir une confidentialitÃ© et/ou sÃ©curitÃ© suffisante ici.

    En outre, pour des donnÃ©es vraiment privÃ©es envoyÃ©es entre deux personnes, Mastodon n'offre aucun chiffrement de bout en bout (end-to-end). Utilisez une application E2E dÃ©diÃ©e avec une bonne rÃ©putation, comme Signal par exemple, pour les communications que vous souhaitez vraiment garder privÃ©es.

    Et n'oubliez pas de toujours vous protÃ©ger lors de toute activitÃ© hexuelle.

    Ã€ propos de cette instance

    Cette instance est gÃ©rÃ©e par l'Atelier Mammouth depuis un TARDIS quelque-part/temps dans une sorte de grande boule de truc-machin tempo-spatio... bidule.

    Pour le moment, les coÃ»ts liÃ©s Ã  ce serveur sont plutÃ´ts raisonnables et l'administrateur peut se les permettre. Vous ne devez absolument pas vous sentir obligÃ©s Ã  payer quoi que ce soit, mais si vous dÃ©sirez vraiment soutenir cet effort, vous pouvez faire un don sur notre compte Liberapay. Merci beaucoup!

    Mais rappelez-vous: nous n'acceptons que les dons. Vous ne nous payez pas pour ce service. N'agissez pas comme si c'Ã©tait le cas.

    Et rappelez-vous: ceci est un logiciel LIBRE et...

    â€œ...s'il dÃ©truit votre ordinateur, viole votre chat, installe Win98 sur votre grille-pain et sur votre four Ã  micro-ondes, bloque votre stimulateur cardiaque, vous rend impuissant et transforme vos enfants en de foutus ados portant des vestes en cuir, brandissant des armes et adorant Hitler, ne me blamez pas car je vous avait averti qu'il pourrait faire tout Ã§a, et vous n'avez pas voulu m'Ã©couter et vous l'avez quand-mÃªme utilisÃ©.â€

    â€” James Turinsky (traduit de l'anglais)

    â¤´

    Italiano

    Benvenuta e benvenuto al Mammouth CafÃ©

    Nello spirito del tilde.club, ecco alcune regole semplici:

    Divertiti. Rispetta le altre e gli altri. Niente drammi.

    Qui NON C'Ãˆ COLPA. NÃˆ VERGOGNA. Non sapere qualche cosa va benissimo. Non finire qualche cosa va pure benissimo.

    Facciamo del nostro meglio, e siamo a bordo della stessa nave. :)

    NOTA IMPORTANTE: NON PIRATARE IL GIBSON, GRAZIE.

    Linee direttrici

    Oltre alle regole generali di qui sopra, mammouth.cafe segue principi simili a quelli di mastodon.social, vale a dire:

    Non permettiamo assolutamente nessun contenuto illegale in Svizzera e/o Francia.

    Nessuna discriminazione, nessun razzismo, nessuna xenofobia, nessun sessismo, nessun incitamento all'odio o alla violenza di alcun genere.

    Non toleriamo molestie o intimidazioni di altre persone, qui o altrove.

    Lo stesso vale per l'incorraggiamento o l'incitamento verso altre persone a prendere parte a tali attivitÃ .

    Ti proponiamo delle opzioni CW (Content Warning = avviso di contenuto sensibile) e NSFW (Not Safe For Work = non adatto ad un ambiente di lavoro o pubblico): utilizzale come si deve al momento di pubblicare.

    Nessuna pornografia dura o minorile di alcun tipo. Inoltre, pubblica il tuo materiale di natura erotica dietro filtri CW e/o NSFW.

    Nessun contenuto violento.

    Nessuno spam (pubblicitÃ  non richiesta), nessuna pubblicitÃ , nessun rinvio (link) affiliato o promozione eccessiva.

    Naturalmente, se vuoi annunciare il tuo nuovo fumetto, il tuo ultimo romanzo autopubblicato o il prossimo spettacolo della compagnia teatrale amatoriale del tuo quartiere alla nostra communitÃ , non c'Ã¨ nessun problema.

    Scorraggiamo i conti aziendali: preferiamo mantenere un tocco personale.

    D'altra parte, accogliamo ben volentieri scuole, associazioni e altre organizzazioni non a scopo di lucro (come ad esempio una compagnia di teatro amatoriale).

    Nessun conto fasullo che impersno personaggi famosi, anche se solo a scopo umoristico.

    Scorraggiamo i bots, a meno che siano carini o amicali.

    I robot che abusano del server verranno rottamati.

    I replicanti sono come ogni altra macchina: possono essere un vantaggio o un rischio. Se sono un vantaggio, non sono un problema nostro.

    Non sono ammessi zombi, sotto nessuna circostanza.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interpretazione e l'applicazione finali di queste regole, linee direttrici e di ciÃ² che costituisce una buona netichetta in generale, cosÃ¬ come ogni decisione che puÃ² risultare in una sospensione del conto e/o una revocazione dell'accesso, sono in ultima istanza il privilegio dell'amministrazione di mammouth.cafe.

    Supporto

    Puoi seguire o contattare @support@mammouth.cafe per il supporto.

    Per informazioni sullo stato del server, sospensioni pianificate del servizio, ecc., puoi seguire @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Prendi buona nota del fatto che questo Ã¨ per ora uno spettacolo diretto e interpretato da una sola persona. Non attenderti dunque ad una risposta nell'ora che segue. Se la tua domanda Ã¨ urgente, prova a porrla alla communitÃ : qualcun'altro potrebbe darti una mano.

    Cercheremo di non combinare guai, ma probabilmente lo faremo ad un momento o ad un altro. Se credi che ciÃ² che pubblichi qui Ã¨ di importanza vitale per te, fanne una salvaguardia da qualche altra parte (ci sono dei feed atom a disposizione per ogni conto) o, ancora meglio, offri un po' del tuo tempo e delle tue conoscenze per darci una mano con tutto questo.

    Trattamento di abusi e molestie

    Se sei vittima di abusi o molestie, segnala l'utente utilizzando il pulsante "â€¦" e poi "Segnalare".

    Se hai un comportamento abusivo o offensivo, l'amministrazione puÃ² intraprendere qualsiasi azione che riterrÃ  opportuna, come una sospensione del conto o una revoca dell'accesso.

    Abuso Ã¨ ciÃ² che noi consideriamo come tale. Se non sei d'accordo: peccato.

    Istanze bloccate

    Procediamo al blocco di alcune istanze Mastodon nei casi in cui una parte significativa delle loro communitÃ  violi le nostre regole e/o linee direttrici con il loro comportamento. In genere non commentiamo su conti individuali resi silenziosi, sospesi o soppressi.

    Privacy e sicurezza

    Rispettiamo la tua privacy. Siamo qui per divertirci, non per fare soldi sul tuo gobbo faccendoti inghiottire tonnelate di pubblicitÃ  indigeste o monetizzando tutto il giorno (e la notte) le tue attivitÃ  online. Nessuna pubblicitÃ  o tracker sono presenti su questa istanza.

    Tuttavia, ricordati che gli amministratori di mammouth.cafe hanno potenzialmente accesso a tutti i tuoi dati, inclusi i tuoi messaggi diretti. Inoltre, il backend non Ã¨ crittografato. Se questo non ti si addice, questa non Ã¨ l'istanza che stai cercando.

    Infine, un buon consiglio: considera tutto questo come se fosse uno spazio pubblico. Tutto ciÃ² che pubblicherai qui, sarÃ  esposto al pubblico e potrÃ  essere (e probabilmente sarÃ ) letto da altre persone oppure potrÃ  potenzialmente essere archiviato dall'Internet Archive e/o altre istutuzioni affini.

    Cercheremo di mantenere un livello di sicurezza ragionevole, ma se ti trovi in una situazione dove hai l'obbligo di mantenere la riservatezza delle tue fonti oppure nella quale le tue attivitÃ  rischiano di mettere in pericolo te stesso o altre persone, nel tuo paese o altrove, ti preghiamo di notare che non siamo in grado di offrirti delle condizioni di privacy e/o di sicurezza sufficienti.

    Inoltre, per inviare dati in modo veramente privato tra due persone, Mastodon non offre alcuna crittografia da un capo all'altro (end-to-end). Utilizza un'applicazione dedicata E2E con buona reputazione, come Signal per esempio, per le comunicazioni che veramente desideri mantenere private.

    E ricordati di sempre proteggerti durante ogni rapporto hexuale.

    A proposito di questa istanza

    Questa istanza Ã¨ gestita dall'Atelier Mammouth in un TARDIS da qualche parte/tempo in una specie di grande sfera di roba spazio-tempo... coso.

    Per il momento, i costi di questa istanza sono piuttosto ragionevoli e l'amministratore se li puÃ² permettere. Non devi assolutamente sentirti obbligato a pagare qualsiasi cosa, ma se veramente vuoi sostenere questo sforzo, puoi fare un dono sul nostro conto Liberapay. Grazie mille!

    Ma ricordati: accettiamo solo doni. Non ci paghi per questo servizio. Non agire come se fosse il caso.

    E ricordati: questo Ã¨ un software LIBERO e...

    â€œ...se distrugge il tuo computer, violenta il tuo gatto, installa Win98 sul tuo tostapane e sul tuo microonde, blocca il tuo stimolatore cardiaco, ti provoca disfunzioni sessuali e trasforma i tuoi bambini in fottuti adolescenti che indossano capotti e brandiscono armi adulando Hitler, non dare la colpa a me perchÃ¨ ti avevo detto che poteva fare proprio questo, e tu non hai voluto ascoltarmi e lo hai utilizzato lo stesso.â€

    â€” James Turinsky (tradotto dall'inglese)

    â¤´

    We trust you have received the usual lecture from the local System Administrator. It usually boils down to these three things:

    Respect the privacy of others.

    Think before you type.

    With great power comes great responsibility.

    We forget it all

    We don't know mercy

    Don't expect us

    We are 0day Agency

    This mastodon instance is information security related. But we are not the ones who take it too seriously. If shit happens, it happens.

    Don't trust anyone here. If shit happens to you, we don't care. It's your fault!

    Cry me a river!

    Mastodon

    Users: 7256 . Toots: 78174 . Connections: 1401 . Language: English

    This might be one of the best pieces of software for microblogging you can get right now. We here at tchncs.de are proud to be one of the first instances of Mastodon! Quick updates ensured. Mastodon is compatible and connected to the GNUsocial network.

    More Info...

    Above statistics are specific to this server.

    Guidelines

    On social.tchncs.de our primary directive is: â†’ "Be nice to each other!"

    Please remember there are real people on the other side of the screen, and those people may have different feelings and opinions and experiences than you do. Some of them may be tired or having a bad day. Or you might.

    You don't have to agree with someone to be civil to them. If you can't be civil to someone, leave them alone.

    If you don't wish to interact with someone, or see any of their posts, there are tools at your disposal including mute and block functions.

    If someone's posts make you angry or upset, take some time to calm down before you reply. You might also try simply excusing yourself from a conversation and ask them to untag you if you no longer wish to discuss a topic.

    When someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. If you feel like you can't control your urge to respond to that person, use the block or mute feature so you won't see their posts and be tempted.

    Keep in mind that while you cannot control other people's behavior, you are still responsible for your own conduct, even if you feel someone was rude to you or someone else.

    We will not allow abusive or disruptive conduct by or toward users on social.tchncs.de. This includes continuing to engage in conversation with someone who has specifically requested you leave them alone, inciting other users to engage with that person on your behalf, aggregating and posting another person's personal information without their consent, and inciting others to engage with that person on other platforms. Blocking someone and then sitting on the other side of a block and continuing to talk about that person is also a provoking behavior.

    Before you post, think about whether this is the kind of thing you would like to see (or would like your mom or kids to see) in the public timeline. There are post visibility settings that give you some control over which timelines your post appears in, and also CW and NSFW buttons to hide specific text and images in your post. Be a good social media neighbor and use these functions when appropriate.

    Content not allowed on social.tchncs.de

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Content which will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    We will also remove any content we judge to be hateful toward specific individuals or groups, or intended to cause or incite harm from the public timeline.

    This guideline is intentionally vague because we do not intend to play "rules lawyer" on the subject of what it is and isn't okay to say about people. A good rule of thumb is, if you're about to say something you think might fall foul of this rule, you probably shouldn't say it. â˜º

    Email: tchncs@vivaldi.net

    Admin: @milan@social.tchncs.de

    Quelques rÃ¨gles pour bien vivre

    Toutes les langues sont autorisÃ©es sur cette instance

    Evitez le flood/spam

    Merci d'utiliser la fonction NSFW lorsqu'il s'agit d'un contenu partiellement autorisÃ©

    Il est strictement interdit de parler/poster du contenu :

    Ã  caractÃ¨re sexuel (ce qui est en revanche autorisÃ©e : l'art (par exemple : une femme ou un homme dÃ©nudÃ©Â·e peintÂ·e, une statue), pas d'organe gÃ©nital apparent (privilÃ©giez tout de mÃªme l'utilisation de la fonction NFSW).)

    insulter, discriminer, violence verbale, menacer, chantage, harceler et tout ce qui a un lien avec la cyberviolence

    parler de sujets sensibles (rÃ©ligieux, terrorisme, etc...)

    Comptes parodiques autorisÃ©s. Veuillez juste le signaler.

    Aucun compte ne sera clos sans une bonne raison

    Amusez-vous et faites-vous de nouveaux amis ğŸ™‚

    RÃ©tention des donnÃ©es

    La loi demande Ã  ce que les donnÃ©es de connexion soient conservÃ©es 1 an. Parmi, ces informations, nous stockons :

    Votre adresse IP

    Votre nom d'utilisateur

    Les appels serveurs

    La date de la requÃªte

    Ses donnÃ©es permettront en cas de problÃ¨me, de retrouver toute piste en cas de litige.

    Droit Ã  l'oubli

    Pour le moment, il est impossible de supprimer un compte d'une instance mais il est en revanche possible de suspendre son compte.

    En attendant que cette fonctionnalitÃ© soit disponible, nous proposons aux utilisateurs de faire une demande de suspension de compte avec l'ajout de votre adresse e-mail dans notre liste d'utilisateurs Ã  supprimer. La suspension du compte aura pour effet de dÃ©-indexer le compte et les toots de l'utilisateur concernÃ©. Ainsi, nous ferons le nÃ©cessaire (avec confirmation du propriÃ©taire du compte), de supprimer le compte de l'utilisation ainsi que ses toots et mÃ©dias lorsque que cette fonctionnalitÃ© sera disponible.

    ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ç‰©äº‹ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã€æ„Ÿæƒ³ã€è€ƒå¯Ÿãªã©ã€ã‚ãªãŸã®æ„Ÿæƒ…ã‚„æ€æƒ³ã‚’â€â€æœ¬å¿ƒâ€â€ã§ã©ã‚“ã©ã‚“ã€Œãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã€ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼
