    myfreckle.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Myfreckle - Welcome

    Users: 66 . Toots: 110 . Connections: 197 . Language: English

    myfreckle.com

    More Info... About myfreckle.com:

    We believe Social Media is changing the world.

    This instance is for people who are fascinated with and enjoy being part of the change that Social Media is bringing.

    This instance has been set-up and continues to be maintained by professional developers. This instance is hosted on Amazon AWS infrastructure. We realise dependable infrastructure is important for a Social Media network to remain useful.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of myfreckle.com; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    General Rules and Guidelines

    Be nice to each other.

    Use common sense.

    Corporate accounts are welcome, but donâ€™t overdo the posting and no direct advertising.

    Parody accounts are fine (identify your account as a parody), impersonation of others is not allowed.

    Bots are not allowed to post to the public timeline unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Automated posting is not allowed unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Content / behaviour that is illegal in the United States of America, Canada, France, Germany, United Kingdom or Australia is not permitted on this instance. Breach of this will result in a permanent ban of the account.

    The following content will be removed from the timeline and will get your account permanently banned:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    The administrators reserves the right of admission to this instance and the right to change the above from time to time except where limited by law. If there are any comments, questions please email the admins at freckle@myfreckle.com - please be patient as a response may take some time.

    Email: freckle@myfreckle.com

    Admin: @myfreckle.com

    friends.tennis

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 20 . Toots: 318 . Connections: 40 . Language: Japanese

    ãƒ†ãƒ‹ã‚¹å¥½ããŒé›†ã¾ã‚‹Twitterãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¯ãªSNSã§ã™ã€‚é›‘è«‡ãƒ»å®Ÿæ³ãƒ»ãƒ†ãƒ‹ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ•ãƒ­ã‚°ãªã©ã§æ¥½ã—ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼

    friends.tennisã¯BuildManåˆåŒä¼šç¤¾ãŒé‹å–¶ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Email: support@friends.tennis

    Admin: @buildman@friends.tennis

    slime.global

    about

    preview

    join

    Global Slime Industries

    Users: 27 . Toots: 18476 . Connections: 757 . Language: English

    a safe space for my friends and myself.
    mail: u@fuk.re
    fediverse: @tom@slime.global / @slime@mastodon.social

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of slime.global; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    All users, local and remote, are expected to adhere to the following interaction principles:

    Respect boundaries as placed by others

    Be respectful/apologize if someone tells you that you cross a boundary accidentally

    Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary

    If you are on either side of this and are worried about the situation escalating, contact the admin or a mod

    Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and other such topics

    All users, local and remote, will be considered in the wrong in a conversation that goes sour if they participate in the following:

    Microaggressions ("not all men", white/man/cis-splaining, etc)

    Demanding education on problematic behavior from a non-admin/moderator

    Skirting the lines of being a troll

    Not tagging potentially sensitive replies

    This is not an exhaustive list. If any of these don't make sense, please speak with an admin or moderator- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Advertising

    News bots that do not tag upsetting content

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany, Austria and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: u@fuk.re

    Admin: @tom@slime.global

    oldbytes.space

    about

    preview

    join

    OldBytes Space - Mastodon

    Users: 12 . Toots: 4380 . Connections: 504 . Language: English

    Full of old bytes.
    Please don't demagnetize the core memory, thanks.
    Do you like old hardware ? Do you use them ?
    Perfect you're welcome here !
    Please remember that Mastodon can still have bugs !
    Don't forget to read the rules .

    More Info... Jump: Welcome ! - Rules - Specs - Terms

    Welcome !

    This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.

    It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.

    There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.

    I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

    I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

    Rules

    This instance has some rules, of course.

    First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...

    Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.

    This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.

    People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

    There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance.

    If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, or an Orange Website techbro, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.

    This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.

    The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.

    Please report them if you see them.

    We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.

    Specs

    Currently running on Scaleway hardware.

    One VC1S with Nginx, Mastodon WEB, Mastodon Sidekiq and Minio as a S3 assets manager endpoint.

    One VC1S with PostgreSQL, latest version from PostgreSQL APT repository and Redis.

    You can look at the Grafana (Telegraf) graphs metrics HERE.

    Backups are taken one time per day using Borg for whole Mastodon checkout, assets (may change in future), postgresql and redis. Plus one backup every three hours for PostgreSQL & Redis.

    They are stored in a separate server on a Dedibox.

    Terms

    The server is hosted in France

    The only logs created are the ones from: nginx, mastodon (nodejs, puma web server, sidekiq) and minio (assets).

    There is no retention currently in place except the by-default on Debian.

    Email: dashie@sigpipe.me

    Admin: @dashie@oldbytes.space

    norlanders.masto.host

    • Small, intimate user-base of good folks.

    Instance Guidelines

      Be cool.
      Don't do anything illegal .
      Don't be a dick.

    Mastodon.co.nz - Mastodon New Zealand

    Users: 50 . Toots: 52 . Connections: 133 . Language: English

    "Mastodon is a free, open-source social network. A decentralized alternative to commercial platforms, it avoids the risks of a single company monopolizing your communication. Pick a server that you trust â€” whichever you choose, you can interact with everyone else. Anyone can run their own Mastodon instance and participate in the social network seamlessly."

    FAQ

    • Q : ã“ã“ã£ã¦ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pã®æºœã¾ã‚Šå ´ãªã®ï¼Ÿ
    • é•ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ãŸã—ã‹ã«ä»Šã®ã¨ã“ã‚ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pã®ã¤ã¶ã‚„ããŒå¤šã‚ã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ã®æ–¹ã‚‚æ°—ã«ã›ãšã‚¬ãƒ³ã‚¬ãƒ³æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼ã‚€ã—ã‚çŸ¥ã£ã¦ã‚‹ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pã«ãƒªãƒ—é€ã£ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚
    • Q : åˆã‚ã¦ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã—ãŸã‚‰ã©ã†ã—ãŸã‚‰ã„ã„ï¼Ÿ
    • ã¾ãšã¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³(LTL)ã«ãŠè¶Šã—ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ä¸¼ã§ã¯ä»Šã®ã¨ã“ã‚ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã—ã‚ã£ã¦ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã§è©±ã™ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã€LTLã§ãƒãƒ£ãƒƒãƒˆé¢¨ã«ä¼šè©±ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒä¸»æµã§ã™ã€‚ã–ã£ã¨çœºã‚ãªãŒã‚‰æ°—ãŒå‘ã„ãŸã‚‰æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚“ã§ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
    • Q : ç§ã®æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³(LTL)ã«æµã‚Œãªã„ã‚“ã§ã™ãŒ...
    • iOSã®Amaroqã®å ´åˆã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯LTLã«ã¯æµã‚Œãªã„è¨­å®šã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã€ŒDefault post to publicã€ã«å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã¨LTLã«æµã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã‚ˆã€‚

    More Info... Vocalodon (ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ä¸¼ã€ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ãƒ‰ãƒ³) ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ãŒé›†ã†Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã“ã§ã„ã†ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ã¨ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®äººãŸã¡ã‚’æŒ‡ã—ã¾ã™

    ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­Pã€çµµå¸«ã€ä½œè©ã€å‹•ç”»ã€MMDãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãªã©ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­æ¥½æ›²ã‚„é–¢é€£ä½œå“ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãªã©ã‚’åˆ¶ä½œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    Mastodonã«ã¯å¹´é½¢ç¢ºèªæ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ç¾æ™‚ç‚¹(2017å¹´4æœˆ)ã§ã¯18ç¦ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯ä¸€å¾‹ã§ç¦æ­¢ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Mastodon

    Users: 321 . Toots: 656 . Connections: 362 . Language: English

    This is a free and open Mastodon instance ran by the French web tech agency ELAO .
    If you have questions about how this works or how to create your own instance, feel free to reach out.
    If you see any abusive behavior, please report it. Each report is reviewed personally. Please treat each other with respect.

    glitch.social

    about

    preview

    join

    G L I T C H

    Users: 80 . Toots: 14268 . Connections: 755 . Language: English

    UNSTABLE BUT FRIENDLY

    BE WARNED this instance may actually be unstable at times. It will likely be used for experimenting with settings and tweaks to Mastodon. So the place may experience outages, not federate reliably with the rest of the world, have posts go missing, or other technical faults. As such it's meant to be a chill, maybe kinda playful place. Time to see what we can do with this thing! Time to Ë¥âˆ€IÆ†OS HÆ†âŠ¥IË¥â…

    This instance also has domain level blocks on numerous others, using the block list found here .

    followbots from other instances will be blocked. please report them

    Some rules

    • Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
    • Racist, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
    • You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)
    • try to be kind
    • no non-sentient bots until further notice
    • no shit that's illegal in Canada
    • animated gifs should always be marked sensitive/NSFW and identified as animated gifs (for now let's say just putting 'gif' in the text of the toot is sufficient), because they can cause serious problems for people

    some guidelines

    • stuff here is impermanent but i still want this to be as safe a space as we can reasonably make it. let's keep common triggers and angry/ranty/grumpy toots behind CWs
    • free speech maximalists can kindly fuck off. there are instances where that is a priority. this is not one of them.
    • all languages are welcome!

    the privacy stuff in the 'terms' isn't what it should be, but no time to change it yet. this instance's data will not be sold or traded or whatever.

    Contact

    beatrix bitrot

    @bea

    Business e-mail:

    haha@noooope.com

    Email: haha@noooope.com

    Admin: @bea@glitch.social

    mastodon.sandwich.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Sandwich

    Users: 323 . Toots: 1043 . Connections: 513 . Language: English

    This is Sandwich 's public Mastodon instance. Welcome! Moderation is at our discretion - please see below.
    We recommend that you read the #MastodonSandwich hashtag and @sungo's toot about Mastodon's risks . Feel free to chat with us about risk, privacy, security, and other questions.
    We support free and controversial speech, but also wish to maintain a pleasant environment. We forbid trolling, harassment, bigotry, and spam. Please use the Content Warning feature for NSFW or traumatic topics. When handling problems, we try to consider all of the circumstances, and to be reasonable and understanding.
    We will not sell your data, and will make every reasonable attempt to combat coerced disclosure of your data or our logs.

    Contact

    James Renken

    @jrenken

    Business e-mail:

    support@sandwich.net

    Email: support@sandwich.net

    Admin: @jrenken@mastodon.sandwich.net

    Kibousoft Now - A Mastodon Instance

    Users: 58 . Toots: 527 . Connections: 437 . Language: English

    Kibousoft Nowã¯ã€æã‚‰ãåˆã‚ã¦Facebookãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã«å¯¾å¿œã—ãŸMastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚GitHubãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã«ã‚‚å¯¾å¿œã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ å›½å†…æ³•äººé‹å–¶ã€‚å®‰å¿ƒã®.co.jpãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã€‚ é›»æ°—é€šä¿¡äº‹æ¥­è€…å±Šå‡ºç•ªå· A-27-14629 åˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„

    More Info...

    é‹å–¶ä¼šç¤¾ï¼šåˆåŒä¼šç¤¾ãã¼ã†ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆ

    http://kibousoft.co.jp

    ã“ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã¾ã§

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

    xhr.open('GET', 'https://viav6.kibousoft.co.jp/', true);

    xhr.onreadystatechange = function(){

    if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200){

    var dom = document.getElementById('kibousoft-viav6');

    dom.innerHTML = xhr.responseText;

    }

    };

    xhr.send(null);

    åˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„

    ç¬¬ï¼‘æ¡ã€€ç·å‰‡

    1 ã€€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ»ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã€ŒKibousoft Nowã€ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¦æœ¬ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆä¸Šã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ãŸæŠ•ç¨¿ã€ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã€å…¬é–‹ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®è‡ªå·±ç´¹ä»‹ãªã©ã®ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã€ãŠã‚ˆã³ç”»åƒã‚„å‹•ç”»ãƒ»éŸ³å£°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãªã©ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã«ä»˜éšçš„ã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿(ä»¥ä¸‹ã€ŒæŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã€ã¨ã„ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚)ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€è‡ªã‚‰ãŒæŠ•ç¨¿åˆã¯é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®é©æ³•ãªæ¨©åˆ©ã‚’æœ‰ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã€åŠã³æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ãŒç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’ä¾µå®³ã—ãªã„ã“ã¨ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€è¡¨æ˜ã—ã€ä¿è¨¼ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for all Redbrick users to talk and connect with others.

    Redbrick is DCU's Computer Networking society. We host events for everything computing related this ranges from; how to setup your own website and storing your photos online to System Administration and Computer Programming Tutorials. We also host a number of services for our membership.

    resipsa.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Microblogging for Legal Professionals

    Users: 19 . Toots: 132 . Connections: 331 . Language: English

    resipsa.social is a microblogging platform, or more accurately an instance of the Mastodon platform, for legal professionals.

    This instance was originally intended to be for legal professionals, but all who respect the rules are welcome.

    In general, the rules are simple: be respectful of others -- their privacy, their content, and their right to be free from harassment.

    Don't be a bad seed.

    Email: andrew@leahey.org

    Admin: @Andrew@resipsa.social

    scotland.computer

    about

    preview

    join

    Scottish Tech Mastodon

    Users: 29 . Toots: 102 . Connections: 144 . Language: English

    An instance of the Mastodon social network for the tech/startup scene in Scotland.

    The goal is to gather all the web/tech people in one place to make for an interesting local timeline.

    You don't need to actually be Scottish or in Scotland! Friends, the curious, and all of good will are welcome!

    More Info... This is an open instance of the Mastodon social network, aimed at gathering the Scottish web/tech/startup scene in one local timeline.

    You don't need to be Scottish or in Scotland to be welcome here! If you're interested in the tech scene, or friends with people here, you're more than welcome!

    Code of Conduct

    This will be fleshed out in more detail at a later date, but the summary is:

    Show respect for people's personal space. If they don't want you in their mentions, leave.

    Do not use this platform to harass, stalk, troll, spam, or otherwise be a dick.

    No nazis.

    If you are experiencing harassment or spamming, please report the offending account and I'll investigate. If you feel at risk or otherwise want to contact the admin directly, I can be reached at john@scotland.computer.

    The mgmt reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason, except as prohibited by law.

    Email: john@scotland.computer

    Admin: @semanticist@scotland.computer

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ€ãƒ«ãƒˆã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®è©±é¡Œã‚’æ‰±ã†ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    ç´”æ„›ãƒ»ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚²ãƒ¼ã‚’ä¸­å¿ƒã«ã‚ªãƒ¼ã‚¬ã‚¹ãƒˆã«é™ã‚‰ãšæ§˜ã€…ãªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“ã®ä½œå“ã«ã¤ã„ã¦è©±ã—åˆã„ãŸã„äººã®ãŸã‚ã«ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

    More Info... å„ç¨®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¯ã€notification@mail.august-don.siteã‚ˆã‚ŠãŠé€ã‚Šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    æ³¨æ„äº‹é …

    ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã®è² è·ç­‰ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ä½•æ™‚ã§ã‚‚ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ãŒä¸­æ–­ãƒ»çµ‚äº†ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã«è² è·ã®ã‹ã‹ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºãƒ»ä»–ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¸ã®è¿·æƒ‘è¡Œç‚ºã‚’è¡Œã†ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€å‡çµã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã¯ã€BOTé€ä¿¡å…ƒã¨ã—ã¦ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆä½œæˆã¨åˆ©ç”¨ã‚’ç¦ã˜ã¾ã™ã€‚

    18ç¦ç”»åƒãªã©ã¯ã€å¿…ãšNSFWã‚’ä»˜ä¸ã™ã‚‹ã»ã‹ã€æ³•çš„ã«èªã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œãªã„ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã®ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç¦ã˜ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã§ã€ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹å†…ã®æ§˜å­ã‚’äº‹å‰ã«è¦‹ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    mel.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon for Melburnians

    Users: 9 . Toots: 40 . Connections: 136 . Language: English

    mel.social is a small mastodon instance aimed primarily at Melbourne and Victoria based people who want a safe digital space to communicate and be creative. members are encouraged to communication and share their work as long as it adheres to our Code of Conduct

    Please make sure you've familiarised yourself with our Code of Conduct before signing up and if our rules aren't to your liking then there are many other instances that may be better suited to your needs.

    Follow @status for status & maintenance updates. Instance admin is @ajfisher

    More Info... mel.social Code of Conduct

    As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher)

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and graphic violence

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    This instance adheres to the TootCat Code of Conduct and follows the Toot CafÃ© list of blocked instances .

    Users: 1413 . Toots: 32486 . Connections: 607 . Language: Japanese

    mstdn.guruï¼ˆã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ‰ãƒ³ã¨å‘¼ã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã„ï¼‰ ã¯ã€ä¸»ã«ãƒãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ£ã‚¹ãƒˆ backspace.fm ã‚„ drikin YouTubeãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒãƒ«ãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ã«å‘ã‘ãŸã€æƒ…å ±å…±æœ‰ãƒ»äº¤æµãƒ»ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ç›®çš„ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã§ã™ã€‚ å‚åŠ è€…å…¨ã¦ã«æ¥½ã—ã‚“ã§é ‚ãã“ã¨ã‚’ã‚ã–ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ç¾åœ¨ã€ç™»éŒ²ã¯åˆ¶é™ã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ã„ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã®è² è·çŠ¶æ³ã«å¿œã˜ã¦å¾ã€…ã«åºƒã’ã¦ã„ãäºˆå®šã§ã™ã€‚ç™»éŒ²ã®å‘ŠçŸ¥ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€backspace.fmã®ãƒãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ£ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚„ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã§ãŠä¼ãˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    More Info... mstdn.guru ã¯ã€ä¸»ã« #backspacefm ã‚„ drikin YouTubeãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒãƒ«ãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ã«ãŠã‘ã‚‹æƒ…å ±å…±æœ‰ãƒ»äº¤æµãƒ»ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ç›®çš„ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã§ã™ã€‚

    æˆ‘ã€…(mstdn.gurué‹å–¶)ã¯ã™ã¹ã¦ã®å‚åŠ è€…ãŒãã®ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‹ã‚‰æ­“è¿ã•ã‚Œã€æ¥½ã—ã‚“ã§é ‚ãã“ã¨ã‚’ã‚ã–ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãã®ãŸã‚ã«ã¯ã€mstdn.gurué–¢é€£ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã«ãŠã‘ã‚‹ä¸»å‚¬è€…ã‚„ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ•ã€å‡ºå±•è€…ã€è¦³å®¢ãªã©ã®ã™ã¹ã¦ã®å‚åŠ è€…ã®çš†æ§˜ã¯ã€æœ¬è¡Œå‹•è¦ç¯„ã«å‰‡ã£ã¦ä»–ã®å‚åŠ è€…ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦æ•¬æ„ã¨ç¤¼å„€ã‚’ã‚‚ã£ã¦ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã«å‚åŠ ã„ãŸã ãã‚ˆã†ã«ãŠé¡˜ã„ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    mstdn.gurué–¢é€£ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã§ã¯å…¨ã¦ã®äººã‚’æ­“è¿ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®ãŸã‚ã«ã€ä»–ã®å‚åŠ è€…ãŒä¸å¿«ã«æ„Ÿã˜ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ãã‚ŒãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå½¢ã§ã‚ã£ã¦ã‚‚è¨±å®¹ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    å‚åŠ è€…ã®çš†ã•ã¾ã¯ä»–ã®å‚åŠ è€…ã®æ§˜ã€…ãªèƒŒæ™¯ã«é…æ…®ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã‚ãªãŸã®ä½•æ°—ãªã„ç™ºè¨€ã‚„è¡Œå‹•ã§æ‚²ã—ã‚€äººãŒã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚æ³¨æ„æ·±ãã€å„ªã—ãæŒ¯ã‚‹èˆã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    æˆ‘ã€…é‹å–¶ã¯å‚åŠ è€…ã®çš†ã•ã¾ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’å®ˆã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€è¦ç¯„ã«åã™ã‚‹æ–¹ã¸æ³¨æ„ã ã‘ã§ã¯ãªãã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‹ã‚‰é€€å ´ã•ã›ãŸã‚Šã€å ´åˆã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã¯æ³•çš„æ©Ÿé–¢ã¸ã®ç›¸è«‡ãªã©ã€é©åˆ‡ã¨æ€ã‚ã‚Œã‚‹å¯¾å¿œã‚’ãŠã“ãªã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    is.a.qute.dog

    about

    preview

    join

    Is.a.qute.dog

    Users: 1 . Toots: 110 . Connections: 208 . Language: English

    Kaito Sinclare's personal Mastodon instance.

    More Info... Who

    Kaito Sinclaire is a geek, a programmer, a game designer, and maybe a pixel artist if the conditions are just right. You might know him better as Inuyasha or some variation on that nickname, as he's gone by it for nearly a decade; however in recent times he's wanted to separate his identity from that of the character he shared a name with in the past (despite still liking said character).

    Kaito usually takes the form of a dogboy; that is, an otherwise normal human with the ears of a dog on his head instead of normal ears. He also has a pair of rimless glasses, fixated to where glasses would normally hang off of human ears, that swivel up and down; they usually remain locked in place up over his forehead, out of his way. About the only other noteworthy feature about him is the waist-length jet black hair that runs down his back.

    However, Kaito doesn't prefer to just stay this way all the time. The other form he commonly takes is just a female version of himself, deemed "Katie Sinclaire", to match the fact that he never really feels truly masculine or feminine, switching from day to day. While like this, she'll wear her hair up in twin ponytails to help differentiate herself from how she is normally, if the slight height difference isn't enough.

    Uncommonly he'll take the form of an otherwise normal Sylveon, deemed "Sylvclaire", usually when he's feeling extremely emotional or empathetic towards others. He can't 'speak' in such a form (obviously, he's a PokÃ©mon, he 'sylvs' instead), so he communicates to others through the aura put out through his ribbons, in addition to using said aura to soothe and calm others like a normal Sylveon would.

    What

    Likely you know me through my work on Sonic Robo Blast 2, where I've been working on things on both the site and the game proper for nearly a decade. It's also the first place I've gone by "Inuyasha", starting the trend of me being a long-haired dogboy, and I still do so there to this day.

    I'm also responsible for writing the Records Sub-site from scratch as well as maintaining it. Though I still say it's unfinished, most features work fine if a bit unpolished, and it provides a good metric for players of the game to compare themselves to others.

    I've also been attempting to develop games of my own, to varying levels of success. My lack of artistic prowess (besides pixel fonts) and work getting in the way tends to hamper my work, however. Despite this, I've made decent progress on a versus-oriented clone of Columns, as well as a mostly complete 2D Sonic physics engine that I may put to use in the future. You can see all the weird trinkets I've worked on GitHub.

    I also help assist administrating the IRC server BadnikZONE (as Inuyasha), along with being present on other networks such as EsperNet and QuakeNet (again going by Inuyasha), as well as the UCSN network (where I actually go by KS, like I do here).

    Where

    I live in hell.

    ...

    By hell, I mean Las Vegas, Nevada. In summer it sure feels like hell, trust me.

    Why I set up a mastodon server for myself because I didn't feel comfortable with a lot of the more popular instances out there, and wanted to be more unique. At the same time, I had already planned to run a webserver for myself to make up for the loss of Dropbox for random file storage and sharing, when they finally removed support for Public folders. I think in the end it turned out to be a pretty good idea...

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    tenforward.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Ten Forward

    Users: 165 . Toots: 4208 . Connections: 710 . Language: English

    Welcome to Ten Forward, a Star Trek themed Mastodon instance! For more information on what Ten Forward is in the Star Trek universe, please read this page on Memory-Alpha . The instance is not restricted to Star Trek role-play or characters. More general purpose use is welcome.

    More Info... Want to support our community financially?

    I have set up two methods of supporting our community:

    Patreon

    PayPal

    Our supporters

    @Morn

    @Q

    @Dathon

    Thank you for any support you provide!

    Alliance policy

    We are currently open to allying with all other empires. Any changes to this policy will be noted here.

    Blacklisted instances

    pawoo.net (Silence with media block)

    shitposter.club

    freezepeach.xyz

    sealion.club

    social.heldscal.la

    noagendasocial.com

    unsafe.space

    Code of Conduct

    This instance borrows the code of conduct from the good folks of toot.cat.

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

    Not be used a profile picture

    Be posted with a "NSFW" tag

    Not be posted to the public timeline

    the above rules apply to content that is:

    Sexualized

    Violent

    Flashing or rapidly changing

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on tenforward.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing tenforward.social or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: guinan@tenforward.social

    Admin: @guinan@tenforward.social

    Mensajes de contenido inapropiado para con las personas o la comunidad estÃ¡n prohibidos.

    Los miembros de la comunidad que no respeten estas reglas serÃ¡n silenciados o suspendidos.

    meow.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Meow social

    Users: 357 . Toots: 4456 . Connections: 794 . Language: English

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    More Info... Welcome to meow.social! A mastodon instance.

    NetData Monitoring

    Admin members : @Tiwy57 and @Nomaxice

    Official Accounts : @TransparencyReports and @meow

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    Meow is federated to nearly all instances of mastodon, which means you can follow pretty much anyone you want, no matter what instance they are on!

    While it is open publicly, mind this is just one instance in the fediverse, and we encourage you to look at other instances available to be sure itâ€™s the one you like, and if none please you and you got some knowledge, why not come help mastodon by making your own instance too!

    Ruleset

    Stay legal.

    Respect international laws.

    Respect laws from the country the instance is hold in (Netherlands).

    Respect laws from the admins' country (France).

    Respect laws from your own country.

    Be respectful.

    Donâ€™t go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.

    Contents that are racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way are forbidden.

    Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone donâ€™t want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.

    Tag your content.

    Tag as NSFW content properly, hidden behind a CW button, and keep porn as private or unlisted for AD posts.

    Tag gore and NSFL content and keep it behind a CW button.

    Tag politics and the like, again with a CW button.

    Accounts policy.

    Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (so long as you stay respectful).

    Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.

    Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.

    If your handle has been taken or stolen, and have the means to prove it yours, we will reattribute it to you.

    Do NOT use a "verified" status (with checkmark) : prove that you are someone official by all your means possible

    You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.

    Failure to respect any of those rules will lead to a warning, content removal, and/or suspension of your account.

    The admins have the upmost right to decide to delete your account for any reason.

    You may discuss with the admins if you feel you were unfairly sanctioned, so long as you donâ€™t try to force your way after the final statement has been given by them.

    If you require any help or need to contact us, please contact @Tiwy57, @Nomaxice, or send a mail at meow@meow.social

    About this server

    This server is hosted on Scaleway, with four dedicated CPU cores, 8GB RAM, and 50GB of storage on SSD. It can be updated any time. Uptime will be kept at the highest possible, hopefully only going down for updates.

    Email: meow@meow.social

    Admin: @Tiwy57@meow.social

    niu.moe

    about

    preview

    join

    niu.moe

    Users: 1066 . Toots: 25372 . Connections: 1191 . Language: English

    Welcome here ï¼¯(â‰§â–½â‰¦)ï¼¯!

    Behind this sexy domain name hide a cute and loving community, running on Mastodon and connected to the whole fediverse (OStatus compatible) without imposed borders. This instance is mainly occupied by English, Japanese and French, and the main language used is English.

    Topics

    While we are open to any subject , the main ones are:

    Programming / Security / IT stuffs Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics Gaming

    Rules

    • If you follow the Humans Rights ( EN / FR / JP ), nothing bad should happen.
    • Don't upload anything illegal/you don't own, contact me or use the report button if anything illegal came from here.
    • While we are allowing a lot things, we won't support discrimination or harassment on this instance, so if someone of niu.moe is being rude, zap !
    • If you post NSFW content, use the Content Warning with the tag #NSFW :

    And put the visibilty to, at least, Unlisted :
  • We don't ban/block other instance, you can mute/block instance strangers you don't like.

    • The instance

    This little beast have the following specs :

    Two truly dedicated Xeon E3 core (yeah, truly, nobody on it, pinned !). 8 GB of RAM (nom nom). Hosted in Luxembourg, in Root's Datacenter (BuyVM.net <3). Debian 9 under the hood. Voxility's Anti-DDoS to protect us. Good uptime (We still need to shutdown a bit to apply updates, sorry) Strong server security, very good HTTPS . Hourly Backups !

    The admin

    Hoi, this is me, Technowix , I'm a IT student at Paris, feel free to follow me to get updates about the server / randoms stuff on my tought.

    I'm also helped by Thog , if I'm not around, he can make my work . If you want to help me fund the instance, this is a link to my liberapay page, I detail everythings about the fees. But still, future or actual niu.moe resident, you rock ~ \(âˆ©_âˆ© )

    The images of Subaru in the /about page is made be Madwulf

    Email: What is... business ?

    Admin: @Technowix@niu.moe

    moztodon.nl

    about

    preview

    join

    Moztodon

    Users: 75 . Toots: 56 . Connections: 135 . Language: English

    One of the first Mastadon instances hosted on Dutch soil. Welcome!
    This instance will be updated regularly after thorough testing. It won't be bound to tags.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of moztodon.nl; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: dylan@mozoa.net

    Admin: @dylanmvdb@moztodon.nl

    Cybrespace

    Users: 436 . Toots: 45386 . Connections: 1139 . Language: English

    ï½ƒï½™ï½‚ï½’ï½…ï½“ï½ï½ï½ƒï½…: the social hub of the information superhighway

    jack in to the mastodon fediverse today and surf the dataflow through our cybrepunk, slightly glitchy web portal

    More Info... Join the conversation on im.cybre.space

    Administrators on this instance:

    @chr@nightpool

    Until deviation becomes necessary, this instance will follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship instance. Please read and follow them while participating in this community.

    Additional guidelines:

    Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use NSFW tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.

    Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning

    Cybre.space is a multilingual instance and speakers of any language are welcome.

    All updates on site status, ToS changes, and so forth will be provided through @psa@cybre.space.

    The following domains are blocked by this instance:

    Domain Severity

    freezepeach.xyz suspend

    sealion.club suspend

    shitposter.club silence

    social.heldscal.la silence

    pawoo.net silence + no media

    noagendasocial.comsuspend

    unsafe.spacesuspend

    porntoot.comsilence + no media

    gs.archae.me silence

    gs.smuglo.li suspend

    voxpop.mediacast.ca

    about

    preview

    join

    Mediacast - Vox Populi

    Users: 24 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 190 . Language: English

    Open comment on current affairs with a Canadian focus . This instance embraces freedom of expression, as defined by our Charter . "Speak freely", says the law student grading their own paper.

    More Info... Open to all, free to use.

    Terms of Use

    We're working on it.

    Conduct

    Failure to use the "#nsfw" tag when media attached to a message depicts material unsuitable for viewing by a Canadian youth audience (persons under 18 years of age), examples of which include:

    nudity

    graphic violence

    Content

    The following types of content are explicitly forbidden and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children and youth (persons under 18 years of age)

    Threats of violence

    Content illegal in Canada and/or the United States of America.

    Federated instances

    Generally, follow their rules when visiting. Remote members will be expected to follow ours. For jurisdiction, start at the beginning.

    Network abuse

    Don't do it.

    Email: voxpop-contact@mediacast.ca

    Admin: @support@voxpop.mediacast.ca

    darksocial.party

    about

    preview

    join

    Dark Social Party

    Users: 198 . Toots: 2583 . Connections: 660 . Language: English

    darksocial.party

    More Info... This instance is administered by Rusty (rusty@darksocial.party), and I block users and domains as I see fit. This is not a free speech haven! There are plenty of other servers for that. It's a friendly, mutually respectful space that I hope everyone can find welcoming and fun. If you find any harassment or abuse here, please hit report or toot @rustyk5@darksocial.party and I will deal with it. User registration will be open for probably a couple hundred users, maximum. Also there's every possibility I will accidentally delete everything sooner or later, so please don't make this the center of your online social universe. That said, have fun!

    Email: rusty@darksocial.party

    Admin: @darksocial.party

    ç„¡æ–™ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆç´ æãƒ‰ãƒƒãƒˆã‚³ãƒ ï¼ˆäº¬éƒ½ã®è¡—ä¸¦ã¿ã®ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆï¼‰

    mellified.men

    Honey Mummy Central

    Users: 9 . Toots: 1348 . Connections: 293 . Language: English

    This is a small instance for pals. We are currently invite-only.

    More Info... mellified.men has a restricted membership of folks we know and expect to act in good faith, both to members of our instance and the rest of the fediverse. All members are expected to abide by our Code of Conduct.

    Code of Conduct

    These rules apply both to our users and users who interact with us from other instances. If you're from a remote instance with different rules, please follow these rules when interacting with us.

    No trolling, bullying, or harassment of other users, on this instance or elsewhere. If someone asks you to leave them alone, you are expected to do so.

    No endorsement of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.

    Put topics and images that may be upsetting behind descriptive content warnings. Use your judgment - but respect the boundaries of others if they ask you to put material behind a warning.

    Put images that could be inappropriate for children or workplaces behind NSFW warnings. This includes graphic violence, sexuality, and images that may be shocking.

    All content uploaded to this service must be legal in the United States.

    No spamming or otherwise abusing this service.

    If you do something shitty that isn't on this list, you may be given a warning or have your account suspended at an admin's discretion.

    In general, the first violation merits a verbal warning. If a user persistently violates the CoC or does so in a particularly egregious way, their account may be suspended from our instance.

    Blacklisting

    We may mute any remote instance that significantly deviates from our Code of Conduct. If any instance becomes a significant source of harassment or annoyance, or consistently posts objectionable media, we reserve the right to suspend its ability to federate with us completely.

    Silenced Instances

    These instances are currently muted from our federated timeline, but may still be followed:

    shitposter.club

    freezepeach.xyz

    social.heldscal.la

    woofer.alfter.us

    social.au2pb.net

    gorf.club

    sealion.club

    unsafe.space

    noagendasocial.com

    Suspended Instances

    These instances are suspended and may not federate with us:

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    akabe.co

    join

    Becospace

    Users: 10 . Toots: 214 . Connections: 146 . Language: English

    This is a Mastodon instance operated by Kuropen . This is very personal project, but the registration on this instance will be open to the public for shorter period.

    ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒãƒªã‚·ãƒ¼

    é‹ç”¨è€…æ¨©é™ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹å„ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¹å‡¦ç†ãŠã‚ˆã³ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆåœæ­¢ï¼ˆä»¥ä¸‹ã€ã€Œã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆåœæ­¢ç­‰ã€ã¨ã„ã„ã¾ã™ï¼‰ã¯ã€ä¸Šè¨˜ç¦æ­¢äº‹é …ã«æŠµè§¦ã™ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ã€ãã®å¯¾å‡¦ã‚’è¡Œã‚ãªã„ã“ã¨ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šé‹ç”¨è€…ã¾ãŸã¯æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã‹ã‹ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ•ãƒ©è¨­å‚™ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹é›»æ°—é€šä¿¡äº‹æ¥­è€…ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦æ³•çš„ãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã«é™ã‚Šè¡Œã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ä»¥å¤–ã«ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æŒã¤ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€ãã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¦å—ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦æ³•çš„ãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€å½“è©²ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ã«å¯¾ã—æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹å†…ã«ãŠã‘ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆåœæ­¢ç­‰ã‚’è¡Œã†ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å ´åˆã€åŒä¸€ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ãã®ã‚ˆã†ãªäº‹è±¡ãŒå¤šæ•°ç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¯ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    é‹ç”¨è€…ã¯ã€ä¸‹è¨˜ã‚’é™¤ãã»ã‹ã€åˆ©ç”¨è€…ã®å€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨è‡´ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ä¸‹è¨˜ã«ã¤ãã¾ã—ã¦ã‚‚ç®¡ç†é‹ç”¨ã«æœ€ä½é™å¿…è¦ãªç¯„å›²ã§ã®ã¿åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã€æ³•ä»¤ã«åŸºã¥ãã»ã‹ã¯ç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã¸ã®å…¬é–‹ã‚’è‡´ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚æŠ•ç¨¿ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ»é›»å­ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒ»IPã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãŠã‚ˆã³æœ€çµ‚ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³æ—¥æ™‚

    Instance rules

    Users SHALL NOT do following:

    (Here, "Other Users" means not only ones in this instance but also users of any other instance.)

    Illegal (in Japan) or criminal activities

    Fraud or intimidation to the Operator or Other Users

    Activities non-compliant to public order and morals

    Violations of rights, or activities with legal risks

    Intentionally making network or system of this instance overloaded

    Impersonate the Operator, Other Users or any other people

    Causing damage to the Operator, Other Users or any other people

    Benefiting antisocial forces

    Acts for the purpose of meeting with unacquainted opposite sex

    Activity to encourage inappropriate activity

    Posting images which is inappropriate for children without proper warning (NSFW tag for images, Content Warning for text)

    Inappropriate use of bots (Following Other Users actively, automated boosts and addition to favorite list, automated posts which may be considered as a search spam)

    Moderation Policy

    Silence or Suspension of an account on this instance shall be done when it violates Instance Rules above and there is legal risk by leaving situation as is.

    When there is legal risk by receiving contents from a user on another instance,

    he/she is subject of Silence or Suspension. In this case, many users in a instance are the subject, Domain Block will be applied.

    The Operator WILL NOT use the users' personal informations, except:Toots posted, E-mail address, IP address and last login dateFor kinds of information listed above, the usage is limited to the range that minimally needed for administration. Any other people does not use them unless legally needed.

    Email: webmaster@kuropen.org

    Admin: @kuropen@akabe.co

    vulpine.club

    about

    preview

    join

    The Vulpine Club

    Users: 126 . Toots: 10373 . Connections: 778 . Language: English

    The Vulpine Club is an Mastodon instance for foxes, and their associates and friends and fans. We're pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

    More Info... Welcome to the Vulpine Club! We hope you'll enjoy your stay here, and that you'll have lots of interesting discussions and learn about the really neat people around the fediverse. This is a unique and exciting network, and we're pleased you're joining us. Please read the rest of this page to make sure you know what this is all about, and how to play within the rules.

    Guiding Principle: The Vulpine Club believes strongly in civility and respectfulness as a cornerstone of any online community. Be excellent to each other.

    Keeping the Lights On: We have a Patreon to help cover the costs of running this thing. Feel free to chip in as little or as much as you'd like. <3

    Special thanks to our sustaining supporters: Irick ğŸğŸˆâš© and (anonymous)! THANK YOU ALWAYS!

    Administrator(s): You may e-mail the admins at admins@vulpine.club. For reference, all admins are listed below:

    PronounsE-mailRoleAlternate account

    Rey

    they/them

    rey@vulpine.club

    Owner

    @hoopycat@mastodon.social

    We also have a status page hosted by StatusCake.

    Local Flava:

    Favourites are now Licks

    Boosts are now Awoos

    Toots continue to be Toots

    See also our Github fork, and the differences between our production branch and the tootsuite master.

    How To Get Banned: Be advised your access may be revoked at any time for any reason, especially if you are a:

    Person too young to do the Internet, per the Law (i.e. by using this site, you affirm that you are 13 years of age or older),

    Person who posts content such as:

    Copyrighted content posted without permission

    Sexual depictions of children

    Stuff we really don't want to see (untagged pornography/sexual content, gore, graphic violence, etc)

    Nazi and/or National Socialist and/or Fascist and/or Alt-Right and/or Alt-Furry,

    Homophobe, Transphobe, Racist, Sexist, Islamophobe, Men's Rights Activist, Xenophobe, et cetera,

    General Douchebag and/or Overall Asshat, and/or

    Current President of the United States of America

    Doxxing, brigading, dogpiling, stalking, harassing, and other similar attacks against a person's right to exist without you, are explicitly prohibited. Using alternate accounts to evade blocks/suspends/silences, whether on the same instance or another instance, is prohibited.

    Accounts from other instances will be locally silenced or suspendedâ€‹ for reported violation of these rules. CoC violations by instance administrators may be enforced on the entire instanceâ€‹, particularly for single-user instances.

    These rules evolve on a regular basis. Most folks will never run afoul of them, which should give us hope for the future.

    Guidelines:

    The following are suggested ways to be excellent to each other, in no particular order.

    If someone is violating the rules, please report the toot(s) in question, and also consider blocking them.

    Try to apply content warnings/NSFW tags for long posts, animated GIFs, sensitive topics, etc. This is not a hard-and-fast rule, and we're not going to insta-ban violations, but keeping the Public Timelines usable for as many folks as possible is a goal.

    Content warnings should definitely be used for pornography, lewd roleplay, spoilers, curse-laden diatribes, photographs of gentlemen named Richard, etc. Content warnings may be used for news, politics, long stories, etc. Community standards are still evolving on this topic.

    It's a good idea to check your privilege occasionally. Many members of this community identify as part of one or more oft-repressed minority groups (lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, person of color, disabled, neurodivergent, etc). Don't expect individuals to produce peer-reviewed research to "prove" their experiences are real; if you're skeptical, do your own research or ask the community as a whole.

    We don't really mind bots, as long as the bots don't interact with people without their consent. Follow bots will be blocked on sight. On the other hand, if someone made a bot that tooted pictures of foxes every hour, we'll probably give you a certificate of appreciation.

    Ownership: This server is operated from Rochester, New York, United States. For First Amendment Defense Act purposes, our legal religion within the United States is The Satanic Temple, and we adhere to the seven fundamental tenets. Outside of the United States, we operate under the Principia Discordia and its three core principles, except on Sweetmorn, when we operate without any principles whatsoever, unless it is a Apostle Holyday, in which case we do not operate without any principles whatsoever.

    Federation Policy: Our default federation policy is open, but in the interest of fostering a useful and pleasant experience, we will block domains that are known to be lawless havens of iniquity. For your convenience, these are listed below.

    Last update: 2017/04/30

    Domain

    Severity

    Why

    shitposter.club

    suspend

    haven for harassment

    freezepeach.xyz

    suspend

    haven for harassment

    sealion.club

    suspend

    haven for harassment

    social.heldscal.la

    suspend

    haven for harassment

    wogan.im

    suspend

    single-user instance violating our CoC

    noagendasocial.com

    suspend

    podcast dudebro brigade, no CoC, admin violations of our CoC

    social.tchncs.de

    suspend

    CoC not enforced (harasser still present after multiple reports/incidents)

    ediot.social

    suspend

    their CoC pretty much covers it

    Email: admins@vulpine.club

    Admin: @rey@vulpine.club

    m4570.xyz

    about

    preview

    join

    m4570.xyz

    Users: 33 . Toots: 125 . Connections: 553 . Language: English

    m4570.xyz is an open Mastodon instance, m4570 is for masto(-don) in 1337 5p34k .
    It will federate with other instances.
    Everyone is welcome to this public and open instance.

    Before sign up please read:

    Terms of service / Terms of use / Legal Terms or whatever complicated law vocabulary used to designate this.
    Read also About this Mastodon instance .

    More Info... About this Mastodon instance

    Rules

    There are no particular restrictions here, please just be respectful with each over.

    This Mastodon instance is hosted in France you must respect the French law.

    If a user of is instance doesn't be respectful, let me know.I will reserve the right to revoke is access to this instance.

    Service

    I do backups, but there's no service guarantee.I will provide a best effort QoS.

    Donations

    Bitcoin: 1KpMoMAhnKapTfF1hyeB1Ehh53zssPyKn8

    Me

    keybase.io: https://keybase.io/oxynux

    Email: oxynux@m4570.xyz

    Admin: @Oxynux@m4570.xyz

    rich.gop

    about

    preview

    join

    Rich.GOP

    Users: 152 . Toots: 2060 . Connections: 779 . Language: English

    Rich.GOP is an open, privacy-conscious, decentralized social network, dedicated to honest, open, and civil political discourse.

    This instance is funded and maintained by @Motoma

    One of the incredibly important pieces of a decentralized social network is diversity of options. To that end I maintain a public Mastodon instance at https://rich.gop . This instance is free of ads, marketers, and stalkers.

    I provide this service on a virtualized infrastructure that I own. I would like to improve that infrastructure, in the dimensions of availability, reliability, and speed. Users of a free and public tools shouldn't be beholden to a second-rate service. Here, I leverage my 13 years of professions distributed software development and hosting experience to deliver a first-class experience to my users.

    If you would like to support me in my goal of delivering this quality service to the public, please consider supporting this site on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/motoma

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    Welcome to Rich.GOP! This Mastodon instance is here you with a friendly environment where you can converse, exchange and discuss ideas, politely debate political subjects, and converse about any other aspects of your lives. Communities are at their best when participants treat each other with respect and courtesy. Therefore, by signing up for an account, you are explicitly agreeing to conduct yourself in a civilized manner when using this instance.

    As a user of this instance, you agree to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    As a user of this instance, you commit to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, or political affiliation.

    By creating an account on this instance, you agree to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting @Motoma or by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances.

    Email: motoma@gmail.com

    Admin: @Motoma@rich.gop

    aqua-graphic.blue

    about

    Aqua Graphic -ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒªã‚¦ãƒ å¥½ããŒé›†ã¾ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹-

    Users: 22 . Toots: 206 . Connections: 223 . Language: Japanese

    Aqua Graphic(ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯)ã¨ã¯

    Aqua Graphic(ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯)ã¯ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒªã‚¦ãƒ ã‚„ç†±å¸¯é­šã€æ°´è‰æ°´æ§½ãŒå¥½ããªæ–¹ãŒé›†ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    Paco's Mastodon Instance

    This is my personal Mastodon instance. You can use it if you like. I run it myself, so I make no promises about uptime, availability, etc. But I'm using it, so you can believe I'll notice if it crashes and I'll get it right back up when I can.

    Users: 16 . Toots: 130 . Connections: 786 . Language: English

    ğŸ¨ Freely share all types of art. This instance welcomes loli, shota, fan works, graphic violence, and any sexual depiction expressed as a piece of fiction in subject or setting.
    âœ… Uncensored 2D drawings & 3D models
    âœ… Zero guidelines on fictional characters
    âŒ No real life photographic persons
    âŒ No illegal content*

    More Info... *Subject to local laws of France where this node is hosted. As of 2015, Amendment 462 guarantees the freedom of artistic dissemination. However, it remains illegal to produce (within French jurisdiction) any sexual depictions of fictional minors under the age of 15. Sharing nazi symbolism is also considered illegal and will be removed from the public timeline accordingly. baraag.net does not produce or manufacture any content, and only freely distributes art that is shared by members of the fediverse.â€œWe must ensure that art can continue to disturb.â€ - Fleur Pellerin, Minister of Culture and CommunicationRegistration is open to all, but there is focus on original artists and client/commission work as a theme for this node.Please refrain from uploading to the local timeline any content that you do not own or have permission to share. Short of anything illegal, feel free to boost whatever you'd like from your federated timeline.

    cute.group

    Users: 219 . Toots: 2668 . Connections: 591 . Language: English

    âœ¨ A mastodon instance for cuties. ğŸ˜

    More Info... In general we follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship instance.

    No nazis, no hate speech, no homophobia, no misogyny, no racism, no sexism, no xenophobia and definitely no transphobia. Just be respectful.

    Please flag all porn with nsfw and make sure it's unlisted so it doesn't show up in the local timeline. Feel free to create private AD accounts.

    It's important to keep in mind that this site is run by a queer trans girl. You are encouraged to report and complain if people are giving you trouble. I want people to feel safe here. If that doesn't sound like something you can do, DON'T JOIN.

    Server is based in Silicon Valley. Stats

    Email: c.stars@icloud.com

    Admin: @stickypaws@cute.group
