    ablative.stream

    about

    preview

    join

    Ablative Hosting Mastodon Instance

    Users: 40 . Toots: 1 . Connections: 70 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance is managed by Ablative.Hosting and hosted by Brass Horn Communications.
    As such it is crypto/Tor friendly and as censorship-free as UK law allows.

    More Info... We intend for this Mastodon instance to be for paying customers of Ablative Hosting Ltd however registrations are currently open.

    Ablative Hosting is a Tor centric hosting company originally designed to help UK indie producers of adult content defend themselves against the UK Digital Economy bill.

    Ablative Hosting Ltd does not believe in Internet censorship but also reserves the right to not be the host for certain material in accordance with XKCD #1357.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Material in violation of UK law

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: gareth@brasshorncommunications.uk

    Admin: @Gareth@ablative.stream

    EDiot Social

    Users: 23 . Toots: 229 . Connections: 265 . Language: English

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica is the greatest haven of free expression in the world... and we aren't content with a single site anymore.

    So here is our one and only Mastodon Instance. Here we accept everyone! No Limits , No Domain Blocks , No Bullshit .

    This Instance is a place for everyone to share and discuss dank memes , awful jokes and pointless internet drama . We aim to bring together the shittiest communities of Twitter and beyond to form one website filled with the latest trends , memes and again, pointless internet drama .
    Please ensure you check your spam folder for the confirmation email when signing up, it commonly gets stuck in there.

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica Wiki

    ED: Thizzlehat Junction Center

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica Forums

    EDF2: Electric Boogaloo

    Email

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica general inquiries: contact@edrama.co

    Mastodon Social Instance Maintainers: bane@edrama.co & vx@edrama.co

    Note: Not everyone with an EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica affiliated email address is an official ED representative. Email an above address to make sure the person who you're communicating with officially represents ED.

    securitymastod.one

    Security Mastodon

    Users: 2386 . Toots: 10550 . Connections: 912 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance for information security pros and enthusiasts. Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Didn't get a confirmation email? Check spam. Still no? Email notifications@securitymastod.one and ask to be manually activated.

    More Info... Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Hosting expenses are currently on a special; $63.99 total per year on an OpenVZ hosting provider. (This introductory price will probably not last, but a year is forever in internet time...) However, we have frequently experienced downtime due to hosting provider issues such as running into simultaneous connection limits, etc. The goal of asking for donations is to get $370/year to upgrade to a KVM VPS or dedicated server on a more stable hosting provider. This site is run by @scriptjunkie

    Admin: Not Available

    bunyip.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Bunyip Space

    Users: 29 . Toots: 301 . Connections: 820 . Language: English

    Bunyip Space is a Mastodon instance for inclusive and diverse community discussion and social sharing with respect and tolerance. All are welcome.

    See here for more information on why you should join, read about our community standards, and why we are called Bunyip Space .

    More Info... WHY JOIN THIS INSTANCE?

    This instance of Mastodon is targeted at users of any age who wish to engage in safe, mature and stimulating discussion in a welcoming online space. We're happy to have a laugh, but abuse, disrespect, and intolerance are not welcome.

    You can register here and follow and interact with users on any other instance in the Fediverse. This Mastadon instance does not intend to block any other instances, so users are free to see whatever they choose from the Fediverse, but we will be strict about preserving our own local timeline as a safe, welcoming and inclusive community.

    We recognise the challenge in balancing free speech and protection from extreme and inappropriate language, and we expect that these guidelines and our practice in enforcing them over time will evolve over time, with consultation and communication

    We hope to build a quality community, and will consider charging for membership and/or providing other joining restrictions in future to support this. If we do introduce payments, existing members will be grandfathered in.

    For now, this instance is being run on a volunteer basis, and donations are welcome at https://paypal.me/spickup

    WHAT IS A BUNYIP?

    The bunyip is a large mythical creature from Australian Aboriginal mythology, said to lurk in swamps, billabongs, creeks, riverbeds, and waterholes. We choose this name as the founder is Australian, although currently living in the UK.

    Email: sp@bunyip.space

    Admin: @bunyip.space

    ShortNote ã®Mastodonã¯ã€æ™®é€šã®Mastodonã§ã™ã€‚ç‰¹ã«ShortNoteæœ¬ä½“ã¨ã®é€£æºã¯ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã§ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚¤ãƒã‹ã‚‰ æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²ã‚’ã—ç›´ã—ã¦ ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

      A:ãã‚“ãªã“ã¨ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ã“ã®å®Ÿé¨“ã®è¶£æ—¨çš„ã«ã¯ãã®æ–¹ãŒã‚„ã‚„ã€å¤šå°‘ã€ã‚ãšã‹ã«å¬‰ã—ãã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

    More Info... ã“ã®å­ã¯ã€ã‚¨ãƒƒã‚»ã‚¤æŠ•ç¨¿ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã€ŒShortNoteã€ã®Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã€è©³ç´°ã¨ã‹ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¨ã‹ã€‘

    ShortNoteã§ã€å®Ÿé¨“ã¨ã—ã¦ã€æœŸé–“é™å®šã§Mastodonã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã¾ã™ã€‚Mastodonã¯ã€Œãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã€ã¨èª­ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚ã€Œãƒã‚¹ãƒˆä¸¼ã€ã¨æ›¸ãäººã‚‚å¤šã„ã¿ãŸã„ã§ã™ã€‚æ„‰å¿«ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

    Mastodonã¨ã¯ä½•ã‹ï¼Ÿã€€ã–ã£ãã‚Šã„ã†ã¨ã€Twitterã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ã€‚ä½¿ã†åˆ†ã«ã¯ã€ã¾ãšã¯ãã†è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã—ã‹ã—ã€ã€ŒTwitterã¿ãŸã„ãªã‚‚ã®ã€ã¨è¨€ã„åˆ‡ã£ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã¨ã€ãŠå‰ã¯ä½•ã‚‚ã‚ã‹ã£ã¦ã„ãªã„çš„ãªdisã®çŸ¢ãŒå±±ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«é™ã‚Šã‹ã‹ã£ã¦ãã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã¿ãªã•ã‚“ã¯æ³¨æ„ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    Mastodonã®ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã®è§£èª¬ã¯â€¦â€¦ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚å®Ÿé¨“ãªã®ã§ã€‚

    ã™ã”ãç°¡å˜ã«ã€ã–ã£ãã‚Šã¨åŸºæœ¬ä¸­ã®åŸºæœ¬ã ã‘ä»¥ä¸‹ã«å›³ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã‚ˆã€‚

    Mastodonã®è©³ç´°ã‚„æ©Ÿèƒ½ã«ã¤ã„ã¦è©³ã—ãçŸ¥ã‚ŠãŸã„æ–¹ã¯ã€ã‚°ã‚°ã£ã¦ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚Mastodonã¯ä¸€è¦‹ãƒ„ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¿ãŸã„ã§ã™ãŒã€å®Ÿã¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã®ç†æƒ³ã«ç«‹ã¡æˆ»ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªã€é©æ–°çš„ãªãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ãªã®ã§ã™ã€‚

    ShortNoteã®Mastodonã¯ã€æ™®é€šã®Mastodonã§ã™ã€‚ç‰¹ã«ShortNoteæœ¬ä½“ã¨ã®é€£æºã¯ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã§ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚¤ãƒã‹ã‚‰æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²ã‚’ã—ç›´ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    æ™®é€šã®Mastodonã§ã™ã®ã§ã€iPhoneã‚„Androidã®Mastodonã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚‚ä½¿ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚‚é€£åˆã‚‚é–‹ã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Mastodonã‚’ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã‚‹äººãŸã¡ã®å‹•æ©Ÿã¯ã„ã‚ã„ã‚ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ãŒã€ShortNoteã®å ´åˆã¯ã€ŒShortNoteãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã ã‘ã§Twitterçš„ã«ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ£ã‚¦ãƒ•ãƒ•ã—ãŸã„äººã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã€ãã‚‰ã„ãªè»½ã„æ°—æŒã¡ã§ã™ã€‚å°é›£ã—ãè¨€ã†ã¨ã€ä»®èª¬ã¨ãã®æ¤œè¨¼ã§ã™ã€‚

    ç¾æ®µéšã§ã¯å®Ÿé¨“ã§ã™ã®ã§ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ä¸å¯§ã«å®ˆã£ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹ã¨å¹¸ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    æ‰¹åˆ¤ã‚„æ‚ªå£ã€è¨€ã„äº‰ã„ã¯ã‚„ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ç›¸äº’ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¨ã‹ãŠæ°—ã«å…¥ã‚Šè¿”ã—ã¨ã‹ã‚‚å¿˜ã‚Œã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ã¿ã‚“ãªä»²è‰¯ã

    åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«ShortNoteæœ¬ä½“ã®åˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„ã‚’ãŠå®ˆã‚Šãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã‚ã¨æ³•å¾‹ã‚‚å®ˆã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    å®Ÿé¨“æœŸé–“ã¯ä¸€å¿œ5ã€œ6æœˆã„ã£ã±ã„ã‚’è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®å…ˆã¯â€¦â€¦

    Mastodonã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã‚„ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«è¡Œã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã‚°ã‚°ã‚ŠãªãŒã‚‰è‡ªåŠ©åŠªåŠ›ã§ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™

    é‹å–¶ã®éƒ½åˆä¸Šã€äºˆå‘Šãªããƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚æ‚ªãæ€ã‚ãªã„ã§ãã ã•ã„â€¦â€¦

    é‹å–¶ã®éƒ½åˆä¸Šã€äºˆå‘Šãªãã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’åœæ­¢ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯å®Ÿé¨“ã§ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã”äº†æ‰¿ãã ã•ã„

    ã¨ã¯ã„ãˆã€æ¥½ã—ãéŠã¹ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã„ãªã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã©ã†ãã‚ˆã‚ã—ããŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™

    ã€FAQã€‘

    Q:æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²å¾Œã®ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„

    A:ãŸã¶ã‚“è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«å…¥ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å…¥ã£ã¦ã„ãªã‘ã‚Œã°é–“é•ã£ãŸãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ãã‚Œã¯æ”¾ã£ã¦ãŠã„ã¦ã€æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²ã—ç›´ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    Q:ShortNoteã¨åŒã˜ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼åã‚’ä½¿ã‚ãªãã¡ã‚ƒã„ã‘ãªã„ï¼Ÿ

    A:ãã‚“ãªã“ã¨ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ã“ã®å®Ÿé¨“ã®è¶£æ—¨çš„ã«ã¯ãã®æ–¹ãŒã‚„ã‚„ã€å¤šå°‘ã€ã‚ãšã‹ã«å¬‰ã—ãã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

    Email: Not Available

    mastodon.hasameli.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 49 . Toots: 5854 . Connections: 714 . Language: English

    Welcome to Hasameli!

    This is the Mastodon instance associated with Hasameli Information Services. "Hasameli" is the ancient Hittite god of the forge - and here at Hasameli, we like to forge new tools for the information security community. The projects that we build can be found at our github repo .

    Please note that the registrations are whitelisted to hasameli.com domains only. See the patreon for details.

    Our terms of service are fairly simple:

      This server is hosted in the United States, so please keep all content legal within this jurisdiction.
      Additionally, we would prefer to keep our content relatively SFW. Please make use of the CW flag if you want to post anything that is potentially NSFW.
      We are infosec people, so we understand [and sympathise with!] the desire to explore and experiment - but if you do find any issues, kindly report them to your administrator, @munin, rather than going hog-wild and raising his blood pressure.
      If @munin ends up having his blood pressure raised, he reserves the right to kick you off for any or no reason. I know what rules lawyering is and that's why I'm not setting specific terms.

    If you would like to support us, or see what else we're working on, try out our patreon page

    Other than that - have fun, and enjoy tooting!

    For those of you in the Hasameli community, the sysop for this instance is @munin [valid here and on birdsite]

    He can also be found at github as Dr-Syn, and can be emailed via the contact above.

    The federation policy is to allow federation to and from all other servers by default.

    However, should users of this server note significant abuse from a specific other server, the sysop may opt to block the other server at his discretion.

    Welcome to the madness place!

    Email: munin+mastodon@hasameli.com

    Admin: @mastodon.hasameli.com

    mstdn.lotty.jp

    mastodon.direct

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 97 . Toots: 175 . Connections: 638 . Language: English

    Mastodon.direct is an open Mastodon instance welcoming people to discuss a broad range of topics. We strive to provide a high quality instance with reliability, speed, and a responsive moderation team.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    For abuse or copyright reports, please email abuse at this domain.

    Email: hello@mastodon.direct

    Admin: @djchen@mastodon.direct

    webcommunity.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 75 . Toots: 254 . Connections: 123 . Language: English

    webcommunity.club

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    bne.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Brisbane Social

    Users: 103 . Toots: 1616 . Connections: 819 . Language: English

    The Brisbane Social Mastodon server. Hosted in sunny Brisbane, for users from and interested in southeast Queensland.

    More Info... This site is intended to be a pleasant space for folks to enjoy Mastodon. This instance is run out of Brisbane, Australia to allow faster access for locals.

    Instance rules

    The rules of this server are:

    Be respectful of your peers

    Abide by local and international laws

    Have fun

    If you have concerns about a person's conduct, please report the toot in question or get in touch with @ashkyd.

    Blocked instances

    As with other servers, we have blocked a number of instances that don't meet our standards for a number of reasons. At this time, we are keeping in step with the toot.cafe blocklist.If this is something that concerns you, please feel free to sign up for another instance.

    Copyright & Attribution

    The background image of Streets Beach is provided by user Foundationexpo88

    Get started!

    Get started by signing up or logging in, then toot using the #introduction hashtag to say hi!

    Email: bnesocial@kyd.com.au

    Admin: @ashkyd@bne.social

    soc.ialis.me

    about

    preview

    join

    soc.ialis.me mastodon

    Users: 438 . Toots: 10770 . Connections: 1051 . Language: English

    A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France .
    Learn about the instance information, guidelines , and the privacy policy .

    More Info... A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France.

    Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

    don't be a dick,

    no advertising, harassment, spam,

    no abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),

    Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

    Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin.

    Currently the only human administrating this instance is @href. Other administrators may be added in the future, as I (href) prefer focusing on managing the servers and the underlying infrastructure than people.

    Don't hesitate to ping either @href or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at hrefhref/mastodon on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

    The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

    The servers are run by an organization (with no legal grounds; entierly privately owned) called random.sh / random labs; which hosts other services such as irc.random.sh, a ChatSpike.net IRC Server, Etherpad.fr, and much more. I also intend to one day make it my own company for some products, but I'll then separate the business with theses community services (the business will just be a sponsor, and without any advertisement, tracking, or anything else evil).

    soc.ialis.me logo and derivations (not found and errors)

    by @Famine, license CC BY-NC-SA.

    The bird escaped, don't worry. Mastodons aren't that good at aiming.

    Background image Sunset Landscape Rocks Silhouettes by skeeze, licensed under CC0 Public Domain.

    Email: soc@ialis.me

    Admin: @admin@soc.ialis.me

    dancingbanana.party

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 80 . Toots: 3831 . Connections: 463 . Language: English

    La banane qui danse.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: david@dancingbanana.party

    Admin: @awea@dancingbanana.party

    mastodon.pocka.info

    Geekz4U.com

    Users: 7 . Toots: 76 . Connections: 255 . Language: English

    This is the official Geekz Mastodon instance. Registrations are open and we will accommodate as many users as possible. This instance is dedicated to geeks who love technology, but we welcome others as well. The local content will mostly revolve around technology.

    Welcome to Geekz4U.com Mastodon instance. We are glad you have visited us and we hope that you will join our instance and become an active participant. We also would like to invite you to join us on our website at https://www.geekzweb.com. From there, you will find our other social network accounts.

    ãŠå®¢æ§˜ã®å€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã¯ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã«æ²ã’ã‚‹å ´åˆã«é™ã£ã¦ã€ç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã«æä¾›ã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    (ï¼‘) ãŠå®¢æ§˜ã®åŒæ„ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆ

    (ï¼’) çµ±è¨ˆçš„æƒ…å ±ã¨ã—ã¦ã€ãŠå®¢æ§˜å€‹äººã‚’è­˜åˆ¥ã§ããªã„çŠ¶æ…‹ã«åŠ å·¥ã—ãŸå ´åˆ

    äº‹å‰ã®äºˆå‘Šãªã—ã«ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã«å…¥ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚å®‰å®šæ€§ã¯ä¿è¨¼ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“

    catholicism.rocks

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    Welcome to Catholicism Rocks - a Mastodon based social network for Catholics from all walks of life... Come on in, pull up a chair and make yourself comfortable. We're happy to have you.

    #Catholic #Catholicism #Apostolic #Pope #Papal

    Naturally, there is no cost for this service, but if you'd like to contribute to the cost of maintenance and such, feel free to donate any amount you choose via PayPal .

    More Info... Catholicism Rocks is an instance of the Mastodon Social Network which is made available for the Catholic world. It is moderated. While this instance is created primarily for Catholics, we do not discriminate against persons of other faiths or origins, so long as they abide by our standards.

    All users of this instance are expected to uphold an environment that is tolerant and inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. It is expected that members adhere to general codes of conduct, and avoid the following:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    The posting of pornography

    Users are responsible for their own content, and their help in addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct is greatly appreciated.

    Email: admin@catholicism.rocks

    Admin: @catholicism.rocks

    Tekkadon

    Users: 17 . Toots: 1958 . Connections: 273 . Language: English

    ä¸‰æµ¦åŠå³¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ«ã‚ã«è©¦é¨“é‹ç”¨ä¸­ã€‚/

    More Info... ä¸‰æµ¦åŠå³¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚†ã‚‹ï½ãè©¦é¨“é‹ç”¨ä¸­ã€‚ãã†ã¯è¨€ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€Œä¸‰æµ¦åŠå³¶ã€ã®ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§å¼·ãç¸›ã‚‹ã¤ã‚‚ã‚Šã¯ã¾ã£ãŸãã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«ã©ãªãŸã§ã‚‚æ­“è¿ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãŸã ã—ã€ã‚ãã¾ã§ã‚‚è©¦é¨“é‹ç”¨ã€ãŠè©¦ã—ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãªã®ã§çªç„¶æ¶ˆæ»…ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚„ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¹ã£é£›ã¶ã“ã¨ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãŒè½ã¡ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã‚ã¾ã‚Šã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ä¾å­˜ã—ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ã„ã¤ã§ã‚‚åˆ¥ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰å†å‡ºç™ºã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«â€¦â€¦ãã‚“ãªå¿ƒã¥ã‚‚ã‚Šã§è‡ªç”±ã«éŠã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ç®¡ç†äººã‚‚ç´ äººãªã®ã§ã€å‹‰å¼·ã—ãªãŒã‚‰éŠã‚“ã§ã¿ãŸã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚ã±ãŠï½ã‚“ã€‚

    "Tekkadon" is Mastodon instance for community of around the Miura Peninsula, Kanagawa, Japan. However, even if you are unrelated to the Miura Peninsula, you are OK. Basically anyone can join. Welcome to Tekkadon!

    But "Tekkadon" is test driving slowly and loosely. Server down or data lose may occur. Suddenly "Tekkadon" may disappear. Please be ready at any time to be able to start again in another Mastodon instance.

    Tekkadon administrator is also one of the beginners who want to learn while enjoying Mastodon.

    Let's enjoy with us, Pawooooooooooooooooon!

    Email: tekkadon.master@manimani.cc

    Admin: @YoTTaBoozer@tekkadon.manimani.cc

    bapp.me

    about

    preview

    join

    bapp.me

    Users: 121 . Toots: 199 . Connections: 435 . Language: English

    Welcome! Feel free to make an account and use this instance. I promise to keep it running if any users show up, at most I will close registration in the unlikely event that it gets too big for me to financially support.

    More Info... Registration is open unless it becomes a problem.

    Running on a 2CPU/2GB RAM droplet for now, will increase it if necessary (probably not past 50â‚¬/month or so but I might consider cheap colo hosting instead if it comes to that).

    Rules:

    No content promoting racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia or nazis allowed (and if your content skirts these categories then think twice before posting).

    I prefer restorative justice where possible but offending content will be removed, and continued toxicity results in a ban. Still pretty new to this whole thing and I set everything up manually instead of using a docker image as a learning experience so some things might be broken.

    Email: atbaaba@gmail.com

    Admin: @anttirt@bapp.me

    sn.angry.im

    about

    preview

    join

    SN.Angry.Im

    Users: 52 . Toots: 978 . Connections: 557 . Language: English

    Yet another excited Mastodon instance. This node has not a main focus, and I do think it should never have. Read Rules before deciding to join, please.

    More Info... About Me

    I am @PeterCxy,

    a free-software enthusiast, currently an Undergraduate student.

    I am also a daily Linux user, and learning to be a sysadmin.

    This instance is hosted for personal hobby. It runs on a VM on an online.net server with E3-1231v3, 32G RAM, unmetered up to 1Gbps bandwidth and 2x1T HDD storage. An east-asian reverse proxy is applied for better connection to Asia. I also run my personal blog at https://typeblog.net (in Chinese).

    This instance currently runs Mastodon v1.3.3 on ArchLinux with Docker. Everything rolls fast :) Below after the Rules

    section, you can have an overview on the current status of the server.

    Rules

    This is an open community, so please try to be open and loving to others.

    Please understand this is not the Dark Web.

    Decentralization is not synonym to hidden identity. Contact the admins if anything illegal come in here.

    Sorry, but no politics here, and please avoid extreme religious content. Actually we won't ban you just because content on politics, but please be kindly noticed that it is not the best place for these content here. (But isn't the belief 'decentralization and privacy' itself a political idea? Huh.)

    Use Content Warning (CW) for any possible NSFW content or content that may make people uncomfortable here. BUT NO CHILD PORN ALLOWED. Please use the Report feature if you see any inappropriate content.

    This instance is hosted on a personal server and with periodical backups. Nothing will break soon :)

    I can't make any guarantee on how many registrations can this instance be open to. For now, sit back and relax.

    Donate if you like: 17qX8PpiSCNsqAMVRHA7BWRGcREzgXaH8F (BTC)

    After all, if you are joining this Mastodon instance, it means that you trust the administrator @PeterCxy, who set up and fully manage this instance, because thus he can block you, remove your content, view your email address etc. here. I still recommend that anyone who is able to set up his / her own instance should do it, and this is also good for the ecosystem of GNU Social / Mastodon.

    Have fun and don't be angry :joy:

    Status

    You can also view the complete status page here.

    iframe {

    width: 100%;

    }

    function resizeIframe(obj) {

    setTimeout(function() {

    obj.style.height = obj.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + 'px';

    }, 500)

    }

    var f = document.getElementById("monitor")

    f.onload = function() {

    resizeIframe(f)

    }

    Email: admin@typeblog.net

    Admin: @PeterCxy@sn.angry.im

    nfg.zone

    about

    preview

    join

    NFG Zone

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    NFG.zone is a rambunctious but civilized place to fly your little weirdo flag. <3

    There are a lot of places on the internet where the most offended citizen is the one who sets the rules for you.

    This isn't that place.

    Be respectful, use the content warnings (for nudity, politics, frogs or anything else that might make someone else's day a little worse.

    And please, please just don't tell someone you don't like their things - just scroll on.

    Welcome to NFG dot Zone.

    Email: NFGadmin@nfg.zone

    Admin: @NFG@nfg.zone

    Nasstodon

    Users: 9 . Toots: 1 . Connections: 1 . Language: English

    social.nassi.me

    More Info... Welcome on social.nassi.me !

    We are very happy to be a part of the mastodon.social project and we will do our best to keep this instance running up.

    Follow me

    Nass A.

    Rules :

    â€¢ Don't flood

    â€¢ Legal NSFW is allowed, but only with Content Warning or NSFW flag

    â€¢ Respect each other

    â€¢ In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    â€¢ Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here.

    Feel free to report users or toots that don't belong here.

    What is under the hood ? :

    â€¢ 2 cores Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU C2750 @ 2.40GHz

    â€¢ 2GB RAM DDR3 ECC

    â€¢ 50GB SSD

    Server status : social.nassi.me is hosted by Scaleway

    Email: mastodon@bashi.fr

    Admin: @social.nassi.me

    Mastodon.Engineering

    Users: 57 . Toots: 4676 . Connections: 341 . Language: English

    A Mastodon instance for Engineers and Developers . We encourage technical subjects and Free, Open-Source, Software.
    Join our community of hardware hackers, code mercenaries, and tech-minded individuals.

    This server is provided as a contribution to engineering. We follow the Open Code of Conduct in addition to moderation deemed necessary by the admins.

    Admin: Not Available

    CMU.party

    Users: 17 . Toots: 50 . Connections: 105 . Language: English

    A Mastodon instance for the Carnegie Mellon community.

    This is space for Carnegie Mellon students, staff, and faculty to chat. This will be moderated for harassment. Please note that registration is restricted to cmu.edu (and subdomain) email addresses!

    Email: cgleason@cmu.edu

    Admin: @cgleason@cmu.party

    Mastodon by tcit

    Users: 122 . Toots: 2643 . Connections: 807 . Language: English

    Hi there !

    More Info... Follow @status for status updates, planned downtimes, etc.

    You may support the hosting of this instance on Liberapay.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time. Any user not respecting these rules may get silenced or suspended. Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited.

    Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description Adapted from the mastodon.xyz terms and conditions.

    Email: tcit@tcit.fr

    Admin: @tcit@social.tcit.fr

    masto.quad.moe

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 7 . Toots: 2975 . Connections: 530 . Language: English

    masto.quad.moe

    More Info...

    Invite-only instance for me and some friends.

    Even if a sign up form is visible, don't bother. You won't be able to confirm your mail address

    We do not allow:

    Continued, intentional and targeted bullying

    Pornographic avatars (No I won't complain about half-naked anime girls)

    NSFW content that's not tagged as NSFW

    Repeated spoiling of movies, games, books, etc. Use the content warning

    Obviously nothing that's actually illegal. Like child pornography or unironic bomb threats

    We do allow:

    Controversial opinions

    Shitposting (But please stop spamming people if they ask)

    almost everything else tbh, just don't be an asshole

    Server load

    5m averages:

    1h averages:

    Email: contact@quad.moe

    Admin: @quad@masto.quad.moe

    mstdn-workers.com

    preview

    join

    åŠ´åƒè€…ãŸã¡ã®Mastodon

    Users: 2781 . Toots: 528901 . Connections: 1030 . Language: English

    åƒãäººãŸã¡ã€ã¾ãŸã¯å°†æ¥åƒãäºˆå®šã®äººãŸã¡ãŒé›†ã¾ã£ãŸã‚‰ã„ã„ãªã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    åƒããŸããªã„ã§ã”ã–ã‚‹(Â´ãƒ»Ï‰ãƒ»`)

    More Info... ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼é‹ç”¨è²»ã‚’å€‹äººã§è² æ‹…ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒå³ã—ããªã£ãŸç‚ºã€æ”¯æ´é‡‘ã‚’å‹Ÿã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚è©³ã—ã„çµŒç·¯ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰

    æ”¯æ´è€…ã®çš†æ§˜

    TyamEpp, ãƒã‚°ãƒãƒªã‚¹, ã¾ã‚, ã¨ãƒ¼ã“, Aki@ComradeHG, mr175185, ã«ã‚ƒä¹‹åŠ©ï¼‘å·, ã„ãã‚‰, ã‚‚ã£ã¡ã€œ(), ãƒœãƒ˜ãƒŸã‚¢ãƒ³âš¡, åŒ–é‡ã‚†ã£ããƒ¼, ãªãªã‹ã‚Š (7kry), ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚¯@ç¤¾ç•œä¸¼, ãŸã‘ã¦ãƒ, ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ©, mozo, ã«ã‚‡, ã®ã¾ã®ã¾, æ¥ æœ¨æ ç©‚, æ„›æ¸…å¸å›½ã®äºº, æ°´ç„¡æœˆã»ãŸã‚‹, yukai21@æ®‹æ¥­ãŒå¾—æ„ãªãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚º, yz_s, 0u0L8, ãƒªãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ«, ã„ãã‚‰, ãƒã‚¤ã‚¬ãƒ–ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¯, ãã‚‹ã²ãª:ç©ºæ¯é“, ã‘ãƒ¼ã”, Rm, paopaobeer, ã™ã‚ã«ãƒ¼ã¨, ã™ãˆ, ã‚Œã¦ãƒã‚, å¾¡å‚å„ªä»(ã¿ã•ã‹ã‚†ã«), ã‚ˆã ã‹, ç¨²è‘‰ã‚ã¨, ãªã£ã¤ãƒ¼@UE4, ã²ãµã¿ã¨ã†, ã¸ã‘â˜€ï¸, Shartick Worker, ã˜ãããƒ¼, ã‚ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“(21/70), Då°‚ï¼‰èŒç‰¹åŒ–æ›¸åº—å“¡ã‚®ãƒ«@ã‚¹ã‚¯æ°´ã®è²´å…¬å­, ãµã‚ãµã‚çˆç²ã‹ã‚Šãƒ, ã¨ãƒ¼ã“, kome_bit, ããƒ¼ã—ã™, rt raven, ã—ã‚…ã‚‰å±±, izmi, ã‚‰ã„ã‹ãƒ’ãƒ­, ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒã‚³, Honeyoubun, ãƒ˜ã‚¤ãƒªãƒ¼, TyamEpp, ã­ãš, kktoaro0111, æµ…ç¾½ç¿”ä¸€, ã‚ãŠã—ãƒ­ãƒœ,, 2km10, ããš, ã„ã£ã¡ãƒ¼, ã¼ã†ã—, ã—ã‚…ã‚‰å±±, ã¿ãªã¥ãã€‚ç‰‡ç€¬ã¡ã²ã‚, Î±ÎºÏ„ï¼ ã®ã™ã‘, ç¥ç„¡æœˆè±è±, katsuyu, ã«ã£ã, ã‚ã³, ã—ã‚“ã‚„, æ·±æµ·ã‚†ã„, ãƒ‰ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ãƒä¼Šè—¤, ã‚†ã†ã¯ã€‚, D, ãã ãã¤ã­ (ç¤¾ç•œã¡ã‚ƒã‚“é¯–), RAVEN, åŒé¦¬ å‡œ, ã“ã°ã‚„ã—, ã†ãªãã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ãƒ†ãƒ³, NICROM@ç¤¾ç•œã¡ã‚ƒã‚“æ”¯æ´, ã§ã‚ã“, ã†ã‚„ã‚ãƒ¼

    thepractice.space

    about

    preview

    join

    The Practice Space

    Users: 70 . Toots: 252 . Connections: 333 . Language: English

    Welcome! The Practice Space is a Mastodon server dedicated to musicians of all stripes, nations, and genres. It's a social network focused on discussing all aspects of being a musicianâ€”theory, gigging, songwriting, you name it. You can also connect with people on most other Mastodon servers to expand your network even more! What is Mastodon? Here's a five-minute explainer.

    More Info... The Goals

    The aim of The Practice Space is to be both a fun and a useful community for musicians. To do that, we (the admins/moderators) lean towards being positive and protecting those who have less opportunity to express themselves.

    The Rules

    When in doubt, report and/or ask us. We go with the mastodon.social rules as a guideline. We are not hesitant about banning bad actors for the health of the overall community.

    The Practice Space follows the witches.town federation blocklist.

    Make Use of Content Warnings

    If it's sensitive, graphic, NSFW, or potentially distressing, put it behind a content warning. It's why we have them. That includes text and graphics; if you're not sure, use one.

    No Hating On Genre/Style

    The Practice Space is for all kinds of musicians. If something isn't your jam, there's no need to cause conflict over it. Just move along.

    Be Kind to Newbies

    Both new musicians and new members to the server. We were all new once! (That said, being new isn't an excuse to not learn.)

    Be Sensible with Promotion

    It's totally fine to promote your band, gigs, whatever! It's even encouraged. But if people are asking you to tone it down, take their advice. The rules are stricter when what's being promoted doesn't relate to music.

    No Harassment

    If someone says cut it out, cut it out. No debate.

    Nazi Punks Fuck Off

    Says it all.

    Disclaimer

    This server is an experiment. It might break, it might go away. Things may change, rapidly and/or dramatically. I'll do my best to keep things from getting crazy, and I'll always give warning when I can.

    Email: zoe@leporidaemedia.com

    Admin: @hupfen@thepractice.space

    burners.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 141 . Toots: 295 . Connections: 316 . Language: English

    An online community for burners and the people that love them )'( ğŸ”¥

    More Info...

    Radical Inclusion

    Anyone may be a part of Burners.social. We welcome and respect the stranger. No prerequisites exist for participation in our community.

    Gifting

    Burners.social is devoted to acts of gift giving. The value of a gift is unconditional. Gifting does not contemplate a return or an exchange for something of equal value.

    Decommodification

    In order to preserve the spirit of gifting, our community seeks to create social environments that are unmediated by commercial sponsorships, transactions, or advertising. We stand ready to protect our culture from such exploitation. We resist the substitution of consumption for participatory experience.

    Radical Self-reliance

    Burners.social encourages the individual to discover, exercise and rely on his or her inner resources.

    Radical Self-expression

    Radical self-expression arises from the unique gifts of the individual. No one other than the individual or a collaborating group can determine its content. It is offered as a gift to others. In this spirit, the giver should respect the rights and liberties of the recipient.

    Communal Effort

    Our community values creative cooperation and collaboration. We strive to produce, promote and protect social networks, public spaces, works of art, and methods of communication that support such interaction.

    Civic Responsibility

    We value civil society. Community members who organize events should assume responsibility for public welfare and endeavor to communicate civic responsibilities to participants. They must also assume responsibility for conducting events in accordance with local, state and federal laws.

    Leaving No Trace

    Our community respects the environment. We are committed to leaving no physical trace of our activities wherever we gather. We clean up after ourselves and endeavor, whenever possible, to leave such places in a better state than when we found them.

    Participation

    Our community is committed to a radically participatory ethic. We believe that transformative change, whether in the individual or in society, can occur only through the medium of deeply personal participation. We achieve being through doing. Everyone is invited to work. Everyone is invited to play. We make the world real through actions that open the heart.

    Immediacy

    Immediate experience is, in many ways, the most important touchstone of value in our culture. We seek to overcome barriers that stand between us and a recognition of our inner selves, the reality of those around us, participation in society, and contact with a natural world exceeding human powers. No idea can substitute for this experience.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    mtdn.jp

    ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ç§»è»¢ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€å†æ§‹ç¯‰ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡ºæ¥ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€å†ç™»éŒ²ã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ç™ºè¦‹æ¬¡ç¬¬ã€å•ç­”ç„¡ç”¨ã§ å³ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆåœæ­¢ ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã”æ³¨æ„ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    ï½¢ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï½£ ã¯å¿…èª­ã§ã™ã‚ˆ!!

    More Info... (è‡ªç§°) ä¸–ç•Œä¸€åˆ†ã‹ã‚Šã‚„ã™ã„èª¬æ˜ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

    (ä»Šã¾ã§ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’è¶…ãˆã‚‹å†…å®¹ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’è¦³ãŸã“ã¨ãŒç„¡ã„)

    Welcome on mastodon.blue !

    I'm @nyroldiin, the administrator of the instance

    What's behind ?

    This instance is hosted on a didicated server, in France.

    It has the following specifications :

    â€¢ Intel Xeon E5-1650v3

    â€¢ 6c/12t - 3,5 GHz/3,8 GHz

    â€¢ 128Go DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz

    â€¢ SoftRaid 2x2To

    â€¢ 500 Mbps bande passante

    â€¢ Debian 8

    icosahedron.website

    about

    preview

    join

    Icosahedron

    Users: 565 . Toots: 52725 . Connections: 1193 . Language: English

    icosahedron.website

    More Info... ï¼´ã€€ï¼¡ã€€ï¼®ã€€ï¼¡ã€€ï¼³ã€€ï¼©ã€€ï¼®ã€€ï¼®

    Site rules

    In order for this website to be able to function, there are some rules that you will have to follow while using it.

    Be friendly.

    The internet is a network that connects people using computers. The other endpoint is a human being with an inner life just as complex as your own. Act accordingly.

    Consider the reach of the posts you make. Tag content that you expect others might not want to see.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind are not tolerated here. Do not engage with a user if they do not want you to. Do not ask other users to, either.

    Donâ€™t start shit.

    Do not make posts just to get angry reactions.

    â€œI was being ironicâ€ is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.

    Do not drag unrelated people into a discussion.

    Obey the law.

    Specifically, Dutch (server location) and German (owner location) law.

    No illegal file sharing, no illegal pornography, no publication of personal protected information, no holocaust denial, you know the drill.

    Spam is not allowed.

    Bots that interact with a user without a users explicit request are not allowed.

    Automated or excessive advertising is not allowed.

    Be aware of the nature of the network.

    This website is part of a network of similar websites. Other websites may have different rules.

    The local administration has little control over users of other websites. You can, however, block and mute them - same as local users.

    In egregious cases, remote users or entire groups of users may be blocked from interacting with users of this website.

    Fascism is incompatible with a free exchange of ideas.

    When you endorse racism, exclusion and the structural and physical violence that come with it, you show yourself to not be interested in any sort of dialogue.

    Those who work towards a society based on chauvinism and nationalism rather than peaceful coexistance are not welcome here.

    Admin decisions are final.

    The interpretation of these rules is up to the administration and an admins decision overrides the rules.

    â€œTechnically I did not violate any ruleâ€ is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.

    The rules may be changed or amended when necessary.

    These goal of these rules is to ensure a safe and welcoming environment.

    Rule enforcement is guided by this goal.

    Any enforcement action will generally be kept between those involved.

    Try to self-moderate, but do not hesitate to involve an admin when necessary.

    There are presently three people with administrative access to the website, @halcy, @dotUser, @WAHa_06x36 .

    You can report rule violations via e-mail.

    Email: lorenzd+icosa@gmail.com

    Admin: @halcy@icosahedron.website

    PostgreSQL

    ElastiCache

    cache.t2.micro

    Redis

    Media Files

    S3 bucket

    with CloudFront/ACM

    Email: kirino.minato+mastodon@gmail.com

    Admin: @imksoo@mastodon.chotto.moe

    mastodon.network

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 6923 . Toots: 59072 . Connections: 1752 . Language: English

    A social network open to all users.

    More Info... This is a free and open Mastodon instance ran by @ian.

    We're one of the largest and most active Mastodon instances around, and we're quickly growing as a community. We are also federating with many of the other major instances. If you have questions about how this works or how to create your own instance, feel free to reach out.

    If you see any abusive behavior, please report it. Each report is reviewed personally. Please treat each other with respect.

    This instance is hosted on three servers: Two load balanced web servers and database server. They each have the following specifications:

    - 4 core Xeon 2.13GHz CPU

    - 8GB RAM

    - SSD storage

    Hosting costs are being covered by myself currently. If we need to upgrade servers in the future, I may post a link to help cover costs.

    If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

    Email: hello@mastodon.network

    Admin: @mastodon.network

    Og husk at det betyder meget pÃ¥ Mastodon hvem de andre pÃ¥ ens server fÃ¸lger, fordi de, og dem de snakker med, er de mennesker der dukker op i den fÃ¸dererede tidslinie.

    SÃ¥ bidrag gerne med nogle gode folk at fÃ¸lge ...

    Email: JensE@puggaard-nyborg.dk

    Admin: @JensE@uldhaar.dk

    mastodon.elmit.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 19 . Toots: 500 . Connections: 483 . Language: English

    The Twitter Killer

    Welcome

    Here some resources to understand Mastodon:

    • Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron
    • Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

    Rules

    • No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law.
    • No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc).
    • No parody account.
    • No bot (for the moment).
    • Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning.
    • No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Mobile applications

    • Android : Tusky
    • iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon
    • Full list

    Support Mastodon

    • The code source can be found here : Github
    • You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

    Support this instance mastodon.elmit.com

    ...sponsored by Elmit

    Email: ronald+mastodon@elmit.com

    Admin: @Elmit@mastodon.elmit.com

    BABYMETAL PARTY

    Users: 110 . Toots: 793 . Connections: 351 . Language: English

    BABYMETALãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ãŒé›†ã¾ã‚‹Mastodonã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    This is the Mastodon Instance for BABYMETAL fans.

    Put your Kitsune up!

    Since April 26 2017

    ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    • æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ³•å¾‹ã«åã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™
    • ä»–è€…ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã®ä¾µå®³ã«ãªã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™
    • CDã€DVDã€Blu-rayç­‰ã‹ã‚‰ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ãŸéŸ³å£°ã‚„æ˜ åƒã‚’TOOTã—ãªã„ã§ãã ã•ã„
    • BABYMETALã®ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚„é–¢ä¿‚è€…ç­‰ã®ãªã‚Šã™ã¾ã—ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™
    • å†™çœŸã‚„ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æŠ•ç¨¿ã™ã‚‹æ™‚ã¯å¯èƒ½ãªé™ã‚Šå‡ºå…¸ã‚’è¨˜ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„
      â€»ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã®å ´åˆã¯å¿…ãšä½œè€…ã‚’æ˜è¨˜ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚
    • We are THE ONE!

    Rules

    • Acts contrary to Japanese law are prohibited.
    • Acts that infringe the rights of others are forbidden.
    • Please do not post audio and video copied from CD, DVD, Blu-ray etc.
    • When you post photos and illustrations, please write down the source as much as possible.
      *In the case of illustrations, please be sure to state the author of it.
    • We are THE ONE!

    freehold.earth

    about

    preview

    join

    Freehold Earth

    Users: 137 . Toots: 1158 . Connections: 511 . Language: English

    Freehold.Earth is a free-speech centered community, extremely lightly moderated (we'll do what we can about spam and harassment, and possibly some management of the federated public timeline, that's about it...do as you please when communicating with followers!). More info at https://freehold.earth/about/more

    More Info... Welcome!

    The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we donâ€™t particularly like, to have a voice in the world. While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

    However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be â€œbad peopleâ€ or holders of â€œdangerous opinionsâ€ ejected from the communityâ€¦this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.

    What does this mean in terms of user experience?

    The admins donâ€™t want to hear about your problems with anyone you havenâ€™t both muted and blocked. Itâ€™s your job to step away from speech that is troubling to you. We will take action to:

    Try to mitigate spam problems.

    Try to intervene in harrassment, defined specifically as a user persistently contacting another user who has already muted and blocked them. If you didnâ€™t mute and block, they arenâ€™t harrassing you, though they may be annoying. Annoying is not on the list of things we care about.

    Try to mitigate actual security issues.

    Encourage a tolerant and open community where users can control which content they produce and engage with.

    Note the use of â€œtryâ€ and â€œencourageâ€â€¦there are things we simply do not control, and we will not sacrifice free speech for everyone in an attempt to make our community a safe haven from all the worldâ€™s ills. Earth is a chaotic place, and Freehold.Earth will likely be so as well.

    What should users know?

    A â€œpostâ€ (â€œtweetâ€ elsewhere) is called a â€œtootâ€ here. To repeat/amplify a toot is to â€œboostâ€ that toot.

    We favorite things we like, by clicking the star on the toot.

    The Local Timeline is all public posts at the moment on Freehold.Earth

    The Federated Timeline is every public post from anywhere that is seen by Freehold.Earth â€“ the more remote users followed by our users, the more of a firehose this becomes.

    Are there any tips for being loved and followed by many?

    Generally, weâ€™re not here to tell you what to doâ€¦but in case you were wondering what social conventions are popular, consider the following. Observing these tips will also help keep other servers from blocking our traffic!

    Please use the #NSFW tag for NSFW postsâ€¦this allows other users to filter their view in public places.

    Please wrap content likely to annoy some of your audience (politics, rants, etc) in a CW (Content Warning).

    Please donâ€™t use an animated GIF for your avatar.

    Please place the #bot tag in the profile of any non-human account.

    Please be a bit kinder than is really called for, and disengage rather than escalate when you see drama starting.

    When someoneâ€™s being an asshat, please assume itâ€™s out of misunderstanding rather than malice, until they prove you wrong.

    Meet the Freehold.Earth admin team:

    HedgeMage â€¦This is my server, but Iâ€™m more often active on my personal account, HedgeMage@maly.io than on Freehold.

    Consentacles â€¦Iâ€™m generally friendlyâ€¦AFTER coffee has been applied.

    KatamariChaos â€¦I like to boost a good toot.

    Nodes (instances) currently blocked by Freehold.Earth

    **NONE**

    A note on bot accounts:

    We are currently experimenting with silencing followbot accounts to reduce noise in the Federated Timeline at Freehold.Earth.

    Follow bot traffic should not appear in the Federated Timeline, if it does, feel free to report it so we can silence.

    Follow bots are NOT under a suspension ban. You can still follow them (and they you) if desired, the traffic just wonâ€™t be in the Federated Timeline. Some followbots will not follow users with #nobot in their profile.

    It is possible for bots that are not follow bots to get caught up in this ban. If you think you have seen this happening, please contact the admins.

    A follow bot is a bot that indiscriminately follows most/all users it comes across, in an attempt to increase federation between small servers and the rest of the Fediverse. Because their follow choices are random (and some spew statistics as often as every twenty minutes), weâ€™re hoping that removing this traffic will make Freehold.Earthâ€™s Federated Timeline more relevant and interesting to our users.

    This is currently an experiment and may change at any time.

    Email: admins@freehold.earth

    Admin: @freehold.earth

    mastodon.acc.umu.se

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon @ UMU

    Users: 10 . Toots: 23 . Connections: 505 . Language: English

    mastodon.acc.umu.se is run by the Academic Computer Club at UmeÃ¥ University located in UmeÃ¥, Sweden.

    Currently registration is only open to users affiliated with UmeÃ¥ University so please use your university email when signing up!

    For those outside of UmeÃ¥ University, please see our sibling instance mastodon.acc.sunet.se which is open for registration to the world.

    More Info... WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

    ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.

    You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website.

    Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.

    General Usage

    Accounts on mastodon.acc.umu.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own? :)

    We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):(in English) (i Svenska)

    You may not post (or boost/repost):

    material illegal under Swedish laws

    material against the rules of SUNET

    material in breach of the copyright act

    material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

    It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

    Code of Conduct

    Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

    You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

    Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

    If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

    Reporting an issue

    For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

    For content or abuse issues:

    if you're a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;

    If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".

    For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

    Privacy

    ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

    Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

    Federation

    mastodon.acc.umu.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

    Currently not federating with: none

    In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

    Currently silenced:

    pawoo.net (no media)

    Last updated: 2017-04-28

    Email: mastodon@acc.umu.se

    Admin: @maswan@mastodon.acc.umu.se

    mastodon.dremtech.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 476 . Toots: 1999 . Connections: 603 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance in french and english for tech enthusiasts

    More Info... The following guidelines (thanks mastodon.social) are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.dremtech.fr; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: dfages@dremtech.fr

    Admin: @dfages@mastodon.dremtech.fr

    â—ã‚¨ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ­ã‚„SPAMã€éåº¦ã®é€£æŠ•ã‚„ï¼Œè‡ªå‹•å¤§é‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã€å€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã®æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã®ä»–ã€æ³•ã«æŠµè§¦ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã®ã‚ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã¯ã€ç®¡ç†äººã®åˆ¤æ–­ã§äºˆå‘Šãªãæ¶ˆå»ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®åœæ­¢ã‚’è¡Œã†å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    Plants Network ã®Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    mastodon.al

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon At Large

    Users: 21 . Toots: 258 . Connections: 421 . Language: English

    A community for art, politics, and technology.

    Ground rules:

    1. Don't be an asshole.
    2. Talking about politics is fine, as long as you stay within the bounds of Rule 1. Politics doesn't have to be CW'd here.
    3. If you post something NSFW, CW and mark it NSFW. If its NSFL, don't post it here.
    4. If you see anything posted here or come in from the Federated Timeline that a reasonable person would not want hosted on their server, please report it.

    Contact

    Business e-mail:

    admin@vrb.al

    Email: admin@vrb.al

    Admin: @mastodon.al

    Users: 68 . Toots: 1861 . Connections: 554 . Language: English

    ACHTUNG: Hier ist noch alles beta und sehr frisch. Die Nutzer von Bonn.social sind fÃ¼r ihre eigenen Inhalte selbst verantwortlich. Missbrauch kann mit den Reporting-Tools oder unter email@bonn.digital gemeldet werden.

    mastodon.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    mastodon.coffee

    Users: 41 . Toots: 245 . Connections: 1180 . Language: English

    The coffee flavored instance for all us coffee addicts

    More Info... This is taken straight from mastodon.social as we apply the same guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: admin@mastodon.coffee

    Admin: @Liljeberg@mastodon.coffee

    ã‚‚ãµã‘ã‚‚ã®ã€‚

    Users: 40 . Toots: 130 . Connections: 66 . Language: English

    ã€Œã‚‚ãµã‘ã‚‚ã®ã€‚ã€ã¯ä¸»ã« ã‚±ãƒ¢ãƒ ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ«ã‚’æ‰±ã†Mastodonï¼ˆãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ï¼‰ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã€Œç£äººã€ã‚„ã€Œãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚´ãƒ³ã€ã‚„ã€Œäººå¤–ã€ãªã©ã‚‚å¯ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã€Œã‚±ãƒ¢ãƒã€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆå°‚ç”¨ã®ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³è²¸ã—å‡ºã—ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’é‹å–¶ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    Email: daibaka(at)daibaka.tk

    mastodon.host

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 2949 . Toots: 18433 . Connections: 1689 . Language: English

  • General, fast, stable and open instance.


  • Federate with everyone.


  • One of the most complete Federated timeline thanks to @federationbot

  • lightly moderated in general, common sense applied. That said, read the rules below :)


    • What sets mastodon.host appart ?

    As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have.
    We have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a 'normal' instance, there's a lot to read in a lot of languages ).
    Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we'd like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here. Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !
    Please read the FAQ below or at https://mastodon.host/about/more to get started.

    What are the instance rules ?

    No illegal stuff, harassment, discrimination, xenophobia, threats or any behavior that is not appropriate to a friend will be tolerated to our users. This is a safe place for everyone, respect your fellow users or silence/block if you don't want to see someone.
    We moderate on our users report
    Erotic/Porn/Gore/Etc.. talks/pictures/videos.. must be behind a CW. If you would not open that picture/video in front of your boss/wife/husband/kids => CW ( Content Warning ).
    Anything that is illegal in Europe/USA shall not be posted on this server, Lolicons for example are illegal. Globally common sense applied, don't do illegal stuff, don't discriminate, don't be a racist, etc...
    Notify to an administrator or report if you have a doubt. Do not engage, if you don't want to see someone's contributions, you can block/silence that person and report to us, we'll deal with it.
    We try to post in english so everyone understands, but that rule is not enforced at all ;)
    Most important have fun and be nice to each other !
    Oh and nazis, racists are banned on sight too, of course.

    What is this instance privacy policy ?

    We will never share your data with anyone, except if a valid legal request is received (Hopefully it will not happen).

    Who are the admins ? Shoutouts section.

    This instance is hosted by @gled

    More Info... How does it works ?

    When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on mastodon.host. That is your instance.

    You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated.

    The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on mastodon.host and use it to access the Mastodon federation ).

    The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers.

    That is here that mastodon.host is a bit different, with a bot that actively follow everyone it sees on the federated timeline, we'll have eventually a good view of the overall network on the federated timeline.

    @federationbot code is available on Github

    What app can I use on my phone ?

    There's multiples apps that support Mastodon:

    - Twidere now support both Twitter and Mastodon, allowing you to seamlessly using the two networks, available for both Android and iOS.

    - Amaroq is a popular app for Iphones.

    - Tooty Fruity, Tusky, 11t or Subway tooter are also an option for Android phones.

    How do I get verified ? Who is who ?

    Do it yourself ;) For now there is no verification on Mastodon, it's just an emoji that people add as a joke.Your identity on Mastodon and the fediverse ( the federation of all the Mastodon instances ) is yourusername@yourinstance, so when you register here, your identity is yourusername@mastodon.host . You can follow and communicate with anyone in the fediverse if you know his username@instance !

    How do I follow a user from another instance ?

    If you know his username and his instance, you can search for @username@instance and from there it should be pretty easy. It's pretty young so there's room for improvments, and I'm sure that we'll end up being able to search across instances. There is now also some sites that allows searching users. You can always look at the federated timeline and find some interesting contacts !

    How do I mask X language from the timelines ? I can't read that

    That's a feature being developped at the moment, but you can always head to Mastodon lang remover

    to do it in your browser without waiting for the feature to be integrated.

    Who is moderating the instance ?

    For the moment, you by reporting the posts and users and the admin enforcing the rules. We are currently recruiting a moderator team ( look for the announces by @gled ).

    How often do you update the service ?

    Usually the day a new stable version is released. You can follow @gled for announces when this is happening.

    How much does it cost ?

    Mastodon is free for the users.

    This instance is hosted by me,@gled, on my personal funds.

    Your help is appreciated to maintain/make the platform evolve.

    How can I help ?

    You can get involved in multiple ways, you can welcome new users, animate the local timeline, promote our instance and invite new users here, report posts and users not respecting our rules...

    You can also help with the costs of running the service by donating, any small amount is appreciated ! Donations are accepted on:

    Liberapay:

    Paypal:

    What if the administrator cannot keep the service running ?

    If in the future, we are unable to continue maintaining the service, it'll be handed to another administrator team that the community trusts !

    Email: gled@remote-shell.net

    Admin: @gled@mastodon.host

    ãƒ»å•†æ¥­çš„å‘ŠçŸ¥ã€é‡‘éŠ­ã‚„æ›é‡‘ã§ãã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã®ã‚„ã‚Šå–ã‚Šã‚„ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç¦æ­¢

    ãƒ»å•†æ¥­ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã¸ã®å®£ä¼ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ç™»éŒ²ç¦æ­¢

    ãƒ»ä»–ã€ç›®ã«ä½™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºãŒè¦‹ãˆã‚‹å ´åˆã¯å¯¾å‡¦ã—ã¾ã™

    Email: Not Available

    mstdn.ebi-fry306.net

    yoshis.woolly.world

    Yoshi's Awoolly World

    Users: 1 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 168 . Language: English

    the culmination of a 3 day battle with Docker, message me if you want in

    • birdsite: @knxggles
    • fediverse: @knxggles@mastodon.social / @callum@yoshis.woolly.world
    • email: me@knxggles.xyz

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: me@knxggles.xyz

    Admin: @callum@yoshis.woolly.world
