    Cuttlefish

    about

    preview

    join

    Cuttlefish

    Users: 6 . Toots: 36 . Connections: 20 . Language: English

    Cuttlefish

    More Info... By charging a small monthly amount, Cuttlefish can pay its costs and its development team a fair wage and distribute the rest back to its members.

    Cuttlefish is in the early stages of formation. We have an idea of how weâ€™d like it to operate, but are figuring out the details as we go. The answers below sketch our current thinking about the project and the direction we hope to go in the future.

    Q&A;

    Why shouldnâ€™t I sign up for a free social network?

    You can, and if you prefer you should. Cuttlefish is an alternative that attempts to answer the question of how a social network can be run without showing you ads or selling your information. Since Cuttlefish runs inside a larger OStatus network, members can interact with a larger community of users.

    Mastodon was written by volunteers, and other instances are run by volunteers as well. Why not donate your time instead of asking for money?

    The progress that the maintainers and contributors to Mastodon and OStatus is impressive, and their dedication to the stewardship of these projects is admirable. Our focus is on creating a sustainable instance, and we think that means having a dedicated staff working on the project. That gives us time to devote to moderation, maintenance, and contributing back to the open source projects that are being used to run Cuttlefish. We donâ€™t think that this would be possible if running Cuttlefish was treated as a side project.

    Why not just accept donations?

    Accepting donations leads to some members having undue influence in the community, because their donations are required to cover operating costs. We ask each user to contribute equally to the cost of running the service, with the hope of returning membership fees to active members.

    What do you mean by active members?

    At this point, just members in active standing. In the future, this might also include looking at who is posting good stuff within their local network. We realize that add more terms to unpack, and raises more questions than it resolves. Our goal is to promote a healthy community, and we will be looking at how different means of profit-sharing might help that being achieved.

    How are membership fees redistributed?

    Our intention is to do this on a quarterly basis, and initially by equally dividing profit between members. During the initial quarter of a membership, the amount returned will be based on the percentage of the quarter for which the membership was active.

    How are the operating costs determined?

    Currently we are basing our operating costs on having one developer, one community moderator, and a part-time operations manager work on the project. There are also legal issues that require counsel that will need to be addressed in the initial months of operation. We estimate operating costs for the first month to be around twelve thousand US dollars. We will be publishing our actual operating costs quarterly, and revising that estimate to account changes in staffing.

    Who is running this instance?

    Cuttlefish is currently solely sponsored by the team at Standard Library, a small development firm that works inside of the cultural sector. We have a strong experience in building and maintaining Rails applications.

    Email: cuttlefishcoop@gmail.com

    Admin: @root@Cuttlefish

    å°å‹ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ”ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚„ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«,ãŠã‚‚ã¡ã‚ƒ ã‚¬ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒƒãƒˆå¥½ããªäººãŒäº¤æµã§ãã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã¨ã—ã¦ gadget.inpocket.net ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ ã‚’ã”åˆ©ç”¨ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ æ³•çš„ã«å•é¡Œã®ã‚ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã€ã¾ãŸä»–äººã‚’ä¸å¿«ã«ã•ã›ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã¯ã€ç„¡æ¡ä»¶ã§ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’åœæ­¢ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    æ³¨æ„äº‹é …

    ã‚ªã‚¿ã‚¯å¥³å­ç”¨ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚å¹´é½¢ã€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ«ã€æ¬¡å…ƒå•ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã€Œè‡ªåˆ†ã¯ã‚ªã‚¿ã‚¯å¥³å­ã ã€ã¨ã„ã†è‡ªèªãŒã‚ã‚‹æ–¹ã®ã¿ãŠä½¿ã„ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    social.weho.st

    about

    preview

    join

    social.weho.st

    Users: 93 . Toots: 4304 . Connections: 766 . Language: English

    This is an instance of mastodon that runs on the https://weho.st platform. weho.st is a non-profit internet service provider based in Amsterdam in the Netherlands.

    More Info... https://social.weho.st don't make use of advertising or external analytics software and does not make any money with your information. For more information on weho.st visit our FAQ.

    Blocked servers

    We have silenced the server pawoo.net due to a flood of images that are illegal in the US and EU. Their admin hasnt taken actions to moderate this content, if they do then we will consider removing the block.

    We aim to not block instances unless they are serving illegal content under Dutch or EU laws. We do not enjoy or condone censorship but fulfil our legal requirements when necessary.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administrators of social.weho.st.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: hello AT weho DOT st

    Admin: @realitygaps@social.weho.st

    social.kimamass.com

    mastodon.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Moosetodon

    Users: 1642 . Toots: 23641 . Connections: 1046 . Language: English

    A Canadian based Mastodon platform, open to people from everywhere.

    More Info... What's a Moosetodonian?

    Official Moosetodonians are people from this local instance who are recognized for their contributions to the community. We recognize monetary donations, code contributions, and community participation and support.

    Supporting This Instance

    Mastdodon.club is a personally created and funded instance. Your generous donations help support the costs of operating and developing new features, which are growing with the size of our local community. Continued donations as small as $3-5 will help ensure the longevity of our instance.

    Fosspay (official)

    PayPal.me (alt.)

    Bitcoin: 39gkNYdkm1u2kUqpkFFAtbjJ4c9MRjvnE5

    A shout-out to Cloud-A Computing for discounting some of the raw infrastructure required to run this community project! It wouldn't be possible without you.

    Code of Conduct

    This instance is for people interacting with other people. Please no corporate shills and direct advertisement. You'll get yourself banned real fast.

    Make use of Content Warnings & NSFW tags for appropriate content. Do not mis-use hashtags, they're not for promoting your products or photography in #introduction or #mastodon.

    No hate speech (contributing or inciting), death threats, illegal activity, link & local stream spamming, etc.

    Bots must respect the #nobot hashtag Admin swings ban hammer, rulings final.

    Email: thurloat@moosetodon.ca

    Admin: @thurloat@mastodon.club

    mastodon.scot

    join

    mastodon.scot

    Users: 22 . Toots: 47 . Connections: 80 . Language: English

    This is a Mastodon instance primarily intended for users in Scotland or who identify as Scottish.
    Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation and/or further measures. The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content.

    mstdn.3mivon.net

    about

    preview

    join

    spanner.works

    about

    preview

    join

    Spanner Works

    Users: 7 . Toots: 411 . Connections: 497 . Language: English

    I like you and your friends.

    More Info... Joining a Mastodon (or GNU Social) instance like this one doesn't limit you to seeing only the users on this instance, because this instance automatically federates with other instances.

    What that means is that when users on this instance interact with users on remote instances -- reply to them, favorite their posts, boost their posts -- those remote users become part of the "federated timeline" of this instance.

    So the more users on spanner.works talk to other people in the federated network, the more interesting the federated timeline becomes. And it becomes interesting in a way that's similar to how interesting our own users are in the first place.

    The local timeline allows users on this instance alone to talk amongst ourselves -- but it also shows when our users interact with remote users, so if you see a conversation one of us is having with a user on, say, witches.town, you can chime in.

    As for posting, note that you have fine control over the privacy of each post using the globe icon (including DMs) and you can embed a "content warning" in any post, which hides everything below the CW until someone clicks. This gets used for everything from hiding the punchline of a joke to hiding triggering content.

    Email: kaufhauskuchen@11chars.com

    Admin: @datn@spanner.works

    twitterchan.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ::TwitterChan::

    Users: 5 . Toots: 215 . Connections: 359 . Language: English

    Fierce and unapologetic freedom of expression.

    The only speech or ideas prohibited, censored or otherwise banned here are those which are explicitly illegal in the USA. 

    Donations BTC: 1QJiano79Lp7FHrTPcNyuTeuzzXQHXFPbB

    Mastodon-Twitter Friend Finder

    NOTICE: If you have attempted to create an account and did not receive an activation email, please email admin@twitterchan.net.

    More Info... This service exists to fiercely and unashamedly support freedom of expression.

    We operate under the rights afforded by the First Amendment of the Constitution of the United States of America.

    You will not be banned or censored here unless you violate the laws of the USA (i.e., you engage in illegal activities). We are a principles-based system -- meaning we do not maintain complicated rules or terms. Instead, operate under the principle that you're entirely free to express yourself to others, but you must also live with the karmic consequences. In other words, if you're an insufferable ass in the context of your speech, then you might find yourself talking while no one's listening.

    Email: admin@twitterchan.net

    Admin: @twitterchan.net

    é‹ç”¨ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    è©¦é¨“ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®ãŸã‚ã€äºˆå‘Šãªãã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ãŒåœæ­¢ã—ãŸã‚Šã€åˆæœŸåŒ–ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚(ä½•åº¦ã‹æ­¢ã¾ã£ã¦ã‚‹)

    ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒå¿…è¦ãªå ´åˆã¯ã€@infoå®›ã«DMã§ã”é€£çµ¡ã„ãŸã ãã‹ã€ç™»éŒ²æ¸ˆã®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ·»ãˆã¦ã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¾ãŸã¯Twitter(@pso2_club)ã§ã”é€£çµ¡ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãªãŠã€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã«å¯¾ã—ã€å¯¾å¿œã‚’ä¿è¨¼ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    æ¨©åˆ©è€…ã‹ã‚‰ã®ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ã¯è¿…é€Ÿã«å¯¾å¿œã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    botã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«å¿…ãšé€£çµ¡å…ˆã‚’è¨˜è¼‰ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    mastodon.mita.me

    Mastodon@mita.me

    Users: 33 . Toots: 63 . Connections: 152 . Language: English

    This instance. It's the same as any other one, except running off of a netbook from 2008 and doing a lot of other things. Don't sign up here if you want stability.

    I'm sure I'll be the only one to actually use this instance, but if not, here's the few rules:

    Don't be a dick.

    No follow bots (except @FollowBot*)

    Mitame

    * currently disabled as it was annoying people across the fediverse. Follow people you like to hear from to expand the Federated Timelines reach!

    Email: mastodon@mita.me

    Admin: @Mitame@mastodon.mita.me

    redwombat.social

    about

    preview

    join

    RedWombat.social

    Users: 1 . Toots: 66 . Connections: 109 . Language: English

    RedWombat.social is a Mastodon Instance for use by Kevin Sonney , Ursula Vernon, and their friends and family.

    Accounts are by invitation only , although we connect and share with the rest of the Mastodon Universe.

    More Info... Shamelessly borrowed with permission from Kitty.Town

    As a user of RedWombat.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from RedWombat.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admins.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Admins)

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and graphic violence

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from RedWombat.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on RedWombat.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing RedWombat.social or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Admins reserve the right to revoke any user's content on or access to RedWombat.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: kevin@sonney.com

    Admin: @ksonney@redwombat.social

    ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã¯ä»Šã®ã¨ã“ã‚å–ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã®ã§ã€æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã‚„ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒæ¶ˆãˆã¦ã‚‚æ³£ã‹ãªã„ã§ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    Mastodon for TeamBlackBerry.JP

    Users: 35 . Toots: 524 . Connections: 37 . Language: English

    ã“ã® Mastodon ã¯ã€BlackBerryãŒå¥½ããªäººã‚„ã€BlackBerryãŒãªã„ã¨æ­»ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒã†äººã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚
    This Mastodon instance is for people who like BlackBerry or who can't live without BlackBerry. But, discussions aren't limited to BlackBerry.

    åªä»Šã€msn.comã€outlook.com ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ãŸè‡ªå‹•ç™»éŒ²ãŒã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚æ‰‹å‹•ã§æ‰¿èªã—ã¾ã™ã®ã§ mastodon@teamblackberry.jp ã¾ã§ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ ã‚‚ã¡ã‚ã‚“ BBM ã§ã‚‚OKã§ã™ï¼(PIN:59096EE7)

    oulipo.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Oulipo.social

    Users: 738 . Toots: 8722 . Connections: 482 . Language: English

    A Dcntralizd and Fdratd Social Ntwork

    More Info... Oulipo.social is a lipogrammatic Mastodon for all.

    FAQ

    I saw a stray fifth symbol! Can you fix it?

    Look at our list of bugs on GitHub. It's probably known, and you shouldn't toot at @mus about it. If it's not known, add a bug or a PR on GitHub.

    Can I post links that contain taboo symbols?

    Go for it. Validation skips links and it's not a faux pas at all.

    What if I post symbols that look similar to that taboo glyph?

    Don't. Mods will discard toots that do this, and if you don't stop, banning may follow.

    No problm I'll writ lik this.

    No. Stop. Don't do this.

    But this is hard?

    Practicing will bring you far.

    What synonym should I sub in for [x]?

    Try to stop looking for synonyms; if you try to swap out individual words, you'll find it tough going. Pull back and think abstractly about what you want to say and find words for that.

    Social Contract

    This social contract is an adaptation from Mastodon.social.

    What follows is not a law contract, and final ruling is up to administrators of oulipo.social; it should function to clarify our community policy and standards:

    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list:

    Abundant ads

    Bots that post spam

    Pornography without a "CW" or "Tricky Topic" tag

    Horrific or traumatic posts without a "CW" or "Tricky Topic" tag

    That fifth symbol, or any variant of it, that is found in Latin script, including using "3" or homographic symbols in its spot.

    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list, and is possibly grounds for banning:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Misogyny or advocation of misogyny

    Discrimination against LGBT minority groups or individuals, or advocation of that

    Jingoism or militant nationalism

    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up and is without doubt grounds for banning:

    Child pornography

    Nazism of any kind or any promoting of National Socialism

    Any conduct which could stalk or harass participants or individuals, or stop individuals from participating in this community, or to impact usability and functionality of this community, or to harass anybody, or advocations that accounts do such actions, is not okay, and is grounds for banning any violators. This is activity such as:

    Continuing to talk to an individual that has said to stop, a platform's privacy tools notwithstanding.

    Posting, and/or sharing an individual's data or information without that individual's approval (informally known as doxing or dropping dox).

    Inciting accounts to post to an individual in additional discussion if that individual has said it should stop (informally known brigading or dogpiling).

    All this notwithstanding, administrators of oulipo.social can ban any accounts, at any point, for any motivation, if not in violation of law.

    Email: mousereeve@riseup.net

    Admin: @mus@oulipo.social

    i-n-t-e-r-n-e-t-2-0-0-0.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Internet 2000

    Users: 39 . Toots: 83 . Connections: 2 . Language: English

    [FR] Bienvenue sur TOOT.AQUILENET.FR

    Aquilenet ( Aquilenet.fr ), fournisseur d'accÃ¨s Ã  Internet associatif, local et militant en Aquitaine vous accueille sur son instance Mastodon !

    [EN] Welcome on TOOT.AQUILENET.FR

    Aquilenet ( Aquilenet.fr ), associative Internet Service Provider, local et engaged, located in Aquitaine (France) welcomes you on its Mastodon instance !

    More Info... [FR] Quelques infos en +

    L'accÃ¨s est ouvert Ã  touâ‹…teâ‹…s (et toots), mais la modÃ©ration sera intransigeante avec les cas de mauvais comportement sur l'instance, Ã  savoir la tenue de propos offensants (sexistes, racistes, LGBTQI+phobes, ou jugÃ©s oppressifs sous toute forme) et les cas de harcÃ¨lement ciblÃ© envers unâ‹…e utilisateurâ‹…ice.

    â‹… @aquilenet@toot.aquilenet.fr

    â‹… @cyphergoat@toot.aquilenet.fr

    â‹… @samuel_thibault@toot.aquilenet.fr

    â‹… @sacha@toot.aquilenet.fr

    Bienvenue parmi nous \o/ !

    [EN] Some more informations

    The access is open for everyone, but the moderation will be strict about cases of bad behaviour on the instance, which includes having offensive words (sexist, racist, LGBTQI+phobic, or judged as oppressive in any way) and the cases of cyber-harrassing toward an user.

    You can contact the administrators of the instance whenever needed, at :

    â‹… @aquilenet@toot.aquilenet.fr

    â‹… @cyphergoat@toot.aquilenet.fr

    tusk.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Tusk.Social

    Users: 558 . Toots: 6706 . Connections: 676 . Language: English

    PLEASE NOTE: There is no way yet to delete accounts or change usernames. So please bear that in mind before creating an account.

    Just another Mastodon instance. But we like it here. Bad behavior is not rewarded. If your hobbies involve harassing people, the constant use of 'SJW' or 'cuck' as pejoratives, or just general shitposting, then find somewhere else to go. You own your freedom. I own the server. A longer, more-detailed policy for this instance is in the works.

    Tusk.social uses the Witches.Town domain block list .

    Don't harass. Don't be a shitty person. Do that, and we'll get along just fine.

    PS - Yo, please get an icon straight away so you don't look like a bot. Also, local accounts which haven't tooted after 45 days are subject to deletion/suspension. Also also, while it's not a rule, just a request... please don't use this instance for follow bots and the like. If it takes, rather than contributes, please do that somewhere else.

    Extended About Page

    FYI - hotmail.com, outlook.com and live.com (so... all of Microsoft, basically) don't like our mail host (mailgun). So... you might have problems if your email is with one of those. Sorry.

    "What's this Mastodon thing all about??" - Here are a couple of articles to get you started.

    http://www.theverge.com/2017/4/7/15183128/mastodon-open-source-twitter-clone-how-to-use https://medium.com/@qinaliu/what-i-wish-i-knew-before-joining-mastodon-7a17e7f12a2b

    Email: accounts@tusk.social

    Admin: @tankgrrl@tusk.social

    im-in.space

    about

    preview

    join

    SPAAAAACE!

    Users: 344 . Toots: 3145 . Connections: 993 . Language: English

    Space. Space? I'm in space!
    This instance is using the Flat, Dark and Colourful! (Blue and Orange) stylesheet by @dia@aleph.land .
    Please follow @status to get updates and news!

    Space Core image by TertonDA

    More Info... Stats

    Status

    -

    NetData

    Registrations closed?

    Do you want to join but the registrations are closed? Ask Kody on that birbsite or on Mastodon with kdy@im-in.space! (Or use that as an email.)

    Code modifications

    We've made some changes to the Mastodon code and styles to personalize this instance. Our code is available on GitHub at im-in-space/mastodon.

    Blocked accounts and instances

    Due to the nature/behavior from some instances or users, we have silenced or suspended some of them. The complete list is available on GitHub, here.

    Basic rules

    Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech) and fight in direct messages.

    Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

    If I get reports because you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.

    NSFW is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the message text box). Loli, gore and rape is not allowed.

    Don't make parody accounts and don't spam.

    We don't like bots who randomly follow users.

    Respect French law.

    In case of non-respect of those rules, use the report link (in the toot menu) or contact @kdy.

    Server info

    Like many other French people did, this server is hosted at Scaleway, in Paris.

    VC1M (4 x86 64bit Cores, 4GB memory) with a 50GB LSSD. Storage can be upgraded after a quick reboot.

    IPv4: 163.172.147.245

    IPv6: 2001:bc8:4400:2500::25:907

    We do daily offsite and encrypted backups.

    We will never look at your private toots, unless someone sends us a report about it.

    How long until this instance shuts down?

    Except if I suddenly don't have any money to run this, this instance will be running until the domain expires.

    For now it's until April 15th 2018, but we can renew it before we get there.

    Email: kdy@im-in.space

    Admin: @kdy@im-in.space

    ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    â—†Cosplayer ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã®é‹å–¶ãŠæ‰‹ä¼ã„ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“å‹Ÿé›†

    Cosplayer ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã¯ã€ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹é‹å–¶ã®ãŠæ‰‹ä¼ã„ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹
    ç¾å½¹ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“ã‚’å‹Ÿé›†ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    ç§ã¯ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒä¿å®ˆã¨å°‘ã€…ã®é‹å–¶ã§è¡Œã£ã¦ã¾ã„ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ç¾å½¹ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã•ã‚“
    ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®é‹å–¶è¡Œã£ã¦ã„ã‘ãŸã‚‰ã¨è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    å ±é…¬ã¯ç‰¹ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ãã‚Œã§ã‚‚å”åŠ›ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†æ–¹ã¯ã€ã”é€£çµ¡ã‚’
    ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    â†’ admin@mstdn.cosplayer.com

    More Info... æš«å®šãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ã™ã€‚é‹å–¶å¾Œã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“

    â—†ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    ãƒ»æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ³•ä»¤ã¾ãŸã¯å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã«é•åã™ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿(ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆ)ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™

    ãƒ»ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ãŸå ´åˆã€å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚„ç®¡ç†è€…ã¯

    ä¸€åˆ‡è²¬ä»»ã‚’è² ã‚ãªã„ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™

    ãƒ»ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚„ã‚¹ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒˆãƒ»ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«å‹§èª˜ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™

    ã‚‚ã¡ã‚ã‚“ã€ãã‚Œã‚’ç›®çš„ã«ã—ãŸã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆç™»éŒ²ã‚‚ç¦æ­¢ã—ã¾ã™

    ãƒ»å•†ç”¨ä½¿ç”¨ã¯ç®¡ç†è€…ã«ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãã ã•ã„

    â—†ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬å†™çœŸã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    [ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼å‘ã‘]

    ãƒ»ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹å†™çœŸã¯å¿…ãšç™»éŒ²ã—ãŸã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ãŒ

    å¿…ãšå†™ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹å†™çœŸã‚’ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ãƒ»è¤‡æ•°äººå†™ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ä¸€ç·’ã«å†™ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã®

    è¨±å¯ã‚’ã„ãŸã ã„ã¦ã‹ã‚‰æ²è¼‰ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ãã®éš›ã€è¢«å†™ä½“ã®ãŠåå‰ã‚‚æ²è¼‰ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã‚ˆã†ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™

    ãƒ»æœªæˆå¹´ãŒé–²è¦§ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã”è‡ªèº«ãŒå°‘ã€…éœ²å‡ºãŒå¼·ã‚ã¨

    åˆ¤æ–­ã—ãŸå ´åˆã€ŒNSFWã€ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã‚ˆã†ã”å”åŠ›ã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãŸã ã—ã€ä¸‹è¨˜æ²è¼‰ç¦æ­¢å†™çœŸã«è©²å½“ã™ã‚‹å†™çœŸã®å ´åˆã€

    æ²è¼‰ã¯ã—ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ãŠé¡˜ã„ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ä»¥ä¸‹ã«è©²å½“ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã€NSFWã‚¿ã‚°ã®æœ‰ç„¡ã«å•ã‚ãšç¦æ­¢ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ»ãƒãƒ³ã‚¬ãªã©ã®ä½œå“ãƒ­ã‚´ãƒ»è‘—ä½œæ¨©ãŒã‚ã‚‹ç”»åƒã®ç„¡è¨±å¯ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—

    dolphin.town

    ğŸ¬ Town

    Users: 221 . Toots: 865 . Connections: 146 . Language: English

    Eeeee! EEEEE, eeeeee!

    dolphin.town is a Mastodon instance where you can only say the letter e. Some instances exist that do not allow this letter. This is not helpful if you are a dolphin.

    Therefore, Darius Kazemi created this instance for all your dolphin-posting needs.

    Email: dolphintown@feeltrain.com

    Admin: @e@dolphin.town

    ç«¶é¦¬ãƒ‰ãƒ³/ç«¶é¦¬äºˆæƒ³ã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚€

    Users: 20 . Toots: 44 . Connections: 2 . Language: English

    ç«¶é¦¬äºˆæƒ³ã‚’æ¥½ã—ãï¼æƒ…å ±å…±æœ‰ã—ã¦å›åç‡ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¦ï¼ ç«¶é¦¬äºˆæƒ³ã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚€ç«¶é¦¬donã‚’ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ è¡€çµ±ã€å©èˆã€èª¿æ•™å¸«ã€å„é™£å–¶ãªã©ã®æƒ…å ±å…±æœ‰ã‚„ã€é¦¬åˆ¸è³¼å…¥ã®è²·ã„ç›®ã€çš„ä¸­ã—ãŸé¦¬åˆ¸æŠ«éœ²ãªã©ã®è‡ªæ…¢è©±ã€è²·ã„æ–¹ãƒŸã‚¹ã£ãŸï¼ãªã©é¦¬åˆ¸ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚

    Omotesandon

    Users: 8 . Toots: 4 . Connections: 0 . Language: English

    è¡¨å‚é“å‘¨è¾ºã«ç‰¹åŒ–ã—ãŸãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™

    è¡¨å‚é“ã€ç¥å®®å‰ã€é’å±±ã€å¤–è‹‘å‰ã€åŒ—å‚é“ã€æ¸‹è°·ã®è¡¨å‚é“å´ã®ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆæ¨å¥¨ã§ã™ã€‚ ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚„åœ°å…ƒã®äººã—ã‹çŸ¥ã‚‰ãªã„æ–°åº—èˆ—ã€â—¯â—¯ã®ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã§ãªã«ã‹ã‚ã‚‹ã‚‰ã—ã„ã¨ã„ã£ãŸæƒ…å ±ãªã©ã‚’ã‚„ã‚Šå–ã‚Šã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

    Admin: @hage@omotesandon.com

    toot.pm

    about

    preview

    join

    Private Mastodon

    Users: 26 . Toots: 38 . Connections: 286 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance serves the community respecting private messaging via advanced technology as well as open and fearless communication in general. Worldwide.
    When posting, let the core rules of Netiquette guide you.
    Follow @status for updates.
    Instance Location: Frankfurt, Germany.

    More Info... Privacy is necessary for an open society in the electronic age. Privacy is not secrecy. A private matter is something one doesn't want the whole world to know, but a secret matter is something one doesn't want anybody to know. Privacy is the power to selectively reveal oneself to the world. If two parties have some sort of dealings, then each has a memory of their interaction. Each party can speak about their own memory of this; how could anyone prevent it? One could pass laws against it, but the freedom of speech, even more than privacy, is fundamental to an open society; we seek not to restrict any speech at all. If many parties speak together in the same forum, each can speak to all the others and aggregate together knowledge about individuals and other parties. The power of electronic communications has enabled such group speech, and it will not go away merely because we might want it to. Since we desire privacy, we must ensure that each party to a transaction have knowledge only of that which is directly necessary for that transaction. Since any information can be spoken of, we must ensure that we reveal as little as possible. In most cases personal identity is not salient. When I purchase a magazine at a store and hand cash to the clerk, there is no need to know who I am. When I ask my electronic mail provider to send and receive messages, my provider need not know to whom I am speaking or what I am saying or what others are saying to me; my provider only need know how to get the message there and how much I owe them in fees. When my identity is revealed by the underlying mechanism of the transaction, I have no privacy. I cannot here selectively reveal myself; I must _always_ reveal myself. Therefore, privacy in an open society requires anonymous transaction systems. Until now, cash has been the primary such system. An anonymous transaction system is not a secret transaction system. An anonymous system empowers individuals to reveal their identity when desired and only when desired; this is the essence of privacy. Privacy in an open society also requires cryptography. If I say something, I want it heard only by those for whom I intend it. If the content of my speech is available to the world, I have no privacy. To encrypt is to indicate the desire for privacy, and to encrypt with weak cryptography is to indicate not too much desire for privacy. Furthermore, to reveal one's identity with assurance when the default is anonymity requires the cryptographic signature. We cannot expect governments, corporations, or other large, faceless organizations to grant us privacy out of their beneficence. It is to their advantage to speak of us, and we should expect that they will speak. To try to prevent their speech is to fight against the realities of information. Information does not just want to be free, it longs to be free. Information expands to fill the available storage space. Information is Rumor's younger, stronger cousin; Information is fleeter of foot, has more eyes, knows more, and understands less than Rumor. We must defend our own privacy if we expect to have any. We must come together and create systems which allow anonymous transactions to take place. People have been defending their own privacy for centuries with whispers, darkness, envelopes, closed doors, secret handshakes, and couriers. The technologies of the past did not allow for strong privacy, but electronic technologies do. We the Cypherpunks are dedicated to building anonymous systems. We are defending our privacy with cryptography, with anonymous mail forwarding systems, with digital signatures, and with electronic money. Cypherpunks write code. We know that someone has to write software to defend privacy, and since we can't get privacy unless we all do, we're going to write it. We publish our code so that our fellow Cypherpunks may practice and play with it. Our code is free for all to use, worldwide. We don't much care if you don't approve of the software we write. We know that software can't be destroyed and that a widely dispersed system can't be shut down. Cypherpunks deplore regulations on cryptography, for encryption is fundamentally a private act. The act of encryption, in fact, removes information from the public realm. Even laws against cryptography reach only so far as a nation's border and the arm of its violence. Cryptography will ineluctably spread over the whole globe, and with it the anonymous transactions systems that it makes possible. For privacy to be widespread it must be part of a social contract. People must come and together deploy these systems for the common good. Privacy only extends so far as the cooperation of one's fellows in society. We the Cypherpunks seek your questions and your concerns and hope we may engage you so that we do not deceive ourselves. We will not, however, be moved out of our course because some may disagree with our goals. The Cypherpunks are actively engaged in making the networks safer for privacy. Let us proceed together apace. Onward. Eric Hughes 9 March 1993

    Email: contact at toot dot pm

    Admin: @status@toot.pm

    dreo.io

    pleasehug.me

    Users: 44 . Toots: 1568 . Connections: 583 . Language: English

    General purpose Instance, just register.

    Rules: don't be a moron, flag nsfw as nsfw, yadda yadda yadda. I won't block any instances, only if they are only bot/spam instances flooding the server or all the content on the instance is illegal in the hosting country (germany).

    Email: support@kirschn.de

    Admin: @Kirschn@pleasehug.me

    ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³AAæ¿

    Users: 8 . Toots: 352 . Connections: 122 . Language: English

    ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³AAæ¿ã§ã™ã€‚ä»–é›‘è«‡ã§ã‚‚å…¨ç„¶OK
    ã‚ˆã†ã‚„ã£ã¨ãã‚Œãªã‚Šã®å®‰å®šç¨¼å‹•
    â€»ã“ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã¯å€‹äººè²»ã§é‹ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã€€æ”¯æ´ã‚’å‹Ÿé›†ä¸­ã§ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚ˆã‚ã—ã‘ã‚Œã°ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚
    https://enty.jp/wn3TsGzi9l0A

    ãƒ»ç”Ÿã¾ã‚ŒãŸã°ã‹ã‚Šã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã€‚ç¾åœ¨å°‘ãªã‚ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã§é‹ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»R18ã®ã‚¨ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ­ç”»åƒã€AAã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»ãã®ä»–ã€æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ³•å¾‹ã«è§¦ã‚Œã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»å€‹äººè²»ã®ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ‘ãŒã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã—ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã¨é–‰é–ã—ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã®ã§ã€å„ªã—ããƒ‘ã‚ªã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒ•ã‚¨ãƒ

    Chitter

    Users: 30 . Toots: 2149 . Connections: 463 . Language: English

    Chitter chitter, raccoon ğŸ’œ

    More Info... Welcome to chitter.xyz!

    The rules are pretty simple: be friendly to other users of this instance.Transphobia, racism or any other forms of abuse is not tolerated at all here and will result in your account getting banned and removed.

    NSFW/Adult oriented accounts are currently not acceptable here until I have confirmation this is allowed. The last thing I need is complaints from other instances that something NSFW has leaked onto the federated timeline.

    If you spot any federation bots from other instances following you, please use the report function to report them.

    botsin.space

    about

    preview

    join

    botsin.space

    Users: 254 . Toots: 68780 . Connections: 556 . Language: English

    This instance is for bots and bot allies. Anyone can sign up to be a user here or run your bot here. Users agree to the Code of Conduct listed on the extended description page .

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    NOTE: these are initial and subject to change

    Anyone is welcome to open an account either as your personal account, or to run a bot. Open as many bot accounts as you like.

    If you run a bot here, please be kind to the servers. If the instance starts to bog down, bots that are making lots of API calls will get shut down.

    Do not use bots to abuse users. Bots should punch up, not down.

    If you have questions or concerns, feel free to contact me at muffinista@mastodon.social, @muffinista on twitter, or by emailing colin at muffinlabs.com

    Email: colin@muffinlabs.com

    Admin: @botsin.space

    lovethe.wang

    about

    preview

    join

    We love the wang

    Users: 11 . Toots: 74 . Connections: 188 . Language: English

    Do you love the wang?

    We're pretty lewd here, be warned.

    More Info... We're pretty lewd here, be warned.

    Site rules:

    Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel.

    Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Spam is prohibited.

    Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network

    Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion.

    The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended)

    noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@lovethe.wang

    Admin: @kaylee@lovethe.wang

    kinky.business

    about

    preview

    join

    Kinky Business

    Users: 163 . Toots: 3475 . Connections: 481 . Language: English

    kinky.business is a Mastodon instance for the kink community. All you naughty people are in the right place. Sign up and let's go :)

    More Info... I'm @bedtimedrillsgt, a 30-something Dom. Beard and boobs enthusiast.

    I built this Mastodon instance because there's plenty of room for fun sub-communities in the fediverse. And so, here is a home for all you kinky, filthy fucks.

    Discuss your hopes and desires, post your latest toys or bruises and most of all, have fun.

    If you have any questions or concerns, toot at me

    Rules

    Keep everything here safe, sane, and consensual. No exceptions.

    Do not flood the server with posts

    Use NSFW/CW tags for NSFW media

    Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

    Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content

    Feel free to report users or content that should not be here.

    Admins of this site reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    A note on federation

    Right now, this is a regularly federated instance. CW tags are somewhat necessary not to get blocked by other servers. In the future, I'd prefer to federate only with other naughty Mastodon instances, and we can drop the CW requirement.

    Email: admin@kinky.business

    Admin: @bedtimedrillsgt@kinky.business

    â˜…ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«å†…å®¹ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ç­‰ã«ã¯ã€ç®¡ç†äººã¯å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ãŸã”æœ¬äººã«æ³•çš„ãªè²¬ä»»ãŒç”Ÿã˜ã¾ã™ã€‚ç™ºè¨€å†…å®¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€ååˆ†æ°—ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚ç™»éŒ²ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã®IPã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰å€‹äººã®ç‰¹å®šã¯ã§ãã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚ˆã‚ã—ããŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å¤šãã®æ–¹ãŒè¦‹ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ç‰¹å®šã®å€‹äººã¸ã®å¨åœ§çš„ãªã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚„ä¸å¿«ãªç™ºè¨€ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    â˜…ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆå‡çµã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    ç‰¹å®šã®æ–¹ã®ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒä¸å¿«ã«æ€ã†æ–¹ã¯ã€åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«ã¯ã©ã‚“ã©ã‚“ã¨ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚„ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ãŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ä¸å¿«ãªçŠ¶æ³ãŒç¶šã„ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€ãã®ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆå†…å®¹ã‚’é€šå ±ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚ï¼•å›ä»¥ä¸Šã€åŒæ§˜ã®é€šå ±ã‚’å—ã‘ãŸã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯ã€ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã§ã‚‚ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆå†…å®¹ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ãŸä¸Šã§ã€äº‹å‰ã®äºˆå‘Šãªã1ï½ï¼’ã‹æœˆé–“ç¨‹åº¦ã€è©²å½“ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¹å‡¦ç†ã‚’ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    mstdn.io

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 4020 . Toots: 42722 . Connections: 1542 . Language: English

    Fast and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Come join us!

    Up since 04/04/2017.

    More Info... Welcome on mstdn.io!

    I'm @angristan, the admin, a french tech enthusiast and learning sysadmin. I run my french blog here : angristan.fr

    This instance is IPv6 compatible, has good HTTPS parameters, is following good security practices, has good uptime is focused on speed and will be updated regularly.

    Also, I try to be as transparent as possible.

    If you have trouble with the instance, please send my an email or contact me on Twitter : @fuolpit

    By @headlessideas (also made the favicon)

    Rules :

    â€¢ Don't flood

    â€¢ Respect each other

    â€¢ I (the admin) support freedom of speech, so I won't block accounts or instances unless there is a good reason (like a legal one)

    â€¢ Use NSFW tags for NSFW content ğŸ”

    â€¢ Use content warning for spoilers

    â€¢ Any language is allowed ğŸŒ

    â€¢ Have fun ğŸ‰

    Feel free to block or mute whoever you want.

    What's behind ?

    This instance is hosted on a VPS at NiHost, in France. They provide a very good quality of service, and accepted to make a custom VPS for the needs of this instance. Thanks to them!

    The VPS has the following specifications :

    â€¢ 8 virtual cores of Intel Xeon E5-2650v3

    â€¢ 16 GB of DDR4 RAM

    â€¢ 100 GB of SSD in RAID 5

    â€¢ 1 Gb/s unlimited bandwidth

    â€¢ Debian 8

    This server is backed up everyday on another one.

    Here are some statistics. You can check all the graphs here.

    Check out the live monitoring!

    Donations

    You can donate to help me maintain this instance in the long term.

    Here is what I have to pay :

    â€¢ Domaine name: 35â‚¬/year

    â€¢ Server: 16â‚¬/month (thanks to my partnership with NiHost)

    â€¢ Backup server: 10â‚¬/month

    I also run 4 Tor relays, so your money will alway be put to good use ğŸ˜Š

    I also invested a lot of time for this, dozens of hours of installing, tweaking, debugging, optimizing, monitoring, explaining, etc. I love it, it's my passion, but I do this on my free time, so any thanks for my work, financial or not, is really appreciated.

    Don't forget to toot me @angristan if you made a donation. ğŸ˜‰

    â€¢ Paypal They restricted my account because I'm not 18. Fuck them ! Cryptocurrencies don't ask for my age at least.

    â€¢ Patreon

    â€¢ BTC : 16Q9j1stgzwuiosVfAuTaCGJWDhTr4SEjf

    â€¢ ETH :Â 0xe673F66AEA00D0b7b8D968e837022E84B9d2534C

    â€¢ LTC : LSVQpJD3Vh3tMLkk3tZhSTPrjGHu6PkxZQ

    Don't forget to donate to the main dev, he is the one making the hard work for Mastodon : Gargron's Patreon

    If you can't help financially, don't worry ! Just talk about Mastodon around you, help the new users, and toot every day !

    Thank you, and happy tooting!

    We're no strangers to tweets

    You know the rules, and so do I

    The full federation that I'm thinking of

    You wouldn't get it from

    Any other instance

    I'm just gonna tell you how I toot

    Gonna make you understand

    Never gonna toot you up

    Never gonna boost you down

    Never gonna tweet around and

    Subtoot you

    Never gonna make you toot

    Never gonna say good toot

    Never gonna tell a toot

    And toot you

    about

    InstÃ¢ncia de Mastodon em portuguÃªs

    Users: 145 . Toots: 1040 . Connections: 697 . Language: Portuguese

    Masto.pt Ã© uma instÃ¢ncia do universo Mastodon para pessoas que falam portuguÃªs .
    O universo Mastodon Ã© Ãºnico pois nÃ£o Ã© centralizado e nÃ£o existe uma grande empresa que o controla. O Masto.pt pretende ajudar a encontrar e criar uma comunidade para utilizadores portugueses.
    NÃ£o existem grandes regras para participar. O serviÃ§o Ã© gratuito e se usarem o bom senso nÃ£o terÃ£o qualquer problema.
    Lembramos que isto Ã© um projecto feito da boa vontade e nÃ£o existem garantias de funcionamento. O bom disso Ã© que podes participar, sugerir ou ajudar a melhorar este espaÃ§o.

    More Info... Como funciona

    O Mastodon Ã© um software de cÃ³digo aberto. Isso significa que qualquer pessoa pode usar, copiar e modificar.

    Isso fez com que centenas de pessoas tenham utilizado este software para criar as suas comunidades.

    Uma das vantagens do Mastodon Ã© que as comunidades nÃ£o sÃ£o fechados e uma pessoa numa comunidade (ou instÃ¢ncia do Mastodon) consegue seguir pessoas noutras comunidades do Mastodon.

    Home, Local, Global

    HOME: listagem dos posts das pessoas que seguimos em qualquer instÃ¢ncia

    LOCAL: listagem dos posts pÃºblicos das pessoas na mesma instÃ¢ncia que nÃ³s

    GLOBAL: listagem dos posts pÃºblicos das pessoas na mesma instÃ¢ncia que nÃ³s e das pessoas que sÃ£o seguidas por alguÃ©m na nossa instÃ¢ncia

    A listagem Global nÃ£o lista todos os posts publicados no universo Mastodon, lista apenas aqueles que a instÃ¢ncia onde estamos "conhece". Ou seja, os publicados localmente e os publicados pelas pessoas que os utilizadores dessa instÃ¢ncia seguem.

    Email: info@masto.pt

    Admin: @hugo@masto.pt

    ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒ«ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¨å† ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚‚ã®ãªã‚‰ç¯„å›²ã«åˆ¶é™ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
    765ã€ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¢ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚ºã€ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒ¬ãƒ©ã‚¬ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚ºã€ãƒŸãƒªã‚ªãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ã€SideMã€ã‚¼ãƒã‚°ãƒ©ã‚·ã‚¢ã€KRã€ãã®ä»–æœªã è¦‹çŸ¥ã‚‰ã¬ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒã‚¹ã¾ã§ã€‚

    More Info... è¡Œé ­ã«ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ãŒä»˜ã„ãŸè¦‹å‡ºã—ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯(orã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—)ã™ã‚‹ã¨æœ¬æ–‡ã‚’èª­ã‚€ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹äºˆå®š

    ç¾åœ¨äºˆå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹æ–­ã‚’ä¼´ã†ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    æœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã«ã¤ã„ã¦

    çš†æ§˜ã¸ãŠé¡˜ã„

    æœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã¯å˜ç‹¬ã®å€‹äººãŒæ§‹ç¯‰ãªã‚‰ã³ã«é‹ç”¨ã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€æœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã«ã¤ã„ã¦ä»–ã®æ³•äººã€å›£ä½“ã¸ã®ãŠå•åˆã›ã¯ãŠã‚„ã‚ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    CWã‚„NSFWã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€Œéš ã—ã¦ãŠã„ãŸæ–¹ãŒç„¡é›£ã‹ãªï¼Ÿã€ã¨æ€ã£ãŸã‚‰éš ã—ã¦ãŠããã‚‰ã„ã®æ„Ÿã˜ã§ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    i.write.codethat.sucks

    about

    preview

    join

    We write code that sucks

    Users: 62 . Toots: 1000 . Connections: 590 . Language: English

    I write code that sucks, if you do too this is the place for you!

    More Info... Become a Patron!

    Site rules:

    Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel.

    Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Spam is prohibited.

    Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network

    Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion.

    The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended)

    noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@codethat.sucks

    Admin: @kaylee@i.write.codethat.sucks

    chaos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    chaos.social

    Users: 592 . Toots: 12273 . Connections: 864 . Language: English

    chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
    chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).
    Follow @ordnung for low-traffic instance-related updates.

    More Info... Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

    Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

    Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

    Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

    Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

    Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests

    Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

    You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which also provides a list of currently blocked or silenced instances, alongside with reasons. We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

    Email: contact@chaos.social

    Admin: @ordnung@chaos.social

    Importing follow & block lists isn't working. I can't figure out why not. Grrrrrrr. Sorry. Try starting fresh.

    Policies for the rafting.io Mastodon instance:

    You own your own words.

    Here are some things you definitely should post here:

    â€¢ creative/funny/surprising bots

    â€¢ fandom

    â€¢ computer nerdery

    â€¢ gaming

    â€¢ long explanations of the amazing perfection of the Twelfth Doctor

    â€¢ Malcolm Tucker

    Things I will delete on sight, along with your account:

    â€¢ trolling

    â€¢ hate speech

    â€¢ racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia

    â€¢ untagged NSFW images with sexual or violent content

    â€¢ content auto-posted or auto-syndicated from elsewhere

    mastodon.hk

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.hk

    Users: 174 . Toots: 1963 . Connections: 509 . Language: English

    mastodon.hk

    More Info...

    Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.hk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Racism, Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Content illegal in Hong Kong

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Contact

    Other than

    Mastodon

    , you may contact me via Twitter

    @siuying

    Email: francis@ignition.hk

    Admin: @siuying@mastodon.hk

    mastodon.partecipa.digital

    about

    preview

    join

    A tech savvy Mastodon

    Users: 20 . Toots: 458 . Connections: 410 . Language: English

    Just another Pachyderm trying to fly like a bird.
    Feel free to sign up if you'd like to join conversations about IT, Open Source, Linux, various and miscellaneous.
    Mastodon instance supported by Omnis Systems Ltd a fine purveyor of Open Source and Linux based solutions to modern & dynamic organisations.

    Things may break while we are testing and/or updating this Mastodon instance. People will be kicked out from this instance if they misbehave.If you feel that any post may have hurt your feeling then stop reading it.If posts can/are considered indecent, inappropriate and/or illegal in UK or EU please do report them and actions will be taken ASAP.Users with abusive behaviour/content will be blocked without notice.

    Email: paolo@partecipa.digital

    Admin: @paolo@mastodon.partecipa.digital

    scifi.fyi

    about

    preview

    join

    Scifi!

    Users: 80 . Toots: 1674 . Connections: 436 . Language: English

    Scifi.Fyi is a general-purpose mastodon instance that seeks to foster a happy, inclusive community. All are welcome.
    We host monthly book clubs!
    We are reading Hothouse by Brian W. Aldiss for the month of May and everyone is welcome to participate under the hashtag #ScifiBookClub

    More Info...

    Some things to keep in mind while you're here:

    Add content warnings to your posts liberally. Someone's happiness will always be worth more than a few extra clicks.

    Hate speech and abuse of any kind will not be tolerated.

    This instance welcomes discussion in all languages.

    Please block follow bots if you encounter them.

    Additionally, please refer to the code of conduct outlined at mastodon.social.

    Running this instance has been an incredible learning opportunity for me and, like all great learning opportunities, accidents happen. If you are looking for a more stable place to call your home I can't recommend cybre.space highly enough.

    As long as you don't mind a little turbulence from time to time I would love for you to join us as we explore the final frontier.

    Domain blocks:

    SILENCE

    woofer.alfter.us

    social.au2pb.net

    gorf.club

    wrongthink.net

    SUSPEND

    rainbowdash.net

    shitposter.club

    freezepeach.xyz

    social.heldscal.la

    noadgendasocial.com

    sealion.club

    porntoot.com

    gs.smuglo.li

    unsafe.space

    pawoo.net

    Email: cwm@posteo.net

    Admin: @cwm@scifi.fyi

    ã»ã¼å®‰å®šã—ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€ã¾ã ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒæ®‹ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ã”ä¸ä¾¿ãŠã‹ã‘ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚çŸ¥ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ä½•å’ã‚ˆã‚ã—ããŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¹ã€å‰¯æ¥­ã€è¶£å‘³ãªã©ã§ã€å€‹äººã¾ãŸã¯ãƒŸãƒ‹ãƒãƒ ãªãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ã§æ´»å‹•ã—ã¦ã‚‹äºº

    è¶£å‘³/ä»•äº‹å•ã‚ãšã€ä½•ã‹ã«æ²¡é ­ã—ã¦ã‚‹äººï¼ˆå‰µä½œã€æŠ€è¡“ã€åˆ¶ä½œã€æ›¸ã/æãã€ã¤ãã‚‹ã€ç™ºä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã€è¡¨ç¾ã™ã‚‹ã€ãªã©ï¼‰

    æ¥½ã—ã„ã“ã¨ã€èˆˆå‘³ã®ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã¯ç‰©å‡„ã„ãƒ‘ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚’ç™ºæ®ã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã†äºº

    çµ„ç¹”ã«ã„ã‚‹ã‚ˆã‚Šã€å€‹äººãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã®ã»ã†ãŒãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ç™ºæ®ã§ãã‚‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã®äºº

    å†…å‘çš„ã§äººã¨æ¥ã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯ãƒ‹ã‚¬ãƒ†ã ã‘ã©ã€è‡ªåˆ†ã®ä¸–ç•Œã‚’æŒã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    äººã¨æ¥ã™ã‚‹ã®ã‚‚å¾—æ„ã ã‘ã©ã€è‡ªåˆ†ã®ä¸–ç•Œã‚‚æŒã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    æº¢ã‚ŒãŸä»•äº‹ã‚’ã‚·ã‚§ã‚¢ã§ãã‚‹ä»²é–“ã‚’è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã„äºº

    æº€å“¡é›»è»Šã«ç¸›ã‚‰ã‚Œãªã„ã€æŸ”è»Ÿãªåƒãæ–¹ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    ä¼šç¤¾ã«å‹¤ã‚ãªãŒã‚‰ã€è¶£å‘³ã‚„å‰¯æ¥­ã§å¥½ããªã“ã¨ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    ä»Šç„¡è·ã ã‘ã©ã€æŠ€è¡“ã¯ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã¨ã‚Šã‚ãˆãšãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®çœ‹æ¿ã‚’ä¸Šã’ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã‹ãªã¨æ€ã†äºº

    ä¼šç¤¾å“¡ã«å‘ã„ã¦ãªã„ã®ã§ã€ãŒã‚“ã°ã£ã¦è‡ªç«‹ã—ã¦é£Ÿã¹ã¦ã„ããŸã„äºº

    æŠ€è¡“ã‚’èº«ã«ã¤ã‘ã¦ã€å®¶ã«å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã£ãŸã¾ã¾ä»•äº‹ã—ã¦ã‚‹äºº

    ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã“ã¨ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹äºº

    ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªäººãŸã¡ã‚’å¿œæ´ã—ãŸã„äººã‚„çµ„ç¹”

    ãŠã­ãŒã„

    äº’ã„ã®æ´»å‹•ã‚„ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ«ã‚’å°Šé‡ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†

    äº’ã„ã®æ´»å‹•ã«æ”¯éšœã®ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã€é©åº¦ãªè·é›¢æ„Ÿã‚’ã‚‚ã£ã¦ç¹‹ãŒã‚Šã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†

    æ—¥æœ¬å›½ã®æ³•å¾‹ã«è§¦ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªç™ºè¨€ã‚„ç”»åƒã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã€ãƒ–ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒˆã¯æ§ãˆã¦ãã ã•ã„

    èª°ã‹ãŒå«Œãªæ€ã„ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚‚æ§ãˆã¦ãã ã•ã„

    ã‚¹ãƒ‘ãƒ ã‚„botã£ã½ã„åºƒå‘Šã¯é¿ã‘ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼ˆã•ã‚Šã’ãªã„å‘ŠçŸ¥ã‚„ã€æ´»å‹•ã«ã¤ã„ã¦èªã£ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ã†ãªã©ã¯å¤§æ­“è¿ã§ã™ï¼‰

    ä½œå“ãªã©ã€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å¥½ã¿ã®åˆ†ã‹ã‚Œãã†ãªã‚‚ã®ï¼ˆä¾‹ãˆã°18ç¦è¦ç´ ã‚ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ãªã©ï¼‰ã‚’æŠ•ç¨¿ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã‚„ã€é•·æ–‡ã®å ´åˆã¯ã€CWï¼ˆContent Warningï¼‰ã‚„NSFWã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’é©å®œã”æ´»ç”¨ãã ã•ã„

    ä½œå“ã®è¡¨ç¾ãªã©ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€åˆ¶ç´„ã¯ã‚ã¾ã‚Šè¨­ã‘ãŸããªã„ã§ã™ãŒã€ã¿ã‚“ãªãŒå¿ƒåœ°ã‚ˆãéã”ã›ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã€éæ¿€ãªã‚‚ã®ã€æš´åŠ›çš„ãªã‚‚ã®ã€ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ãªã‚‚ã®ã¯æ§ãˆã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆã‚‹ã¨ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    ã¿ã‚“ãªãŒå±…å¿ƒåœ°ã‚ˆã„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†

    ä¸Šè¨˜ã‚’è¸ã¾ãˆãŸã†ãˆã§ã€æ¥½ã—ãä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆã‚‹ã¨ã†ã‚Œã—ã„ã§ã™ï¼

    ä½•ã‚‰ã‹ã®äº‹æƒ…ã§çªç„¶ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠãƒ³ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    ç¾åœ¨VPSã§ç¨¼åƒä¸­ã§ã™ã€‚ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã—ãŸè² è·ã§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãŒè½ã¡ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ä½•å’ã”å®¹èµ¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    mastodon.my

    about

    preview

    join

    MyMastodon

    Users: 24 . Toots: 91 . Connections: 533 . Language: English

    A Mastadon instance launched for fellow Malaysians and everyone on the internet who likes being with us!

    More Info... This is a Mastodon instance run by @s.

    This Mastodon instance is created for fellow Malaysians (hence on .my domain extension). However, it is also open for everyone on the internet who likes being with us! ;-)

    Rules and Regulations:

    1) Never share your login credentials with anyone else and never save your login credentials on public or someone else's computer/phone/tablet browser.

    2) Do not post any copyrighted material unless the copyright is owned by you or by this website.

    3) Do not post any material which is knowingly false and/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violative of any law.

    4) Homophobic, misogynistic and racist posts are strictly not allowed, you will be permanently banned right away.

    5) NSFW (Not Safe for Work) and/or CW (Content Warning) options must be enabled for adults content such as sexually explicit images.

    6) Members are encouraged to use the report tool when you see inappropriate content such as adults content without NSFW/CW.

    This server is currently funded by myself. If you want to help me out, feel free to visit https://patreon.com/MyMastodon

    As a reward, your Mastodon username will be mentioned in our donator list on our website. Thank you! :-)

    Email: admin@mastodon.my

    Admin: @admin@mastodon.my

    mstdn.studio
